1.name: Healing Signet
1.description: You gain 82...172 Health. You have -40 armor while using this skill.
1.concise: You gain 82...172 Health. <gray>You have -40 armor while using this skill.</gray>

2.name: Resurrection Signet
2.description: Resurrect target party member. That party member is returned to life with 100% Health and 25% Energy. This signet only recharges when you gain a morale boost.
2.concise: Resurrects target party member (100% Health, 25% Energy). This signet only recharges when you gain a morale boost.

3.name: Signet of Capture
3.description: Choose one skill from a nearby dead Boss of your profession. Signet of Capture is permanently replaced by that skill. If that skill was elite, gain 250 XP for every level you have earned.
3.concise: Choose one skill from a nearby dead Boss of your profession. Signet of Capture is permanently replaced by that skill. If that skill was elite, gain 250 XP for every level you have earned.

5.name: Power Block
5.description: If target foe is casting a spell or chant, that skill and all skills of the same attribute are disabled for 1...12 seconds and that skill is interrupted.
5.concise: If target foe is casting a spell or chant, that skill and all skills of the same attribute are disabled (1...12 seconds) and that skill is interrupted.

6.name: Mantra of Earth
6.description: For 30...90 seconds, whenever you take earth damage, the damage is reduced by 26...50% and you gain 2 Energy.
6.concise: (30...90 seconds.) Reduces earth damage you take by 26...50%. You gain 2 Energy when you take earth damage.

7.name: Mantra of Flame
7.description: For 30...90 seconds, whenever you take fire damage, the damage is reduced by 26...50% and you gain 2 Energy.
7.concise: (30...90 seconds.) Reduces fire damage you take by 26...50%. You gain 2 Energy when you take fire damage.

8.name: Mantra of Frost
8.description: For 30...90 seconds, whenever you take cold damage, the damage is reduced by 26...50% and you gain 2 Energy.
8.concise: (30...90 seconds.) Reduces cold damage you take by 26...50%. You gain 2 Energy when you take cold damage.

9.name: Mantra of Lightning
9.description: For 30...90 seconds, whenever you take lightning damage, the damage is reduced by 26...50% and you gain 2 Energy.
9.concise: (30...90 seconds.) Reduces lightning damage you take by 26...50%. You gain 2 Energy when you take lightning damage.

10.name: Hex Breaker
10.description: For 5...80 seconds, the next time you are the target of a hex, that hex fails and the caster takes 10...46 damage.
10.concise: (5...80 seconds.) The next hex against you fails and the caster takes 10...46 damage.

11.name: Distortion
11.description: For 1...5 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block attacks. Whenever you block an attack this way, you lose 2 Energy or Distortion ends.
11.concise: (1...5 seconds.) You have 75% chance to block. <gray>Block cost: you lose 2 Energy or Distortion ends.</gray>

13.name: Mantra of Recovery
13.description: For 5...20 seconds, spells you cast recharge 33% faster.

14.name: Mantra of Persistence
14.description: For 5...25 seconds, any Illusion Magic hex you cast lasts 10...40% longer.
14.concise: (5...25 seconds.) Illusion hexes you cast last 10...40% longer.

15.name: Mantra of Inscriptions
15.description: For 5...25 seconds, signets you successfully activate while in this stance recharge 10...40% faster.
15.concise: (5...25 seconds.) Signets you successfully activate while in this stance recharge 10...40% faster.

16.name: Mantra of Concentration
16.description: For 1...38 seconds, the next time you would be interrupted, you are not interrupted.
16.concise: (1...38 seconds.) The next time you would be interrupted, you are not interrupted.

17.name: Mantra of Resolve
17.description: For 30...90 seconds, you cannot be interrupted, but each time you would have been interrupted, you lose 10...4 Energy or Mantra of Resolve ends.
17.concise: (30...90 seconds.) Prevents interrupts against you. <gray>Prevention cost: lose 10...4 Energy or Mantra of Resolve ends.</gray>

18.name: Mantra of Signets
18.description: For 10...40 seconds, you have +3 armor for each signet you have equipped. Whenever you use a signet you gain 5...60 health.
18.concise: (10...40 seconds.) You have +3 armor for each signet. You gain 5...60 health each time you use a signet.

19.name: Fragility
19.description: For 8...20 seconds, target and adjacent foes take 5...20 damage each time they suffer or recover from a new condition.
19.concise: Also hexes foes adjacent to target (8...20 seconds). These foes take 5...20 damage each time they gain or lose a condition.

21.name: Inspired Enchantment
21.description: Removes an enchantment from target foe and gain 3...15 Energy. For 20 seconds, Inspired Enchantment is replaced with the enchantment removed from target foe.
21.concise: Removes an enchantment from target foe. Removal effects: you gain 3...15 Energy; this spell is replaced with that enchantment (20 seconds).

22.name: Inspired Hex
22.description: Remove a hex from target ally and gain 4...10 Energy. For 20 seconds, Inspired Hex is replaced with the hex that was removed.
22.concise: Removes a hex from target ally. Removal effects: you gain 4...10 Energy; this spell is replaced with that hex (20 seconds).

23.name: Power Spike
23.description: If target foe is casting a spell or a chant, that skill is interrupted and target foe takes 30...120 damage.
23.concise: Interrupts a spell or chant. Interruption effect: deals 30...120 damage.

24.name: Power Leak
24.description: If target foe is casting a spell or chant, that skill is interrupted and target foe loses 3...17 Energy.
24.concise: Interrupts a spell or chant. Interruption effect: causes 3...17 Energy loss.

25.name: Power Drain
25.description: If target foe is casting a spell or chant, that skill is interrupted and you gain 1...31 Energy.
25.concise: Interrupts a spell or chant. Interruption effect: you gain 1...31 Energy.

26.name: Empathy
26.description: For 5...15 seconds, whenever target foe attacks, that foe takes 10...55 damage and deals 1...15 less damage.
26.concise: (5...15 seconds.) Target foe's attacks deal 1...15 less damage, and that foe takes 10...55 damage with each attack.

27.name: Shatter Delusions
27.description: Remove one Mesmer hex from target foe. If a hex was removed, that foe and all adjacent foes takes 15...75 damage.
27.concise: Removes a Mesmer hex from target foe. Removal effect: 15...75 damage to target and all adjacent foes.

28.name: Backfire
28.description: For 10 seconds, whenever target foe casts a spell, that foe takes 35...140 damage.
28.concise: (10 seconds.) Target foe takes 35...140 damage whenever it casts a spell.

29.name: Blackout
29.description: For 2...6 seconds, all of touched target foe's skills are disabled, and all of your skills are disabled for 5 seconds.
29.concise: (2...6 seconds.) Disables skills. <gray>Your skills are disabled (5 seconds).</gray>

30.name: Diversion
30.description: For 6 seconds, the next time target foe uses a skill, that skill takes an additional 10...56 seconds to recharge.
30.concise: (6 seconds.) Target foe's next skill takes +10...56 seconds to recharge.

31.name: Conjure Phantasm
31.description: For 2...16 seconds, target foe experiences -5 Health degeneration.

32.name: Illusion of Weakness
32.description: You lose 50...240 Health. Illusion of Weakness ends if damage drops your Health below 25% of your maximum. When Illusion of Weakness ends, you gain 50...240 Health.
32.concise: Lose 50...240 Health. End effect: you gain 50...240 Health. <gray>Ends if damage drops your Health below 25% of your maximum.</gray>

33.name: Illusionary Weaponry
33.description: For 30 seconds, your melee attacks neither hit nor fail to hit. Instead, Illusionary Weaponry deals 8...40 damage to your targets for each melee attack. You have +5 armor for each equipped Illusion Magic skill.
33.concise: (30 seconds.) Deals 8...40 damage to foes in place of other damage or effects from melee attacks. You have +5 armor for each equipped Illusion Magic skill. <gray>Your melee attacks neither hit nor fail to hit.</gray>

34.name: Sympathetic Visage
34.description: For 4...10 seconds, whenever target ally is hit by a melee attack, all adjacent foes lose all adrenaline and 3 Energy.
34.concise: (4...10 seconds.) All adjacent foes lose all adrenaline and 3 Energy whenever a melee attack hits target ally.

35.name: Ignorance
35.description: For 8...20 seconds target foe cannot use signets.
35.concise: (8...20 seconds.) Target foe cannot use signets.

36.name: Arcane Conundrum
36.description: For 5...15 seconds, spells cast by target foe and all adjacent foes take twice as long to cast. When this hex ends, you gain 1...7 energy. <sic/>
36.concise: Also hexes foes adjacent to target (5...15 seconds). Doubles spell casting time. End effect: you gain 1...7 energy. <sic/>

37.name: Illusion of Haste
37.description: For 5...11 seconds you are no longer Crippled, and you move 33% faster. When Illusion of Haste ends, you become Crippled for 3 seconds.
37.concise: (5...11 seconds.) You move 33% faster. Initial effect: removes Crippled condition. <gray>End effect: you are Crippled (3 seconds).</gray>

38.name: Channeling
38.description: For 8...56 seconds, whenever you cast a spell, you gain 1 Energy for each foe in the area.
38.concise: (8...56 seconds.) You gain 1 Energy for each foe in the area whenever you cast a spell.

39.name: Energy Surge
39.description: Target foe loses 1...10 Energy. For each point of Energy lost, that foe and all nearby foes take 9 damage.
39.concise: Causes 1...10 Energy loss. Deals 9 damage to target and nearby foes for each point of Energy lost.

40.name: Ether Feast
40.description: Target foe loses 3 Energy. You are healed 20...65 for each point of Energy lost.
40.concise: Causes 3 Energy loss. You gain 20...65 Health for each point of Energy lost.

41.name: Ether Lord
41.description: You lose all Energy. For 5...10 seconds, target foe suffers -1...3 Energy degeneration, and you experience +1...3 Energy regeneration.
41.concise: <gray>You lose all Energy.</gray> Target foe has -1...3 Energy degeneration and you have +1...3 Energy regeneration (5...10 seconds).

42.name: Energy Burn
42.description: Target foe loses 1...10 Energy and takes 9 damage for each point of Energy lost.
42.concise: Causes 1...10 Energy loss. Deals 9 damage for each point of Energy lost.

43.name: Clumsiness
43.description: For 4 seconds, target and adjacent foes are hexed with Clumsiness. The next time each foe attacks, the attack is interrupted and that foe suffers 10...92 damage.
43.concise: (4 seconds.) Also hexes adjacent foes. Interrupts next attack. Interruption effect: deals 10...92 damage.

44.name: Phantom Pain
44.description: For 10 seconds, target foe suffers -1...4 Health degeneration. When Phantom Pain ends, that foe suffers a Deep Wound, lowering that foe's maximum Health by 20% for 5...20 seconds.
44.concise: (10 seconds.) Causes -1...4 Health degeneration. End effect: inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...20 seconds).

45.name: Ethereal Burden
45.description: For 10 seconds, target foe moves 50% slower. When Ethereal Burden ends, you gain 10...18 Energy.
45.concise: (10 seconds.) Target foe moves 50% slower. End effect: you gain 10...18 Energy.

46.name: Guilt
46.description: For 6 seconds, the next time target foe casts a spell that targets a foe, the spell fails and you steal up to 5...14 Energy from that foe.
46.concise: (6 seconds.) Target foe's next spell fails and you steal 5...14 Energy. <gray>No effect unless this foe's spell targets one of your allies.</gray>

47.name: Ineptitude
47.description: For 4 seconds, the next time target foe or any adjacent foe attacks, they take 30...135 damage and are Blinded for 10 seconds.
47.concise: (4 seconds.) Also hexes foes adjacent to target. Deals 30...135 damage. Inflicts Blindness condition (10 seconds). <gray>No effect unless hexed foe attacks.</gray>

48.name: Spirit of Failure
48.description: For 30 seconds, target foe has a 25% chance to miss with attacks. You gain 1...3 Energy whenever that foe fails to hit in combat.
48.concise: (30 seconds.) Target foe has 25% chance to miss. You gain 1...3 Energy whenever this foe misses.

49.name: Mind Wrack
49.description: For 5...40 seconds, whenever this foe is the target of any of your non-hex Mesmer skills, that foe loses 1 Energy and takes 5...25 damage per point of Energy lost. If the target foe's Energy drops to 0, Mind Wrack ends and that foe takes 15...100 damage.
49.concise: (5...40 seconds.) Causes 1 Energy loss each time foe is the target of your non-hex Mesmer skills. Deals 5...25 damage per point of Energy lost. If target foe's Energy drops to 0, it takes 15...100 damage and Mind Wrack ends.

50.name: Wastrel's Worry
50.description: After 3 seconds, target foe and all adjacent foes take 20...100 damage. If that foe successfully uses a skill, Wastrel's Worry ends prematurely and does no damage.
50.concise: (3 seconds). End effect: causes 20...100 damage to target and adjacent foes. <gray>No effect and ends early if target foe uses a skill.</gray>

51.name: Shame
51.description: For 6 seconds, the next time target foe casts a spell that targets an ally, the spell fails and you steal up to 5...14 Energy from that foe.
51.concise: (6 seconds.) Target foe's next spell fails and you steal 5...14 Energy. <gray>No effect unless this foe's spell targeted one of its allies.</gray>

52.name: Panic
52.description: For 1...10 seconds, target foe and all nearby foes are hexed with Panic. When a foe hexed with Panic successfully uses a skill, all other nearby foes are interrupted.
52.concise: Also hexes foes near your target (1...10 seconds). Interrupts all other nearby foes whenever a hexed foe successfully activates a skill.

53.name: Migraine
53.description: For 5...20 seconds, target foe suffers -1...8 Health degeneration and takes 100% longer to activate skills.
53.concise: (5...20 seconds.) Causes -1...8 Health degeneration and doubles skill activation time.

54.name: Crippling Anguish
54.description: For 5...20 seconds, target moves and attacks 50% slower and suffers -1...8 Health degeneration.
54.concise: (5...20 seconds.) Target foe moves and attacks 50% slower and has -1...8 Health degeneration.

55.name: Fevered Dreams
55.description: For 10...25 seconds, whenever target foe suffers from a new condition, all foes in the area suffer from that condition as well. If target foe has two or more conditions that foe is Dazed for 1...3 seconds.
55.concise: (10...25 seconds.) Foes in the area also have any new conditions that target foe acquires. Inflicts Dazed on target foe (1...3 seconds) if that foe has two or more conditions.

56.name: Soothing Images
56.description: For 8...20 seconds, target foe and all adjacent foes cannot gain adrenaline.
56.concise: Also hexes foe adjacent to target. (8...20 seconds). These foes cannot gain adrenaline.

57.name: Cry of Frustration
57.description: If target foe is using a skill, that foe and all foes in the area are interrupted and suffer 15...75 damage.
57.concise: If target foe is using a skill, that foe and all foes in the area are interrupted and take 15...75 damage.

58.name: Signet of Midnight
58.description: You and target touched foe become Blinded for 15 seconds.
58.concise: Elite Touch Signet. (15 seconds.) Inflicts Blindness condition. <gray>You suffer from Blindness (15 seconds).</gray>

59.name: Signet of Weariness
59.description: Target foe and all nearby foes lose 3...8 Energy and suffer from Weakness for 1...12 seconds.
59.concise: Also affects foes near your target. Causes 3...8 Energy loss and inflicts Weakness (1...12 seconds).

61.name: Leech Signet
61.description: Interrupt target foe's action. If that action was a spell, you gain 3...15 Energy.
61.concise: Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: you gain 3...15 Energy if the action was a spell.

62.name: Signet of Humility
62.description: Target foe's elite skill is disabled for 1...16 seconds. Your non-Mesmer skills are disabled for 10 seconds.
62.concise: Disables elite skill (1...16 seconds). <gray>Disables your non-Mesmer skills (10 seconds).</gray>

63.name: Keystone Signet
63.description: All of your signets except Keystone Signet are recharged. For 20 seconds, the next 0...6 times you use a signet that targets a foe, all other foes adjacent to your target take 15...60 damage and are interrupted.
63.concise: (20 seconds.) Your next 0...6 signets interrupt <sic/> and deal 15...60 damage to other foes adjacent to your target. Initial Effect: <sic/> recharges all of your other signets.

65.name: Arcane Mimicry
65.description: For 20 seconds, Arcane Mimicry becomes the non-form elite skill from target other ally.
65.concise: This skill becomes target ally's elite skill (20 seconds). <gray>Cannot self-target. No effect if target's elite skill is a form.</gray>

66.name: Spirit Shackles
66.description: For 5...20 seconds, target foe loses 5 Energy whenever that foe attacks.
66.concise: (5...20). Target foe loses 5 Energy whenever it attacks.

67.name: Shatter Hex
67.description: Remove a hex from target ally. If a hex is removed, foes near that ally take 30...120 damage.
67.concise: Removes a hex from target ally. Removal effect: deals 30...120 damage to foes near this ally.

68.name: Drain Enchantment
68.description: Remove an enchantment from target foe. If an enchantment is removed, you gain 8...17 Energy and 40...120 Health.
68.concise: Removes an enchantment from target foe. Removal effect: you gain 8...17 Energy and 40...120 Health.

69.name: Shatter Enchantment
69.description: Remove an enchantment from target foe. If an enchantment is removed, that foe takes 14...100 damage.
69.concise: Removes an enchantment from target foe. Removal effect: deals 14...100 damage.

72.name: Elemental Resistance
72.description: For 30...90 seconds, You gain +40 armor against elemental damage, but you lose 24...12 armor against physical damage.
72.concise: (30...90 seconds.) You have +40 armor against elemental damage. <gray>You have 24...12 armor against physical damage.</gray>

73.name: Physical Resistance
73.description: For 30...90 seconds, You gain +40 armor against physical damage, but you lose 24...12 armor against elemental damage.
73.concise: (30...90 seconds.) You have +40 armor against physical damage. <gray>You have 24...12 armor against elemental damage.</gray>

74.name: Echo
74.description: For 30 seconds, Echo is replaced with the next skill you use. Echo acts as this skill for 30 seconds.
74.concise: (30 seconds.) Echo becomes the next skill you use (30 seconds).

75.name: Arcane Echo
75.description: If you cast a spell in the next 20 seconds, Arcane Echo is replaced with that spell for 20 seconds. Arcane Echo ends prematurely if you use a non-spell skill.
75.concise: (20 seconds.) Arcane Echo becomes the next spell you use (20 seconds). <gray>This enchantment ends if you use any skill that is not a spell.</gray>

76.name: Imagined Burden
76.description: For 8...20 seconds, target foe moves 50% slower.

77.name: Chaos Storm
77.description: Create a Chaos Storm at target foe's location that lasts for 10 seconds. Each second, foes adjacent to this location take 5...25 damage and lose 0...2 Energy.
77.concise: Deals 5...25 damage and causes 0...2 Energy loss each second (10 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to target's initial location.

78.name: Epidemic
78.description: Spread all negative conditions and their remaining durations from target foe to all foes adjacent to your target.
78.concise: Conditions on target foe transfer to adjacent foes.

79.name: Energy Drain
79.description: Target foe loses 2...9 Energy. You gain 3 Energy for each point of Energy lost.
79.concise: Causes 2...9 Energy loss. You gain 3 Energy for each point of Energy lost.

80.name: Energy Tap
80.description: Target foe loses 4...7 Energy. You gain 2 Energy for each point of Energy lost.
80.concise: Causes 4...7 Energy loss. You gain 2 Energy for each point of Energy lost.

81.name: Arcane Thievery
81.description: For 5...35 seconds, one random spell is disabled for target foe, and Arcane Thievery is replaced by that spell.
81.concise: (5...35 seconds.) Disables one random spell. This skill becomes that spell.

82.name: Mantra of Recall
82.description: For 20 seconds, you gain no benefit from it. You gain 10...25 Energy when Mantra of Recall ends.
82.concise: (20 seconds.) End effect: you gain 10...25 Energy.

83.name: Animate Bone Horror
83.description: Exploit nearest corpse to animate a level 1...17 bone horror.
83.concise: Creates a level 1...17 bone horror. <gray>Exploits a fresh corpse.</gray>

84.name: Animate Bone Fiend
84.description: Exploit nearest corpse to animate a level 1...17 bone fiend. Bone fiends can attack at range.
84.concise: Creates a level 1...17 bone fiend that can attack at range. <gray>Exploits a fresh corpse.</gray>

85.name: Animate Bone Minions
85.description: Exploit nearest corpse to animate two level 0...12 bone minions.
85.concise: Creates two level 0...12 bone minions. <gray>Exploits a fresh corpse.</gray>

86.name: Grenth's Balance
86.description: If target foe has more Health than you, you gain half the difference (up to your maximum Health), and that foe loses an equal amount. If this foe has less Health than you, you lose half the difference, and that foe gains an equal amount.
86.concise: You gain Health equal to half the difference between you and target, and this foe loses an equal amount. <gray>If this foe has less Health than you, you lose Health equal to half the difference.</gray>

87.name: Verata's Gaze
87.description: If target hostile animated undead has a master, its bond to its master is broken, making it hostile to all other creatures. If it had no master, you become its master. (50% failure chance with Death Magic 4 or less.)
87.concise: Make target undead servant masterless. If it is already masterless, you become its master. <gray>50% failure chance unless Death Magic 5 or more.</gray>

88.name: Verata's Aura
88.description: All hostile animated undead in the area become bound to you. Verata's Aura ends after 120...300 seconds. When Verata's Aura ends, you lose your bond with any undead bound to you. (50% failure chance with Death Magic 4 or less.)
88.concise: (120...300 seconds.) Become master of all hostile undead servants in the area. <gray>End effect: your undead servants become masterless. 50% failure chance unless Death Magic 5 or more.</gray>

89.name: Deathly Chill
89.description: Target foe is struck for 5...50 cold damage. If that foe's Health is above 50%, you deal an additional 5...50 shadow damage.
89.concise: Deals 5...50 cold damage. Deals 5...50 more damage if target foe was above 50% Health.

90.name: Verata's Sacrifice
90.description: For 5...10 seconds, your undead allies gain +10 Health regeneration. All conditions are removed from those allies and transferred to you. If this spell is successful and you have control of 3 or fewer minions, Verata's Sacrifice instantly recharges.
90.concise: (5...10 seconds.) 10 undead allied servants gain +10 Health regeneration. Instantly recharges if you have control of 3 or fewer servants. <gray>Transfers all conditions from those servants to you.</gray>

91.name: Well of Power
91.description: Exploit nearest corpse to create a Well of Power at that location. For 8...20 seconds, allies within the area of Well of Power gain +1...6 Health regeneration and +2 Energy regeneration.
91.concise: (8...20 seconds.) Allies in this well have +1...6 Health regeneration and +2 Energy regeneration. <gray>Exploits a fresh corpse.</gray>

92.name: Well of Blood
92.description: Exploit nearest corpse to create a Well of Blood at its location. For 8...20 seconds, allies in that area receive +1...6 Health regeneration.
92.concise: (8...20 seconds.) Allies in this well have +1...6 Health regeneration. <gray>Exploits a fresh corpse.</gray>

93.name: Well of Suffering
93.description: Exploit nearest corpse to create a Well of Suffering at its location. For 10...30 seconds, foes in that area suffer -1...6 Health degeneration.
93.concise: (10...30 seconds.) Foes in this well have -1...6 Health degeneration. <gray>Exploits a fresh corpse.</gray>

94.name: Well of the Profane
94.description: Exploit nearest corpse to create a Well of the Profane at its location. For 8...20 seconds, foes in that area are stripped of all enchantments and cannot be the target of further enchantments. (50% failure chance with Death Magic 4 or less.)
94.concise: (8...20 seconds.) Foes in this well lose all enchantments and cannot be the target of further enchantments. <gray>Exploits a fresh corpse. 50% failure chance unless Death Magic 5 or more.</gray>

95.name: Putrid Explosion
95.description: The corpse nearest your target explodes, sending out a shockwave that deals 24...120 damage to nearby foes.
95.concise: Explodes a corpse, dealing 24...120 damage to foes near it. <gray>Exploits a fresh corpse.</gray>

96.name: Soul Feast
96.description: Exploit nearest corpse to gain 50...280 Health.
96.concise: You gain 50...280 Health. <gray>Exploits a fresh corpse.</gray>

97.name: Necrotic Traversal
97.description: Exploit a random corpse. You teleport to that corpse's location and all nearby foes become Poisoned for 5...20 seconds.
97.concise: Teleport to a corpse's location. Inflicts Poisoned condition (5...20 seconds). Affects all nearby foes. <gray>Exploits a fresh corpse.</gray>

98.name: Consume Corpse
98.description: Exploit a random corpse. You teleport to that corpse's location and gain 25...100 Health and 5...20 Energy.
98.concise: Teleport to a corpse's location. You gain 25...100 Health and 5...20 Energy. <gray>Exploits a fresh corpse.</gray>

99.name: Parasitic Bond
99.description: For 20 seconds, target foe suffers -1 Health degeneration. The caster is healed for 30...120 when Parasitic Bond ends.
99.concise: (20 seconds.) Causes -1 Health degeneration. End effect: you are healed for 30...120 Health.

100.name: Soul Barbs
100.description: For 30 seconds, target foe takes 15...30 damage when an enchantment or hex is cast on that target.
100.concise: (30 seconds.) Deals 15...30 damage when an enchantment or hex is cast on target foe.

101.name: Barbs
101.description: For 30 seconds, target foe takes 1...15 more damage when hit by physical damage.
101.concise: (30 seconds.) Target foe takes 1...15 damage whenever it takes physical damage.

102.name: Shadow Strike
102.description: Target foe takes 12...48 shadow damage. If that foe's Health is above 50%, you steal up to 12...48 Health.
102.concise: Deals 12...48 damage. Steal up to 12...48 Health if this foe was above 50% Health.

103.name: Price of Failure
103.description: For 30 seconds, target foe has a 25% chance to miss with attacks and takes 1...46 damage whenever that foe fails to hit in combat.
103.concise: (30 seconds.) 25% chance to miss. Target foe takes 1...46 damage whenever it fails to hit.

104.name: Death Nova
104.description: For 30 seconds, if target ally dies, all adjacent foes take 26...100 damage and are Poisoned for 15 seconds.
104.concise: (30 seconds.) Deals 26...100 damage and inflicts Poisoned condition (15 seconds) on adjacent foes if target ally dies.

105.name: Deathly Swarm
105.description: Deathly Swarm flies out slowly and strikes for 30...90 cold damage on up to three targets in the area.
105.concise: Deathly Swarm flies out slowly and deals 30...90 cold damage. Hits two additional foes in the area.

106.name: Rotting Flesh
106.description: Target fleshy foe becomes Diseased for 10...25 seconds, slowly losing Health.

107.name: Virulence
107.description: If target foe was already suffering from a condition, that foe suffers from Disease, Poison, and Weakness for 3...15 seconds.
107.concise: Inflicts Disease, Poison, and Weakness conditions (3...15 seconds). <gray>No effect unless this foe already had a condition.</gray>

108.name: Suffering
108.description: For 6...30 seconds, target foe and all nearby foes suffer -0...3 Health degeneration.
108.concise: Also hexes foes near target (6...30 seconds). These foes have -0...3 Health degeneration.

109.name: Life Siphon
109.description: For 12...24 seconds, target foe suffers -1...3 Health degeneration, and you gain +1...3 Health regeneration.
109.concise: (12...24 seconds.) Target foe has -1...3 Health degeneration. You have +1...3 Health regeneration.

110.name: Unholy Feast
110.description: Steal up to 10...65 Health from up to 1...4 foes <sic/> in the area.
110.concise: Steals 10...65 Health from 1...4 foes in the area around you.

111.name: Awaken the Blood
111.description: For 20...44 seconds, you gain +2 Blood Magic and +2 Curses, but whenever you sacrifice Health, you sacrifice 50% more than the normal amount.
111.concise: (20...44 seconds.) You have +2 Blood Magic and Curses. <gray>Sacrifice 50% more Health than normal.</gray>

112.name: Desecrate Enchantments
112.description: Target foe and all nearby foes take 6...60 shadow damage and 4...20 shadow damage for each enchantment on them.
112.concise: Deals 6...60 damage to target and nearby foes. Deals 4...20 more damage for each enchantment on them.

113.name: Tainted Flesh
113.description: For 20...44 seconds, target ally is immune to disease, and anyone striking that ally in melee becomes Diseased for 3...15 seconds.
113.concise: (20...44 seconds.) Foes who hit target ally in melee become Diseased (3...15 seconds); this ally is immune to Disease.

114.name: Aura of the Lich
114.description: All corpses within earshot are exploited and you animate a level 1...17 bone horror plus one for each corpse exploited in this way. For 5...45 seconds, your Death Magic attribute is increased by +1.
114.concise: Exploit all corpses in earshot. Animates a level 1...17 bone horror, plus one for each exploited corpse. You have +1 Death Magic (5...45 seconds).

115.name: Blood Renewal
115.description: For 7 seconds, you gain +3...6 Health regeneration. When Blood Renewal ends, you gain 40...190 Health.
115.concise: (7 seconds.) You have +3...6 Health regeneration. End effect: heals you for 40...190.

116.name: Dark Aura
116.description: For 30 seconds, whenever target ally sacrifices Health, Dark Aura deals 5...50 shadow damage to adjacent foes, and you lose 5...20 Health.
116.concise: (30 seconds). Deals 5...50 damage to adjacent foes whenever target ally sacrifices Health. <gray>Damage cost: you lose 5...20 Health.</gray>

117.name: Enfeeble
117.description: Target suffers from Weakness for 10...30 seconds.

118.name: Enfeebling Blood
118.description: Target foe and all nearby foes suffer from Weakness for 5...20 seconds.
118.concise: Inflicts Weakness condition (5...20 seconds) on this foe and nearby foes.

119.name: Blood is Power
119.description: For 10 seconds, target other ally gains +3...6 Energy regeneration.

120.name: Blood of the Master
120.description: All of your undead allies are healed for 30...116 Health. You sacrifice an additional 2% maximum Health per minion healed in this way.
120.concise: Heals your undead servants for 30...116. <gray>Healing cost: +2% Health sacrifice per servant healed.</gray>

121.name: Spiteful Spirit
121.description: For 8...20 seconds, whenever target foe attacks or uses a skill, Spiteful Spirit deals 5...35 shadow damage to that foe and all adjacent allies of that foe.
121.concise: (8...20 seconds.) Deals 5...35 damage to target and adjacent foes whenever this foe attacks or uses a skill.

122.name: Malign Intervention
122.description: For 5...20 seconds, target foe receives 20% less benefit from healing. If target foe dies while hexed with Malign Intervention, a level 1...17 masterless bone horror is summoned.
122.concise: (5...20 seconds.) Target foe receives 20% less from healing. If this foe dies while suffering from this hex, a level 1...17 masterless bone horror is summoned.

123.name: Insidious Parasite
123.description: For 5...15 seconds, whenever target foe hits with an attack, you steal up to 15...45 Health from that foe.
123.concise: (5...15 seconds.) Steal 15...45 Health whenever target foe hits with an attack.

124.name: Spinal Shivers
124.description: For 10...40 seconds, whenever target foe is struck for cold damage while using a skill, that foe is interrupted, and you lose 10...5 Energy or Spinal Shivers ends.
124.concise: (10...40 seconds.) Cold damage interrupts target foe's skills. <gray>Interruption cost: you lose 10...5 Energy or Spinal Shivers ends.</gray>

125.name: Wither
125.description: For 5...35 seconds, target foe suffers -2...4 Health degeneration and -1 Energy degeneration. If target foe's Energy reaches 0, that foe takes 15...75 damage and Wither ends.
125.concise: (5...35 seconds.) Causes -2...4 Health degeneration and -1 Energy degeneration. Deals 15...75 damage if target foe's Energy drops to 0. <gray>Ends if this foe's Energy drops to 0.</gray>

126.name: Life Transfer
126.description: For 6...12 seconds, target foe and adjacent foes suffer -3...8 Health degeneration, which you gain as Health regeneration.
126.concise: Also hexes foes adjacent to target (6...12 second). Causes -3...8 Health degeneration. You have +3...8 Health regeneration.

127.name: Mark of Subversion
127.description: For 6 seconds, the next time target foe casts a spell that targets an ally of that foe, the spell fails and you steal up to 10...92 Health from that foe.
127.concise: (6 seconds.) Target foe's next spell fails and you steal 10...92 Health. <gray>No effect unless this foe's spell targeted one of its allies.</gray>

128.name: Soul Leech
128.description: For 10 seconds, whenever target foe casts a spell, you steal up to 16...80 Health from that foe.
128.concise: (10 seconds.) Steal 16...80 Health whenever target foe casts a spell.

129.name: Defile Flesh
129.description: For 5...35 seconds, target foe gains only two-thirds Health from healing.
129.concise: (5...35 seconds.) Reduces healing target foe receives by 33%. <gray>Only skills with the word "heal" in the description are affected.</gray>

130.name: Demonic Flesh
130.description: For 30...60 seconds, whenever you use a skill that targets a foe, you deal 5...20 shadow damage to all other foes adjacent to you.
130.concise: (30...60 seconds.) When using a skill on a foe, deal 5...20 shadow damage to all other foes adjacent to you.

131.name: Barbed Signet
131.description: You inflict Bleeding for 3...15 seconds on target foe and all adjacent foes.
131.concise: Target and adjacent foes suffer from Bleeding (3...15 seconds).

132.name: Plague Signet
132.description: Transfer all negative conditions with 100...200% of their remaining durations from yourself to target foe. (50% failure chance with Curses 4 or less.)
132.concise: Transfers all conditions with 100...200% of their remaining durations from yourself to target foe. <gray>50% failure chance unless Curses 5 or more.</gray>

133.name: Dark Pact
133.description: Deal 10...48 shadow damage to target foe.

134.name: Order of Pain
134.description: For 5 seconds, whenever a party member hits a foe with physical damage, that party member does +3...16 damage.
134.concise: Enchants all party members (5 seconds). 3...16 more damage whenever these party members hit with physical damage.

135.name: Faintheartedness
135.description: For the next 3...16 seconds, target foe attacks 50% slower, and that foe suffers -0...3 Health degeneration.
135.concise: (3...16 seconds.) Target foe attacks 50% slower and has -0...3 Health degeneration.

136.name: Shadow of Fear
136.description: Target foe and all adjacent foes attack 50% slower for the next 5...30 seconds.
136.concise: Also hexes foes adjacent to target (5...30 seconds). They attack 50% slower.

137.name: Rigor Mortis
137.description: For 8...20 seconds, target foe cannot block.

138.name: Dark Bond
138.description: For the next 30...60 seconds, whenever you receive damage, your closest minion suffers 75% of that damage for you.
138.concise: (30...60 seconds.) Transfers 75% of incoming damage from you to your nearest servant.

139.name: Infuse Condition
139.description: For the next 15...60 seconds, whenever you receive a condition, that condition is transferred to your closest minion instead.
139.concise: (15...60 seconds.) Whenever you receive a condition, it transfers from you to your closest undead servant.

140.name: Malaise
140.description: For 5...35 seconds, target foe suffers -1 Energy degeneration and you suffer -1 Health degeneration. If target foe's Energy reaches 0, that foe takes 5...50 damage and Malaise ends.
140.concise: (5...35 seconds.) Causes -1 Energy degeneration. Deals 5...50 damage if target foe's Energy drops to 0. <gray>You have -1 Health degeneration. Ends if this foe's Energy drops to 0.</gray>

141.name: Rend Enchantments
141.description: Remove 5...9 enchantments from target foe. For each Monk enchantment removed, you lose 55...25 Health.
141.concise: Removes 5...9 enchantments from target foe. <gray>Removal cost: you lose 55...25 Health for each Monk enchantment removed.</gray>

142.name: Lingering Curse
142.description: For 6...30 seconds, target foe and all nearby foes suffer -0...3 Health degeneration, and gain 20% less benefit from healing.
142.concise: (6...30 seconds.) Target and nearby foes have -0...3 Health degeneration and receive 20% less benefit from healing.

143.name: Strip Enchantment
143.description: Remove 0...2 enchantments from target foe. If an enchantment is removed, you steal 5...65 Health.
143.concise: Removes 0...2 enchantments from target foe. Removal effect: you steal 5...65 Health.

144.name: Chilblains
144.description: You become Poisoned for 10 seconds. Foes in the area of your target are struck for 10...44 cold damage and lose 1...2 enchantments.
144.concise: Deals 10...44 cold damage to foes in the area around your target; removes 1...2 enchantments from these foes. <gray>You are Poisoned (10 seconds).</gray>

145.name: Signet of Agony
145.description: You suffer from Bleeding for 25 seconds. All nearby foes take 10...70 damage.
145.concise: Deals 10...70 damage to foes near you. <gray>You begin Bleeding (25 seconds).</gray>

147.name: Dark Fury
147.description: For 5 seconds, whenever any party member hits with an attack, that party member gains one hit of adrenaline. (50% failure chance with Blood Magic of 4 or less.)
147.concise: Enchants party members (5 seconds). These party members gain one strike of adrenaline each time they hit with an attack. <gray>50% failure chance unless Blood Magic 5 or more.</gray>

148.name: Order of the Vampire
148.description: For 5 seconds, whenever a party member who is not under the effects of another Necromancer enchantment hits a foe with physical damage, that party member steals up to 3...16 Health.
148.concise: Enchants all party members (5 seconds.) These party members steal 3...16 Health with each physical damage attack. <gray>Party members under another Necromancer enchantment are not affected.</gray>

149.name: Plague Sending
149.description: Transfer 1...3 negative conditions and its/their remaining durations from yourself to target foe and all adjacent foes.
149.concise: Transfer 1...3 conditions and its/their remaining durations from yourself to target foe and all adjacent foes.

150.name: Mark of Pain
150.description: For 30 seconds, whenever target foe takes physical damage, Mark of Pain deals 10...40 shadow damage to adjacent foes.
150.concise: (30 seconds.) Deals 10...40 damage to adjacent foes whenever target foe takes physical damage.

151.name: Feast of Corruption
151.description: Target foe and all adjacent foes are struck for 16...80 shadow damage. You steal up to 8...40 Health from each struck foe who is suffering from a hex.
151.concise: Deals 16...80 damage to target and adjacent foes. Steal 8...40 Health from each hexed foe.

152.name: Taste of Death
152.description: Steal up to 100...400 Health from target animated undead ally.
152.concise: Steals 100...400 Health from allied undead servant.

153.name: Vampiric Gaze
153.description: Steal up to 18...60 Health from target foe.

154.name: Plague Touch
154.description: Transfer 1...3 negative conditions and its/their remaining durations from yourself to target touched foe.
154.concise: Transfers 1...3 conditions from yourself to target foe.

155.name: Vile Touch
155.description: Touch target foe to deal 20...65 damage.

156.name: Vampiric Touch
156.description: Touch target foe to steal up to 29...74 Health.

157.name: Blood Ritual
157.description: For 8...14 seconds, target touched ally gains +3 Energy regeneration. Blood Ritual cannot be used on the caster.

158.name: Touch of Agony
158.description: Target touched foe takes 20...58 shadow damage.

159.name: Weaken Armor
159.description: Target foe and foes adjacent to your target have Cracked Armor for 5...20 seconds.
159.concise: Also affects adjacent foes. Inflicts Cracked Armor condition (5...20 seconds).

160.name: Windborne Speed
160.description: For 5...13 seconds, target ally moves 33% faster.

162.name: Gale
162.description: Knock down target foe for 2 seconds. (50% failure chance with Air Magic 4 or less.)
162.concise: Causes knock-down. <gray>50% failure chance unless Air Magic 5 or more.</gray>

163.name: Whirlwind
163.description: All adjacent foes take 15...75 cold damage. Attacking foes struck by Whirlwind are knocked down. If you are Overcast, this spell strikes nearby instead of adjacent.
163.concise: Hits foes adjacent to you. Deals 15...75 cold damage. Causes knock-down to attacking foes. Strikes nearby instead of adjacent if Overcast.

164.name: Elemental Attunement
164.description: For 25...60 seconds, you are attuned to Air, Fire, Water, and Earth and gain +1...2 to these attributes. You gain 50% of the base Energy cost of the skill each time you use magic associated with any of these elements.
164.concise: (25...60 seconds.) Your elemental attributes are increased by +1...2. You gain 50% of the Energy cost of any Air, Earth, Fire, and Water Magic skills you use.

165.name: Armor of Earth
165.description: For 30 seconds, you gain 24...60 armor, but move 50...14% slower.
165.concise: (30 seconds.) You have +24...60 armor. You move 50...14% slower.

166.name: Kinetic Armor
166.description: For 8 seconds, you gain +20...80 armor. Whenever you cast a spell, Kinetic Armor is renewed for 8 seconds.
166.concise: (8 seconds.) You have +20...80 armor. Renewal bonus: cast a spell.

167.name: Eruption
167.description: Cause an Eruption at target foe's location. Each second for 5 seconds, foes near this location are struck for 10...40 earth damage and are Blinded for 10 seconds.
167.concise: Deals 10...40 earth damage each second (5 seconds). Hits foes near target's initial location. Inflicts Blindness condition (10 seconds).

168.name: Magnetic Aura
168.description: For 1...5 seconds, you block the next attack against you and deal 10...50 damage to your attacker. If you are Overcast, all party members in earshot are also enchanted.
168.concise: (1...5 seconds.) Block the next attack against you and reflect 10...50 damage to the attacker. If you are Overcast, enchant party members in earshot.

169.name: Earth Attunement
169.description: For 36...60 seconds, you are attuned to Earth. You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the base Energy cost of the skill each time you use Earth Magic.
169.concise: (36...60 seconds.) You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the Energy cost when you use an Earth Magic skill.

170.name: Earthquake
170.description: You invoke an Earthquake at target foe's location. All foes near this location are knocked down and are struck for 26...100 earth damage.
170.concise: Deals 26...100 earth damage. Also hits foes near target. Causes knock-down.

171.name: Stoning
171.description: Send out a large stone, striking target foe for 45...105 earth damage if it hits. If Stoning hits a foe suffering from Weakness, that foe is knocked down.
171.concise: Projectile: deals 45...105 earth damage. Causes knock-down if target foe is Weakened.

172.name: Stone Daggers
172.description: Send out two Stone Daggers. Each Stone Dagger strikes target foe for 8...33 earth damage if it hits. If you are Overcast, each projectile inflicts Bleeding for 1...5 seconds.
172.concise: Two projectiles: each deals 8...33 earth damage. If Overcast, cause Bleeding for 1...5 seconds.

173.name: Grasping Earth
173.description: For 5...20 seconds, all nearby foes move 50% slower.
173.concise: Hexes foes near you for (5...20 seconds). These foes move 50% slower.

174.name: Aftershock
174.description: Nearby foes are struck for 26...100 earth damage. Knocked down foes are struck for 10...68 additional earth damage.
174.concise: Deals 26...100 earth damage to nearby foes. Deals 10...68 more earth damage to knocked down foes.

175.name: Ward Against Elements
175.description: You create a Ward Against Elements at your current location. For 8...20 seconds, non-spirit allies in this area gain +24 armor against elemental damage.
175.concise: (8...20 seconds.) Allies in this ward have +24 armor against elemental damage. <gray>Spirits are unaffected.</gray>

176.name: Ward Against Melee
176.description: You create a Ward Against Melee at your current location. For 5...20 seconds, non-spirit allies in this area have a 50% chance to block melee attacks.
176.concise: (5...20 seconds.) Allies in this ward have a 50% chance to block melee attacks. <gray>Allied spirits are not affected.</gray>

177.name: Ward Against Foes
177.description: You create a Ward Against Foes at your current location. For 8...20 seconds, non-spirit foes in this area move 50% slower.
177.concise: (8...20 seconds.) Foes in this ward move 50% slower.

178.name: Ether Prodigy
178.description: Lose all enchantments. For 8...20 seconds, you gain +6 Energy regeneration. When Ether Prodigy ends, you lose 2 Health for each point of Energy you have.
178.concise: (8...20 seconds.) You have +6 Energy regeneration. End effect: lose 2 Health for each point of Energy you have. <gray>Lose all enchantments.</gray>

179.name: Incendiary Bonds
179.description: After 3 seconds, target foe and all nearby foes are struck for 20...80 fire damage and are set on fire for 1...3 seconds. Activates early if target foe dies.
179.concise: (3 seconds.) End effect: deals 20...80 fire damage and inflicts Burning condition (1...3 seconds) to foes near your target. Also triggers if foe dies.

180.name: Aura of Restoration
180.description: For 60 seconds, you gain 0...1 Energy and are healed for 200...500% of the Energy cost each time you cast a spell.
180.concise: (60 seconds.) You gain 0...1 Energy and are healed for 200...500% of the Energy cost each time you cast a spell.

181.name: Ether Renewal
181.description: For 5...20 seconds, each time you cast a spell, you gain 1...4 Energy and 5...20 Health for each enchantment on you.
181.concise: (5...20 seconds.) Each time you cast a spell, you gain 1...4 Energy and 5...20 Health for each enchantment on you.

182.name: Conjure Flame
182.description: For 60 seconds, if you're wielding a fire weapon, your attacks strike for an additional 5...20 fire damage.
182.concise: (60 seconds.) Your attacks hit for +5...20 fire damage. <gray>No effect unless your weapon deals fire damage.</gray>

183.name: Inferno
183.description: All adjacent foes are struck for 30...135 fire damage.
183.concise: Deals 30...135 fire damage to foes adjacent to you.

184.name: Fire Attunement
184.description: For 36...60 seconds, you are attuned to Fire. You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the base Energy cost of the skill each time you use Fire Magic.
184.concise: (36...60 seconds.) You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the Energy cost when you use a Fire Magic skill.

185.name: Mind Burn
185.description: Target foe and all adjacent foes take 15...60 fire damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, that foe and all adjacent foes take an additional 15...60 fire damage and are set on fire for 1...10 seconds.
185.concise: Deals 15...60 fire damage. If you have more energy than target foe, deals 15...60 more fire damage and inflicts Burning (1...10 seconds). Also hits adjacent foes.

186.name: Fireball
186.description: Send out a ball of fire that strikes target foe and all adjacent foes for 7...112 fire damage.
186.concise: Projectile: deals 7...112 fire damage to target and adjacent foes.

187.name: Meteor
187.description: Target foe and all adjacent foes are struck for 7...112 fire damage and knocked down.
187.concise: Deals 7...112 fire damage and causes knock-down. Also hits foes adjacent to target foe.

188.name: Flame Burst
188.description: All nearby foes are struck for 15...120 fire damage.
188.concise: Deals 15...120 fire damage to all foes near you.

189.name: Rodgort's Invocation
189.description: Target foe and all nearby foes are struck for 15...120 fire damage and set on fire for 1...3 seconds.
189.concise: Deals 15...120 fire damage. Also affects foes near your target. Inflicts Burning condition (1...3 seconds).

190.name: Mark of Rodgort
190.description: Target foe and all nearby foes are hexed with Mark of Rodgort. For 10...35 seconds, whenever each foe is struck for fire damage, that foe is set on fire for 1...4 seconds.
190.concise: Also hexes foes near your target (10...35 seconds). Inflicts Burning condition (1...4 seconds) when these foes take fire damage.

191.name: Immolate
191.description: Target foe is struck for 20...75 fire damage and is set on fire for 1...3 seconds.
191.concise: Deals 20...75 fire damage. Inflicts Burning condition (1...3 seconds).

192.name: Meteor Shower
192.description: Create a Meteor Shower at target foe's location. For 9 seconds, foes adjacent to that location are struck for 7...112 fire damage and knocked down every 3 seconds.
192.concise: Deals 7...112 fire damage and causes knock-down every 3 seconds (9 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to target's initial location.

193.name: Phoenix
193.description: A fiery Phoenix rises at your location and flies out to your target, exploding on impact. This explosion strikes your target and nearby foes for 10...60 fire damage. If you are Overcast, allies in the blast radius are healed for 20...80 Health.
193.concise: Projectile: deals 10...60 fire damage to target and nearby foes. Heals allies for 20...80 if you are Overcast.

194.name: Flare
194.description: Send out a flare that strikes target foe for 20...65 fire damage if it hits. If you are Overcast, Flare hits adjacent foes as well.
194.concise: Projectile: deals 20...65 fire damage. If Overcast, strikes adjacent.

195.name: Lava Font
195.description: For 5 seconds, foes adjacent to the location where this spell was cast are struck for 5...50 fire damage each second. If you are Overcast, this spell strikes nearby foes instead of adjacent ones.
195.concise: Deals 5...50 fire damage each second (5 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to your initial location. If Overcast, range increased to nearby.

196.name: Searing Heat
196.description: Cause Searing Heat at target foe's location. For 5 seconds, foes near this location are struck for 10...40 fire damage each second. When Searing Heat ends, foes in the area of effect are set on fire for 3 seconds.
196.concise: Deals 10...40 fire damage each second (5 seconds). Hits foes near target's initial location. End effect: inflicts Burning condition (3 seconds).

197.name: Fire Storm
197.description: Create a Fire Storm at target foe's location. For 10 seconds, foes adjacent to that location are struck for 5...35 fire damage each second.
197.concise: Deals 5...35 fire damage each second (10 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to target's initial location.

198.name: Glyph of Elemental Power
198.description: For 25 seconds, your elemental attributes are boosted by 2 for your next 10 spells.
198.concise: (25 seconds.) Boosts your elemental attributes by +2 for your next 10 spells.

199.name: Glyph of Energy
199.description: Your next 1...3 spells does not cause Overcast and costs 10...25 less Energy to cast. Your elemental attributes are increased by 1...2.
199.concise: Your next 1...3 spells does not cause Overcast and costs 10...25 less Energy. Gain 1...2 to all elemental attributes.

200.name: Glyph of Lesser Energy
200.description: For the next 15 seconds, your next 2 spells cost 10...18 less Energy to cast.
200.concise: (15 seconds.) Your next 2 spells cost 10...18 less Energy.

201.name: Glyph of Concentration
201.description: For 15 seconds, your next 1 spell cannot be interrupted and ignores the effects of being Dazed.
201.concise: (15 seconds.) Your next 1 spell cannot be interrupted and is unaffected by the Dazed condition.

202.name: Glyph of Sacrifice
202.description: For 15 seconds, your next spell casts instantly, but it takes an additional 30 seconds to recharge. Ends prematurely if you use a non-spell skill.
202.concise: (15 seconds.) Your next spell casts instantly but takes an additional 30 seconds to recharge. <gray>Ends if you use a non-spell skill.</gray>

203.name: Glyph of Renewal
203.description: For 15 seconds, your next spell instantly recharges.
203.concise: (15 seconds.) Your next spell recharges instantly.

204.name: Rust
204.description: Deals 10...70 cold damage to target and adjacent foes. For 5...20 seconds, target foe and all adjacent foes take twice as long to activate signets. If you are Overcast, foes struck with Rust have their signets interrupted and disabled for 1...10 seconds.
204.concise: Deals 10...70 cold damage to target and adjacent foes. Hexes target and adjacent foes (5...20 seconds). Doubles signet activation time. Interrupts and disables signets for 1...10 seconds if you are Overcast.

205.name: Lightning Surge
205.description: After 3 seconds, target foe is knocked down and struck for 14...100 lightning damage, and has Cracked Armor for 5...20 seconds. This spell has 25% armor penetration.
205.concise: (3 seconds.) End effect: deals 14...100 lightning damage, causes knock-down, and inflicts Cracked Armor (5...20 seconds). 25% armor penetration.

206.name: Armor of Frost
206.description: For 10...34 seconds, you gain +40 armor against physical damage and have +1 Water Magic.
206.concise: (10...34 seconds.) You have +40 armor against physical damage and have +1 Water Magic.

207.name: Conjure Frost
207.description: For 60 seconds, if you're wielding a cold weapon, your attacks strike for an additional 5...20 cold damage.
207.concise: (60 seconds.) Your attacks hit for +5...20 cold damage. <gray>No effect unless your weapon deals cold damage.</gray>

208.name: Water Attunement
208.description: For 36...60 seconds, you are attuned to Water. You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the base Energy cost of the skill each time you use Water Magic.
208.concise: (36...60 seconds.) You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the Energy cost when you use a Water Magic skill.

209.name: Mind Freeze
209.description: Target foe takes 10...60 cold damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, that foe suffers an additional 10...60 cold damage and moves 90% slower for 1...5 seconds.
209.concise: Deals 10...60 cold damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, deals +10...60 cold damage and causes 90% slower movement (1...5 seconds).

210.name: Ice Prison
210.description: For 8...20 seconds, target foe's legs are encased in ice, causing the foe to move 66% slower.

211.name: Ice Spikes
211.description: Target and adjacent foes are struck for 20...80 cold damage and move 66% slower for 2...6 seconds.
211.concise: Also hexes foes adjacent to target (2...6 seconds). These foes move 66% slower. Initial effect: deals 20...80 cold damage.

212.name: Frozen Burst
212.description: All nearby foes are struck for 10...85 cold damage and move 66% slower for 3...8 seconds.
212.concise: Hexes foes near you. These foes move 66% slower (3...8 seconds). Initial effect: deals 10...85 cold damage to foes near you.

213.name: Shard Storm
213.description: Send out an ice shard that strikes target foe for 10...85 cold damage if it hits and causing target foe to move 66% slower for 2...6 seconds.
213.concise: Projectile: deals 10...85 cold damage. Target foe moves 66% slower (2...6 seconds).

214.name: Ice Spear
214.description: Send out an Ice Spear, striking target foe for 10...60 cold damage if it hits. If you are Overcast, you gain +1...4 Health regeneration for 5 seconds.
214.concise: Projectile: deals 10...60 cold damage. Gain +1...4 Health regeneration for 5 seconds if Overcast.

215.name: Maelstrom
215.description: Create a Maelstrom at target foe's location. For 10 seconds, foes adjacent to that area are struck for 10...25 cold damage each second. Maelstrom interrupts spell-casting when it hits.
215.concise: Deals 10...25 cold damage and interrupts spells each second (10 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to target's initial location.

216.name: Iron Mist
216.description: For 8...15 seconds, you have +15 armor. Your Air Magic spells that target a foe activate and recharge 25% faster, but you are Overcast by 3 points.
216.concise: (8...15 seconds.) Gain +15 armor. Air Magic spells that target a foe activate and recharge 25% faster, but you are Overcast by 3 points.

217.name: Crystal Wave
217.description: Foes adjacent to you are struck for 10...70 damage but are cured of any negative conditions. Each condition removed deals 5...15 damage.
217.concise: Deals 10...70 damage to all foes adjacent to you. Those foes lose all conditions and take 5...15 damage for each condition removed.

218.name: Obsidian Flesh
218.description: For 8...20 seconds, you gain +20 armor and cannot be the target of enemy spells, but cannot attack and have -2 energy degeneration.
218.concise: (8...20 seconds.) You have +20 armor and enemy spells cannot target you. <gray>You cannot attack and have -2 energy degeneration.</gray>

219.name: Obsidian Flame
219.description: Deal 22...112 damage to target foe. This spell ignores armor.

220.name: Blinding Flash
220.description: Target foe is Blinded for 3...8 seconds.

221.name: Conjure Lightning
221.description: For 60 seconds, if you're wielding a lightning weapon, your attacks strike for an additional 5...20 lightning damage.
221.concise: (60 seconds.) Your attacks hit for +5...20 lightning damage. <gray>No effect unless your weapon deals lightning damage.</gray>

222.name: Lightning Strike
222.description: Strike target foe for 5...50 lightning damage. This spell has 25% armor penetration. If you are Overcast, that foe is hexed with Lightning Strike for 3 seconds. When this hex ends, that foe is struck again for 5...50 lightning damage.
222.concise: Deals 5...50 lightning damage. 25% armor penetration. Hex for 3 seconds if Overcast. End effect: deals 5...50 lightning damage.

223.name: Chain Lightning
223.description: Target foe and up to two other foes near your target are struck for 10...85 lightning damage. This spell has 25% armor penetration.
223.concise: Deals 10...85 lightning damage. Also hits two foes near your target. 25% armor penetration.

224.name: Enervating Charge
224.description: Target foe is struck for 25...50 lightning damage and suffers from Weakness for 5...20 seconds. This spell has 25% armor penetration.
224.concise: Deals 25...50 lightning damage. Inflicts Weakness condition (5...20 seconds). 25% armor penetration.

225.name: Air Attunement
225.description: For 36...60 seconds, you are attuned to Air. You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the base Energy cost of the skill whenever you use Air Magic.
225.concise: (36...60 seconds.) You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the Energy cost whenever you use an Air Magic skill.

226.name: Mind Shock
226.description: Target foe suffers 10...50 lightning damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, that foe suffers 10...50 more lightning damage and is knocked down. This spell has 25% armor penetration.
226.concise: Deals 10...50 lightning damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, deals +10...50 lightning damage and causes knockdown. 25% armor penetration.

227.name: Glimmering Mark
227.description: For 10 seconds, target foe and all foes adjacent to your target take 5...25 damage each second. Foes using attack skills are Blinded for 3 seconds. This hex ends if you use a skill that targets this foe.
227.concise: (10 seconds.) Deals 5...25 damage each second to target and adjacent foes. Inflicts Blindness <sic/> on foes using attack skills. <gray>Ends if you use a skill that targets this foe.</gray>

228.name: Thunderclap
228.description: Create a massive shockwave at target foe's location. Deals 10...50 lightning damage to target and all adjacent foes. Struck foes are interrupted and suffer from Cracked Armor and Weakness for 5...20 seconds. This spell has 25% armor penetration.
228.concise: Deals 10...50 lightning damage. Also strikes adjacent foes. Inflicts Cracked Armor and Weakness (5...20 seconds). Causes interrupt. 25% armor penetration.

229.name: Lightning Orb
229.description: Send out a Lightning Orb that strikes target foe for 10...100 lightning damage. This spell has 25% armor penetration.
229.concise: Projectile: deals 10...100 lightning damage. 25% armor penetration.

230.name: Lightning Javelin
230.description: Send out a Lightning Javelin that strikes for 15...50 lightning damage if it hits. Lightning Javelin interrupts attacking foes. This spell has 25% armor penetration and strikes all foes between you and your target.
230.concise: Projectile: Deals 15...50 lightning damage. Interrupts if your target is attacking. 25% armor penetration. Strikes all foes between you and your target.

231.name: Shock
231.description: Target touched foe is knocked down and struck for 10...60 lightning damage. This skill has 25% armor penetration.
231.concise: Deals 10...60 lightning damage. Causes knock-down. 25% armor penetration.

232.name: Lightning Touch
232.description: Target touched foe and all adjacent foes are struck for 10...60 lightning damage, are Blinded for 1...4 seconds, and have Cracked Armor for 1...10 seconds. This skill has 25% armor penetration.
232.concise: Deals 10...60 lightning damage. Also hits foes adjacent to target foe. Inflicts Blind (1...4 seconds) and Cracked Armor (1...10 seconds) on all struck foes. 25% armor penetration.

233.name: Swirling Aura
233.description: For 5 seconds, you are enchanted with Swirling Aura and have 1...6 Health regeneration and a 50% chance to block projectiles. If you are Overcast when you cast this spell, all party members in earshot are also enchanted.
233.concise: (5 seconds.) Gives 1...6 Health regeneration and a 50% chance to block projectiles. If Overcast, also enchants party members in earshot.

234.name: Deep Freeze
234.description: You cause a Deep Freeze at target foe's location. All foes in this area are struck for 10...85 cold damage, and for 10 seconds, they move 66% slower.
234.concise: Also hexes foes in the area of your target (10 seconds). These foes move 66% slower. Initial effect: deals 10...85 cold damage.

235.name: Blurred Vision
235.description: For 4...10 seconds, target foe and adjacent foes are hexed with Blurred Vision. While hexed, those foes have a 50% chance to miss with attacks.
235.concise: Also hexes foes adjacent to target (4...10 seconds). They have 50% chance to miss.

236.name: Mist Form
236.description: For 10...45 seconds, you take 33% less damage from foes under the effects of Water Magic hexes. Whenever you cast an elemental spell, all non-spirit allies in earshot are healed for 50...250% of the Energy cost of the spell.
236.concise: (10...45 seconds.) Take 33% less damage from foes hexed with Water Magic. Heals non-spirit allies in earshot for 50...250% of the energy cost of your elemental spells.

237.name: Water Trident
237.description: Send out a fast-moving Water Trident, striking target foe and up to 2 adjacent foes for 10...90 cold damage if it hits. If it hits a moving foe, that foe is knocked down.
237.concise: Fast Projectile: deals 10...90 cold damage and knocks-down moving foes. Shoots 2 additional projectiles at adjacent foes.

238.name: Armor of Mist
238.description: For 8...20 seconds, you gain +10...40 armor and move 33% faster.
238.concise: (8...20 seconds.) You have +10...40 armor and move 33% faster.

239.name: Ward Against Harm
239.description: Create a Ward Against Harm at this location. For 5...15 seconds, non-spirit allies in this area have +1...3 health regeneration, +12...24 armor, and an additional +12...24 armor against elemental damage. This spell is disabled for 20 seconds.
239.concise: (5...15 seconds.) Allies in this ward have +1...3 Health regeneration, +12...24 armor, and +12...24 additional armor against elemental damage. <gray>Spirits are unaffected. This spell is disabled for 20 seconds.</gray>

240.name: Smite
240.description: This attack <sic/> deals 10...55 Holy <sic/> damage. If attacking, your target takes an additional 10...35 Holy <sic/> damage.
240.concise: Deals 10...55 holy damage. Deals 10...35 more holy damage if target is attacking.

241.name: Life Bond
241.description: While you maintain this enchantment, whenever target other ally takes damage from an attack, half the damage is redirected to you. The damage you receive this way is reduced by 3...30.
241.concise: Half of the damage target ally takes from attacks is redirected to you. Redirected damage is reduced by 3...30. <gray>Cannot self-target.</gray>

242.name: Balthazar's Spirit
242.description: While you maintain this enchantment, target ally gains adrenaline and 1 Energy after taking damage. (The amount of adrenaline gained increases depending on your rank in Smiting Prayers.)
242.concise: Target ally gains adrenaline and 1 Energy when taking damage.

243.name: Strength of Honor
243.description: While you maintain this enchantment, target ally deals 5...25 more damage in melee.
243.concise: Target ally deals 5...25 more damage in melee.

244.name: Life Attunement
244.description: While you maintain this enchantment, target ally deals 30% less damage with attacks, but gains 14...50% more Health when healed.
244.concise: Target ally gains 14...50% more Health when healed. <gray>This ally deals 30% less damage with attacks.</gray>

245.name: Protective Spirit
245.description: For 5...23 seconds, target ally cannot lose more than 10% max Health due to damage from a single attack or spell.
245.concise: (5...23 seconds.) Incoming damage is reduced to 10% of target ally's maximum Health.

246.name: Divine Intervention
246.description: For 10 seconds, the next time target ally receives damage that would be fatal, the damage is negated and that ally is healed for 26...240 Health.
246.concise: (10 seconds.) Negates the next fatal damage target ally takes. Negation effect: heals for 26...240.

247.name: Symbol of Wrath
247.description: For 5 seconds, foes adjacent to the location in which the spell was cast take 8...32 holy damage each second.
247.concise: Deals 8...32 holy damage each second (5 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to your initial location.

248.name: Retribution
248.description: While you maintain this enchantment, whenever target ally takes attack damage, this spell deals 33% of the damage back to the source (maximum 5...20 damage).
248.concise: Deals 33% of each attack's damage (maximum 5...20) back to the source.

249.name: Holy Wrath
249.description: For 10...30 seconds, the next 1...10 times target other ally takes attack damage, this spell deals 66% of the damage back to the source (maximum of 5...50 damage).
249.concise: (10...30 seconds). Deals 66% of each attack's damage (maximum 5...50) back to source. <gray>Ends after dealing damage 1...10 times. Cannot self-target.</gray>

250.name: Essence Bond
250.description: While you maintain this enchantment, whenever target ally takes physical or elemental damage, you gain 1 Energy.
250.concise: You gain 1 Energy whenever target ally takes physical or elemental damage.

251.name: Scourge Healing
251.description: For 30 seconds, every time target foe is healed, the healer takes 15...80 holy damage.
251.concise: (30 seconds.) Whenever target foe is healed, the healer takes 15...80 holy damage.

252.name: Banish
252.description: Target foe takes 20...56 holy damage. This spell does double damage to summoned creatures.
252.concise: Deals 20...56 holy damage. Deals double damage to summoned creatures.

253.name: Scourge Sacrifice
253.description: For 8...20 seconds, every time target foe and adjacent foes sacrifice life, they sacrifice twice the normal amount.
253.concise: Also hexes foes adjacent to target (8...20 seconds). Doubles Health sacrifice.

254.name: Vigorous Spirit
254.description: For 30 seconds, each time target ally attacks or casts a spell, that ally is healed for 5...20 Health.
254.concise: (30 seconds.) Heals for 5...20 each time target ally attacks or casts a spell.

255.name: Watchful Spirit
255.description: While you maintain this enchantment, target ally gains +2 Health regeneration. That ally is healed for 30...180 Health when Watchful Spirit ends.
255.concise: +2 Health regeneration. End effect: heals for 30...180.

256.name: Blessed Aura
256.description: While you maintain this enchantment, Monk enchantments you cast last 10...35% longer.
256.concise: Monk enchantments you cast last 10...35% longer.

257.name: Aegis
257.description: For 5...11 seconds, all party members within earshot have a 50% chance to block attacks.
257.concise: Enchants all party members within earshot (5...11 seconds). 50% chance to block.

258.name: Guardian
258.description: For 2...7 seconds, target ally has a 50% chance to block attacks.

259.name: Shield of Deflection
259.description: For 3...10 seconds, target ally has a 75% chance to block attacks and gains 15...30 armor.

260.name: Aura of Faith
260.description: For 3 seconds, target ally gains 50...100% more Health when healed and takes 5...50% less damage.
260.concise: (3 seconds.) Target ally gains 50...100% more Health when healed and takes 5...50% less damage.

261.name: Shield of Regeneration
261.description: For 5...13 seconds, target ally gains +3...10 Health regeneration and 40 armor.

262.name: Shield of Judgment
262.description: For 8...20 seconds, anyone striking target ally with an attack is knocked down and suffers 5...50 holy damage.
262.concise: (8...20 seconds.) Deals 5...50 holy damage to foes attacking <sic/> target ally. Causes knock-down.

263.name: Protective Bond
263.description: While you maintain this enchantment, target ally cannot lose more than 5% max Health due to damage from a single attack or spell. When Protective Bond prevents damage, you lose 6...3 Energy or the spell ends.
263.concise: Target ally cannot lose more than 5% max Health from a single attack or spell. <gray>Each time damage is reduced you lose 6...3 Energy or this spell ends.</gray>

264.name: Pacifism
264.description: For 8...20 seconds, target foe cannot attack. This effect ends if the target takes damage.
264.concise: (8...20 seconds.) Target foe cannot attack. <gray>Ends if this foe takes damage.</gray>

265.name: Amity
265.description: For 8...20 seconds, adjacent foes cannot attack. For each foe, Amity ends if that foe takes damage.
265.concise: (8...20 seconds.) Foes adjacent to you cannot attack. <gray>Ends on any foes that take damage.</gray>

266.name: Peace and Harmony
266.description: Target ally loses 0...9 conditions and hexes. For 1...3 seconds, conditions and hexes expire 90% faster on that ally. All your Smiting Prayers are disabled for 20 seconds.
266.concise: Target ally loses 0...9 conditions and hexes. Conditions and hexes expire 90% faster on that ally (1...3 seconds). <gray>Disables your Smiting Prayers (20 seconds).</gray>

267.name: Judge's Insight
267.description: For 8...20 seconds, target ally's attacks deal holy damage and have +20% armor penetration.
267.concise: (8...20 seconds.) Converts target ally's attacks to holy damage and adds +20% armor penetration.

268.name: Unyielding Aura
268.description: While you maintain this enchantment, your Monk spells heal for +15...60% more Health. When this enchantment ends one random other party member is resurrected with full Health and Energy and teleported to your location.
268.concise: Your Monk spells heal for +15...60%. End effect: a random other party member is resurrected with full Health and Energy and teleported to your location.

269.name: Mark of Protection
269.description: For 10 seconds, whenever target ally would take damage, that ally is healed for that amount instead, maximum 6...60. All your Protection Prayers are disabled for 5 seconds.
269.concise: (10 seconds.) Converts incoming damage to healing (maximum 6...60). <gray>All your Protection Prayers are disabled (5 seconds).</gray>

270.name: Life Barrier
270.description: While you maintain this enchantment, damage dealt to target other ally is reduced by 20...50%. If your Health is below 50% when that ally takes damage, Life Barrier ends.
270.concise: Reduces damage by 20...50%. <gray>Cannot self-target. If your Health is below 50% when target takes damage, Life Barrier ends.</gray>

271.name: Zealot's Fire
271.description: For 60 seconds, whenever you use a skill that targets an ally, all foes adjacent to that target are struck for 5...35 fire damage and you lose 1 Energy.
271.concise: (60 seconds.) Whenever you use a skill on an ally, all foes adjacent to that ally are hit for 5...35 fire damage. <gray>Damage cost: you lose 1 Energy.</gray>

272.name: Balthazar's Aura
272.description: For 8 seconds, foes adjacent to target ally take 10...25 holy damage each second.
272.concise: (8 seconds.) Deals 10...25 holy damage each second to foes adjacent to target ally.

273.name: Spell Breaker
273.description: For 5...17 seconds, target ally cannot be the target of enemy spells.
273.concise: (5...17 seconds.) Target ally cannot be the target of enemy spells.

274.name: Healing Seed
274.description: For 10 seconds, whenever target other ally takes damage, that ally and all adjacent allies gain 3...30 Health.
274.concise: (10 seconds.) Target and adjacent allies gain 3...30 Health whenever this ally takes damage. <gray>Cannot self-target.</gray>

275.name: Mend Condition
275.description: Remove one condition (Poison, Disease, Blindness, Dazed, Bleeding, Crippled, Burning, Weakness, Cracked Armor, or Deep Wound) from target other ally. If a condition is removed, that ally is healed for 5...70 Health.
275.concise: Removes one condition. Removal effect: heals for 5...70. <gray>Cannot self-target.</gray>

276.name: Restore Condition
276.description: Remove all conditions (Poison, Disease, Blindness, Dazed, Bleeding, Crippled, Burning, Weakness, Cracked Armor, and Deep Wound) from target other ally. For each condition removed, that ally is healed for 10...70 Health.
276.concise: Removes all conditions. Removal effect: heals for 10...70 for each condition removed. <gray>Cannot self-target.</gray>

277.name: Mend Ailment
277.description: Remove one condition (Poison, Disease, Blindness, Dazed, Bleeding, Crippled, Burning, Weakness, Cracked Armor, or Deep Wound) from target ally. For each remaining Condition, that ally is healed for 5...70 Health.
277.concise: Removes a condition. Removal effect: heals for 5...70 for each remaining condition.

278.name: Purge Conditions
278.description: Remove all conditions (Poison, Disease, Blindness, Dazed, Bleeding, Crippled, Burning, Weakness, Cracked Armor, and Deep Wound) from target ally.

279.name: Divine Healing
279.description: Heals you and party members within earshot for 15...60 points.
279.concise: Heals you and party members within earshot for 15...60.

280.name: Heal Area
280.description: Heal yourself and all adjacent creatures for 30...180 points.
280.concise: Heals you and adjacent allies and foes for 30...180.

282.name: Word of Healing
282.description: Heal target ally for 5...100 Health. Heal for an additional 30...115 Health if that ally is below 50% Health.
282.concise: Heals for 5...100. Heals for 30...115 more if target ally is below 50% Health.

283.name: Dwayna's Kiss
283.description: Heal target other ally for 15...60 Health and an additional 10...35 Health for each enchantment or hex on that ally.
283.concise: Heals for 15...60. Heals for 10...35 more for each enchantment and hex on target ally. <gray>Cannot self-target.</gray>

284.name: Divine Boon
284.description: While you maintain this enchantment, whenever you cast a Protection Prayer <sic/> or Divine Favor spell that targets an ally, that ally is healed for 15...60 Health, and you lose 1 Energy.
284.concise: Whenever you cast a Protection Prayer <sic/> or Divine Favor spell on an ally, that ally is healed for 15...60. <gray>Heal cost: you lose 1 Energy.</gray>

285.name: Healing Hands
285.description: For 10 seconds, whenever target ally takes damage, that ally is healed for 5...35 Health.
285.concise: (10 seconds.) Heals for 5...35 whenever target takes damage.

286.name: Heal Other
286.description: Heal target other ally for 35...180 Health.

288.name: Healing Breeze
288.description: For 15 seconds, target ally gains +4...9 Health regeneration.

289.name: Vital Blessing
289.description: While you maintain this enchantment, target ally has +40...200 maximum Health.

290.name: Mending
290.description: While you maintain this enchantment, target ally gains +1...4 Health regeneration.

291.name: Live Vicariously
291.description: While you maintain this enchantment, whenever target ally hits a foe, you gain 2...17 Health.
291.concise: You gain 2...17 Health whenever target ally hits a foe.

292.name: Infuse Health
292.description: Lose half your current Health. Target other ally is healed for 100...136% of the amount you lost.
292.concise: Heals for 100...136% of half your current Health. <gray>Lose half your current Health. Cannot self-target.</gray>

294.name: Signet of Judgment
294.description: Target foe is knocked down. That foe and all adjacent foes take 15...75 holy damage.
294.concise: Knocks down target. Deals 15...75 holy damage to target and adjacent foes.

295.name: Purge Signet
295.description: Remove all hexes and conditions from target ally. You lose 10 Energy for each hex and each condition removed.
295.concise: Removes all hexes and conditions. <gray>Removal cost: 10 Energy each.</gray>

296.name: Bane Signet
296.description: Target foe takes 26...56 holy damage. If target foe was attacking, that foe is knocked down.
296.concise: Deals 26...56 holy damage. Causes knock-down if target foe is attacking.

297.name: Blessed Signet
297.description: For each enchantment you are maintaining, you gain 3 Energy. You cannot gain more than 3...24 Energy in this way.
297.concise: You gain 3 Energy for each enchantment you are maintaining. <gray>You cannot gain more than 3...24 Energy in this way.</gray>

298.name: Martyr
298.description: Transfer all conditions and their remaining durations from your allies to you.
298.concise: Transfer all conditions from all allies to you.

299.name: Shielding Hands
299.description: For 8 seconds, damage and life steal received by target ally is reduced by 3...18. When Shielding Hands ends, that ally is healed for 5...50 Health.
299.concise: (8 seconds.) Reduces incoming damage and life steal by 3...18. End effect: heals for 5...50

300.name: Contemplation of Purity
300.description: Lose all enchantments. For each one lost, you gain 0...80 Health, lose one hex, and lose one condition (maximum 1...8 hexes and conditions).
300.concise: You gain 0...80 Health and lose one hex and one condition for each enchantment on you (maximum 1...8 hexes and conditions). <gray>You lose all enchantments.</gray>

301.name: Remove Hex
301.description: Remove a hex from target ally.
