301.concise: Removes a hex from target ally.

302.name: Smite Hex
302.description: Remove a hex from target ally. If a hex is removed, foes in the area suffer 10...85 holy damage.
302.concise: Removes a hex from target ally. Removal effect: deals 10...85 holy damage to foes in the area of target ally.

303.name: Convert Hexes
303.description: Remove all hexes from target other ally. For 8...20 seconds, that ally gains +10 armor for each Necromancer hex that was removed.
303.concise: Removes all hexes; +10 armor for each Necromancer hex removed (8...20 seconds). <gray>Cannot self-target.</gray>

304.name: Light of Dwayna
304.description: Resurrect all dead party members in the area. They are returned to life with 25% Health and zero Energy.
304.concise: Resurrects all dead party members in the area. (25% Health, zero Energy).

305.name: Resurrect
305.description: Resurrect target party member. Target party member is returned to life with 25% Health and zero Energy.
305.concise: Resurrects target party member (25% Health, 0 Energy).

306.name: Rebirth
306.description: Resurrect target party member. Target party member is returned to life with 25% Health and zero Energy, and is teleported to your current location. All of target's skills are disabled for 10...3 seconds. This spell consumes all of your remaining Energy.
306.concise: Resurrects target party member (25% Health, 0 Energy). Teleports target to you. <gray>Disables target's skills (10...3 seconds). You lose all Energy.</gray>

307.name: Reversal of Fortune
307.description: For 8 seconds, the next time target ally would take damage or life steal, that ally gains that amount of Health instead, maximum 15...80.
307.concise: (8 seconds.) Converts the next incoming damage or life steal (maximum 15...80) to healing.

308.name: Succor
308.description: While you maintain this Enchantment, target other ally gains +1 Health and +1 Energy regeneration, but you lose 1 Energy each time that ally casts a Spell.
308.concise: +1 Health regeneration and +1 Energy regeneration. <gray>Cannot self-target. You lose 1 Energy each time target ally casts a spell.</gray>

309.name: Holy Veil
309.description: While you maintain this enchantment, any hex cast on target ally takes twice as long to cast. When Holy Veil ends, one hex is removed from target ally.
309.concise: Doubles casting time of hexes cast on target ally. End effect: removes a hex.

310.name: Divine Spirit
310.description: For 1...14 seconds, Monk Spells cost you 5 less Energy to cast. (Minimum cost: 1 Energy.)
310.concise: (1...14 seconds.) Monk spells cost you 5 less Energy. <gray>Minimum cost: 1 Energy.</gray>

311.name: Draw Conditions
311.description: All negative conditions are transferred from target other ally to yourself. For each condition acquired, you gain 6...26 Health.
311.concise: Transfers all conditions from target ally to yourself. Transfer effect: you gain 6...26 Health for each condition. <gray>Cannot self-target.</gray>

312.name: Holy Strike
312.description: Touched target foe takes 10...55 holy damage. If knocked down, your target takes an additional 10...55 holy damage.
312.concise: Deals 10...55 holy damage. Deals 10...55 more holy damage if target is knocked down.

313.name: Healing Touch
313.description: Heal target touched ally for 16...60 Health. Health gain from Divine Favor is doubled for this spell.
313.concise: Touch Spell. Heals for 16...60. Double Health gain from Divine Favor for this spell.

314.name: Restore Life
314.description: Touch the body of a fallen party member. Target party member is returned to life with 20...65% Health and 42...90% Energy.
314.concise: Touch Spell. Resurrects target party member (20...65% Health, 42...90% Energy).

315.name: Vengeance
315.description: Bring target dead party member back to life at full Health and full Energy. For 30 seconds, that party member deals 25% more damage. When this enchantment ends, target party member dies. Deaths while under the effects of this enchantment do not incur a death penalty.
315.concise: (30 seconds.) Resurrects target party member (full Health, full Energy). This ally deals 25% more damage and does not incur death penalty. <gray>End effect: this ally dies.</gray>

316.name: "To the Limit!"
316.description: For each foe within earshot (maximum 1...6), you gain one strike of adrenaline. For 10...20 seconds, your maximum Health is increased by 10...60.
316.concise: (10...20 seconds.) You have +10...60 maximum Health. Initial effect: you gain one strike of adrenaline for each foe within earshot (maximum 1...6).

317.name: Battle Rage
317.description: For 5...20 seconds, you move 33% faster and gain double adrenaline from attacks. Battle Rage ends if you use any non-adrenal skills.
317.concise: (5...20 seconds.) You move 33% faster and gain double adrenaline from your attacks. <gray>Ends if you use any non-adrenal skills.</gray>

318.name: Defy Pain
318.description: For 20 seconds you have an additional 90...300 Health, an additional 20 armor, and you take 1...10 less damage.
318.concise: (20 seconds.) You have +90...300 maximum Health, +20 armor, and take 1...10 less damage.

320.name: Hamstring
320.description: If this attack hits, your target is Crippled for 3...15 seconds, slowing his<sic/> movement.

321.name: Wild Blow
321.description: Lose all adrenaline. If it hits, this attack will result in a critical hit and any stance being used by your target ends. This attack cannot be blocked.
321.concise: Always a critical hit. Removes a stance. Unblockable. <gray>Lose all adrenaline.</gray>

322.name: Power Attack
322.description: If this attack hits, you strike for +10...40 damage.

323.name: Desperation Blow
323.description: If this attack hits, you strike for +10...40 damage, and your target suffers from one of the following conditions: Deep Wound (for 20 seconds), Weakness (for 20 seconds), Bleeding (for 25 seconds), or Crippled (for 15 seconds). After making a Desperation Blow, you are knocked down.
323.concise: Deals +10...40 damage. Inflicts one of the following random conditions: Deep Wound (20 seconds), Weakness (20 seconds), Bleeding (25 seconds), or Crippled (15 seconds). <gray>You are knocked-down.</gray>

324.name: Thrill of Victory
324.description: If this blow hits, you deal +20...40 damage. If you have more Health than target foe, you gain 1...2 strikes of adrenaline.
324.concise: Deals +20...40 damage. If you have more Health than your target, you gain 1...2 adrenaline.

325.name: Distracting Blow
325.description: Swipe your weapon at the target, dealing no damage but disrupting the target's current action (and the actions of foes adjacent to your target).
325.concise: Also attacks foes adjacent to your target. Interrupts an action. <gray>Hits for no damage.</gray>

326.name: Protector's Strike
326.description: If this attack strikes a moving foe, you strike for 10...40 more damage.
326.concise: Deals +10...40 damage if target is moving.

327.name: Griffon's Sweep
327.description: If this attack hits, you strike for +5...20 damage. If this attack is blocked, your target is knocked down and suffers 10...34 damage.
327.concise: Deals +5...20 damage. Causes knock-down and deals 10...34 damage if blocked.

328.name: Pure Strike
328.description: If Pure Strike hits, you strike for +1...30 damage. If you are not using a stance, Pure Strike cannot be blocked.
328.concise: Deals +1...30 damage. Unblockable unless you are in a stance.

329.name: Skull Crack
329.description: If it hits, this attack interrupts the target's current action. If that foe was casting a spell, that foe is Dazed for 10 seconds.
329.concise: Interrupts an action. Inflicts Dazed condition (10 seconds) if target is casting a spell.

330.name: Cyclone Axe
330.description: Perform a spinning axe attack striking for +4...12 damage to all adjacent opponents.
330.concise: Deals +4...12 damage to all foes adjacent to you.

331.name: Hammer Bash
331.description: Lose all adrenaline. If Hammer Bash hits, your target is knocked down.

332.name: Bull's Strike
332.description: If this attack hits a moving foe, you strike for +5...30 damage, and your target is knocked down.
332.concise: Deals +5...30 damage and causes knock-down if target foe is moving.

333.name: "I Will Avenge You!"
333.description: For each dead ally, you gain 10 seconds of +3...7 Health regeneration and your attack speed increases by 25%.
333.concise: You have +3...7 Health regeneration and attack 25% faster (10 seconds for each dead ally).

334.name: Axe Rake
334.description: If this attack hits a foe suffering from a Deep Wound, you strike for +1...10 damage, and that foe becomes Crippled for 15 seconds.
334.concise: Deals +1...10 damage and inflicts Crippled condition (15 seconds) if target foe has a Deep Wound.

335.name: Cleave
335.description: If this attack hits, you strike for +10...30 damage.

336.name: Executioner's Strike
336.description: If this attack hits, you strike for +10...40 damage.

337.name: Dismember
337.description: If it hits, this axe blow will inflict a Deep Wound on the target foe, lowering that foe's maximum Health by 20% for 5...20 seconds.

338.name: Eviscerate
338.description: If Eviscerate hits, you strike for +1...31 damage and inflict a Deep Wound, lowering your target's maximum Health by 20% for 5...20 seconds.
338.concise: Deals +1...31 damage. Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...20 seconds).

339.name: Penetrating Blow
339.description: If this attack hits, you strike for +5...20 damage. This axe attack has 20% armor penetration.

340.name: Disrupting Chop
340.description: If it hits, this attack interrupts the target's current action. If that action was a skill, that skill is disabled for an additional 20 seconds.
340.concise: Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: interrupted skill is disabled for +20 seconds.

341.name: Swift Chop
341.description: If this attack hits, you strike for +1...20 damage. If Swift Chop is blocked, target foe takes 1...20 damage and suffers a Deep Wound for 20 seconds.
341.concise: Deals +1...20 damage. Deals 1...20 damage and inflicts Deep Wound condition (20 seconds) if blocked.

342.name: Axe Twist
342.description: If this attack hits a foe suffering from a Deep Wound, you strike for 1...20 more damage and that foe suffers from Weakness for 20 seconds.
342.concise: Deals +1...20 damage and inflicts Weakness condition (20 seconds) if target foe has a Deep Wound.

343.name: "For Great Justice!"
343.description: For 20 seconds, whenever you gain adrenaline, you gain 100% more.

344.name: Flurry
344.description: For 5 seconds, your attack rate is increased by 33%, but you deal 25% less damage.
344.concise: (5 seconds). You attack 33% faster. <gray>You do 25% less damage.</gray>

345.name: Defensive Stance
345.description: For 1...5 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block melee and projectile attacks. When Defensive Stance ends, you gain one strike of adrenaline for each melee attack skill you have (maximum 0...4).
345.concise: (1...5 seconds.) You have 75% chance to block. <gray>End effect: gain one adrenaline for each melee attack skill you have (maximum 0...4).</gray>

346.name: Frenzy
346.description: For 8 seconds, you attack 33% faster but take double damage.
346.concise: (8 seconds.) You attack 33% faster. <gray>You take double damage.</gray>

347.name: Endure Pain
347.description: For 7...18 seconds you have an additional 90...300 Health.

348.name: "Watch Yourself!"
348.description: Party members within earshot gain +5...25 armor for 10 seconds. This shout ends after 10 incoming attacks.
348.concise: (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot have +5...25 armor. <gray>Ends after 10 incoming attacks.</gray>

350.name: Belly Smash
350.description: If this attack strikes a foe who is knocked down, the resulting dust cloud will blind adjacent foes for 3...7 seconds.
350.concise: Inflicts Blindness condition to adjacent foes (3...7 seconds) if target foe is knocked down.

351.name: Mighty Blow
351.description: If this attack hits, you strike for +10...40 damage.

352.name: Crushing Blow
352.description: If this attack hits, you strike for +1...20 damage. If you hit a knocked-down foe you inflict a Deep Wound, lowering your target's maximum Health by 20% for 5...20 seconds.
352.concise: Deals +1...20 damage. Inflicts Deep Wound condition if target foe is knocked-down (5...20 seconds).

353.name: Crude Swing
353.description: Attack all adjacent foes. Each foe you hit is struck for +1...20 damage.
353.concise: Attack all adjacent foes for +1...20 damage.

354.name: Earth Shaker
354.description: Target foe and all adjacent foes are knocked down. (50% failure chance with Hammer Mastery 4 or less.)
354.concise: Knocks down target and adjacent foes. <gray>50% failure chance unless Hammer Mastery is 5 or more.</gray>

355.name: Devastating Hammer
355.description: If Devastating Hammer hits, your target is knocked down and suffers from Weakness for 5...20 seconds.
355.concise: Causes knock-down. Inflicts Weakness condition (5...20 seconds).

356.name: Irresistible Blow
356.description: If this attack hits, you strike for +5...20 damage. If Irresistible Blow is blocked, your target is knocked down and takes 5...20 damage.
356.concise: Deals +5...20 damage. Deals 5...20 damage and causes knock-down if blocked.

357.name: Counter Blow
357.description: If this attack hits an attacking foe, that foe is knocked down.
357.concise: Causes knock-down if target foe is attacking.

358.name: Backbreaker
358.description: If Backbreaker hits, you strike for +1...20 damage and your target is knocked down. If you have 8 Strength or higher, this knockdown lasts 4 seconds.
358.concise: Deals +1...20 damage. Causes knockdown. <gray>Knockdown lasts 4 seconds with Strength 8 or higher.</gray>

359.name: Heavy Blow
359.description: Lose all adrenaline. If this attack hits a foe suffering from Weakness, that foe is knocked down and you strike for +1...30 damage.
359.concise: Deals +1...30 damage and causes knock-down if target foe is Weakened. <gray>Lose all adrenaline.</gray>

360.name: Staggering Blow
360.description: If this hammer blow hits, your target will suffer from Weakness for 5...20 seconds.

361.name: Dolyak Signet
361.description: For 8...20 seconds, you have +10...40 armor and cannot be knocked down, but your movement is slowed by 75%.
361.concise: (8...20 seconds.) You have +10...40 armor and cannot be knocked-down. <gray>You move 75% slower.</gray>

362.name: Warrior's Cunning
362.description: For 5...11 seconds, your melee attacks cannot be blocked.
362.concise: (5...11 seconds.) Your melee attacks are unblockable.

363.name: Shield Bash
363.description: For 5...11 seconds, while wielding a shield, the next attack skill used against you is blocked. If it was a melee skill, your attacker is knocked down and that skill is disabled for an additional 15 seconds.
363.concise: (5...11 seconds.) You block the next attack skill. Causes knock-down and +15 second recharge if it was a melee skill. <gray>No effect unless you are wielding a shield.</gray>

364.name: "Charge!"
364.description: Allies in earshot lose the Crippled condition. For 5...13 seconds, these allies move 33% faster.
364.concise: (5...13 seconds.) Allies in earshot move 33% faster. Initial effect: these allies lose the Crippled condition.

365.name: "Victory Is Mine!"
365.description: You gain 10...68 Health and 3...7 Energy for each condition suffered by target foe.
365.concise: You gain 10...68 Health and 3...7 Energy for each condition on target foe.

366.name: "Fear Me!"
366.description: All nearby foes lose 1...4 Energy. For 1...15 seconds, your melee attacks gain +5...30% chance of a critical hit against stationary foes.
366.concise: (1...15 seconds.) You have +5...30% chance of a critical hit with melee attacks against stationary foes. Initial effect: nearby foes lose 1...4 Energy.

367.name: "Shields Up!"
367.description: For 5...11 seconds, you and all party members within earshot gain +60 armor against incoming projectile attacks.
367.concise: (5...11 seconds.) Party members in earshot have +60 armor against projectile attacks.

368.name: "I Will Survive!"
368.description: You gain +3 Health regeneration for each condition you are suffering. This regeneration expires after 5...11 seconds.
368.concise: (5...11 seconds.) You have +3 Health regeneration for each condition on you.

370.name: Berserker Stance
370.description: For 5...11 seconds, you attack 33% faster and gain 50% more adrenaline. Berserker Stance ends if you use a skill.
370.concise: (5...11 seconds.) You attack 33% faster and gain 50% more adrenaline. <gray>Ends if you use a skill.</gray>

371.name: Balanced Stance
371.description: For 8...20 seconds, you cannot be knocked down and you do not suffer extra damage from a critical attack.
371.concise: (8...20 seconds.) You cannot be knocked-down and do not take extra damage from critical hits.

372.name: Gladiator's Defense
372.description: For 5...11 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block incoming attacks. Whenever you block a melee attack this way, the attacker suffers 5...35 damage.
372.concise: (5...11 seconds.) You have 75% chance to block. Your attacker takes 5...35 damage whenever you block a melee attack this way.

373.name: Deflect Arrows
373.description: For 1...6 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block attacks. If you block a projectile attack, adjacent foes suffer from Bleeding for 5...15 seconds.
373.concise: (1...6 seconds.) You have 75% chance to block attacks. Adjacent foes suffer Bleeding (5...15 seconds) when you block a projectile attack.

374.name: Warrior's Endurance
374.description: For 5...35 seconds, you gain 3 Energy each time you hit with a melee attack. Warrior's Endurance cannot raise your Energy above 10...25.
374.concise: (5...35 seconds.) You gain 3 Energy each time you hit with a melee attack. <gray>No Energy gain if you have more than 10...25 Energy.</gray>

375.name: Dwarven Battle Stance
375.description: For 5...11 seconds, if you are wielding a hammer, you attack 33% faster, you gain +40 armor, and your attack skills interrupt foes when they hit.
375.concise: (5...11 seconds.) You attack 33% faster, you gain +40 armor, and your attack skills interrupt actions. <gray>No effect unless you have a hammer equipped.</gray>

376.name: Disciplined Stance
376.description: For 1...4 seconds, you gain +10 armor and have a 75% chance to block attacks. Disciplined Stance ends if you use an adrenal skill.
376.concise: (1...4 seconds.) You have 75% chance to block and +10 armor. <gray>Ends if you use an adrenal skill.</gray>

377.name: Wary Stance
377.description: For 1...6 seconds, you block any attack skills used against you. For each successful block, you gain adrenaline and 5 Energy. Wary Stance ends if you use a skill.
377.concise: (1...6 seconds). You block attack skills. Gain adrenaline and 5 Energy for each block. <gray>Ends if you use a skill.</gray>

378.name: Shield Stance
378.description: For 1...6 seconds, while wielding a shield, you have a 75% chance to block incoming attacks, and damage is reduced by 2 for each rank of Strength (maximum 15 damage reduction).
378.concise: (1...6 seconds.) You have 75% chance to block. Damage is reduced by 2 for each rank of Strength (maximum 15 damage reduction). <gray>No effect unless you have a shield equipped.</gray>

379.name: Bull's Charge
379.description: For 5...11 seconds, you move 33% faster and if you strike a moving foe in melee, that foe is knocked down. Bull's Charge ends if you use a skill.
379.concise: (5...11 seconds.) You move 33% faster. Causes knock-down if you hit a moving foe in melee. <gray>Ends if you use a skill.</gray>

380.name: Bonetti's Defense
380.description: For 5...11 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block melee and projectile attacks. You gain 5 Energy for each successful melee attack blocked. Bonetti's Defense ends if you use a skill.
380.concise: (5...11 seconds.) You have 75% chance to block. Gain 5 Energy for each melee attack blocked. <gray>Ends if you use a skill.</gray>

381.name: Hundred Blades
381.description: For 15 seconds, whenever you attack with a sword, all adjacent foes take 10...25 slashing damage.
381.concise: (15 seconds.) Deals 10...25 slashing damage to all adjacent foes whenever you attack with a sword.

382.name: Sever Artery
382.description: If this attack hits, the opponent begins Bleeding for 5...25 seconds, losing Health over time.

383.name: Galrath Slash
383.description: This attack strikes for +1...40 damage if it hits.

384.name: Gash
384.description: If this attack hits a Bleeding foe, you strike for 5...20 more damage and that foe suffers a Deep Wound, lowering that foe's maximum Health by 20% for 5...20 seconds.
384.concise: Deals +5...20 damage and inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...20 seconds) if your target is Bleeding.

385.name: Final Thrust
385.description: Lose all adrenaline. If Final Thrust hits, you deal 1...40 more damage. This damage is doubled if your target was below 50% Health.
385.concise: Deals +1...40 damage. Deals +1...40 more damage if target foe is below 50% Health. <gray>Lose all adrenaline.</gray>

386.name: Seeking Blade
386.description: If this attack hits you strike for +1...20 damage. If Seeking Blade is blocked, your target begins Bleeding for 25 seconds and takes 1...20 damage.
386.concise: Deals +1...20 damage. Deals 1...20 damage and inflicts Bleeding condition (25 seconds) if blocked.

387.name: Riposte
387.description: For 8 seconds, while you have a sword equipped, you block the next melee attack against you and your attacker is struck for 20...80 damage.
387.concise: (8 seconds). You block the next melee attack and your attacker takes 20...80 damage. <gray>No effect unless you have a sword equipped.</gray>

388.name: Deadly Riposte
388.description: For 8 seconds, while you have a sword equipped, you block the next melee attack against you, and your attacker is struck for 15...90 damage and begins Bleeding for 3...25 seconds.
388.concise: (8 seconds). You block the next melee attack and your attacker takes 15...90 damage. Inflicts Bleeding condition. (3...25 seconds). <gray>No effect unless you have a sword equipped.</gray>

389.name: Flourish
389.description: All of your attack skills become recharged. You gain 2...7 Energy for each skill recharged by Flourish.
389.concise: Recharges your attack skills. You gain 2...7 Energy for each skill recharged.

390.name: Savage Slash
390.description: If this attack hits, it interrupts target foe's action. If that action was a spell, you deal 1...40 extra damage.
390.concise: Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: deals +1...40 damage if action was a spell.

391.name: Hunter's Shot
391.description: If this attack hits, your target bleeds for 3...25 seconds.
391.concise: Inflicts Bleeding condition (3...25 seconds) if your target is hit.

392.name: Pin Down
392.description: If Pin Down hits, your target is Crippled for 3...15 seconds.

393.name: Crippling Shot
393.description: If Crippling Shot hits, your target becomes Crippled for 1...11 seconds. This attack cannot be blocked.

394.name: Power Shot
394.description: If Power Shot hits, target foe takes 25...50 damage.

395.name: Barrage
395.description: All your preparations are removed. Shoot arrows at target foe and up to 5 foes adjacent to your target. These arrows strike for +5...20 damage if they hit.
395.concise: Deals +5...20 damage. Hits 5 foes adjacent to your target. <gray>All your preparations are removed.</gray>

396.name: Dual Shot
396.description: Shoot two arrows simultaneously at target foe. These arrows deal 25% less damage.
396.concise: You shoot two arrows simultaneously at target foe. <gray>These arrows deal 25% less damage</gray>

397.name: Quick Shot
397.description: Shoot an arrow that moves twice as fast.
397.concise: You shoot an arrow that moves twice as fast.

398.name: Penetrating Attack
398.description: If Penetrating Attack hits, you strike for +5...25 damage and this attack has 10% armor penetration.

399.name: Distracting Shot
399.description: If Distracting Shot hits, it interrupts target foe's action but deals only 1...16 damage. If the interrupted action was a skill, that skill is disabled for an additional 20 seconds.
399.concise: Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: interrupted skill is disabled for +20 seconds. <gray>Hits for only 1...16 damage.</gray>

400.name: Precision Shot
400.description: If Precision Shot hits, you strike for +3...10 damage. Precision Shot cannot be blocked. This action is easily interrupted.

402.name: Determined Shot
402.description: If Determined Shot hits, you strike for +5...20 damage. If Determined Shot fails to hit, all of your attack skills are recharged.
402.concise: Deals +5...20 damage. Recharges your attack skills if it fails to hit.

403.name: Called Shot
403.description: Shoot an arrow that moves 3 times faster and cannot be blocked.
403.concise: You shoot an arrow that moves 3 times faster. Unblockable.

404.name: Poison Arrow
404.description: If Poison Arrow hits, your target becomes Poisoned for 5...20 seconds.

405.name: Oath Shot
405.description: If Oath Shot hits, all of your skills except Oath Shot are recharged. If it misses, all of your skills are disabled for 10...4 seconds. (50% miss chance with Expertise 7 or less.)
405.concise: Recharges all skills except Oath Shot if it hits. <gray>Disables all skills if it misses (10...4 seconds). 50% miss chance unless Expertise 8 or higher.</gray>

406.name: Debilitating Shot
406.description: If Debilitating Shot hits, your target loses 1...10 Energy.

407.name: Point Blank Shot
407.description: Shoot an arrow that has half the normal range, but strikes for +10...40 damage.
407.concise: Half Range Bow Attack. Deals +10...40 damage.

408.name: Concussion Shot
408.description: If Concussion Shot hits while target foe is casting a spell, the spell is interrupted and your target is Dazed for 5...20 seconds. This attack deals only 1...16 damage.
408.concise: Interrupts a spell. Interruption effect: inflicts Dazed condition (5...20 seconds). <gray>Hits for only 1...16 damage.</gray>

409.name: Punishing Shot
409.description: If Punishing Shot hits, you strike for +10...20 damage and your target is interrupted.

411.name: Charm Animal
411.description: Charm target animal. Once charmed, your animal companion will travel with you whenever you have Charm Animal equipped. You cannot charm an animal that is more than 4 levels above you.
411.concise: Charm target animal. Once charmed, your animal companion will travel with you whenever you have Charm Animal equipped. <gray>You cannot charm an animal that is more than 4 levels above you.</gray>

412.name: Call of Protection
412.description: For 120 seconds, your animal companion has a 5...20 base damage reduction.
412.concise: (120 seconds.) Your pet has 5...20 damage reduction.

415.name: Call of Haste
415.description: For 30 seconds, your animal companion has a 33% faster attack speed and moves 33% faster.
415.concise: (30 seconds.) Your pet moves and attacks 33% faster.

422.name: Revive Animal
422.description: Resurrect all nearby allied animal companions. They come back to life with 10...94% Health.
422.concise: Resurrects all nearby allied pets (10...94% Health).

423.name: Symbiotic Bond
423.description: For 120...300 seconds, your animal companion gains 1...3 Health regeneration, and half of all damage dealt to your animal companion is redirected to you.
423.concise: (120...300 seconds.) Your pet has +1...3 Health regeneration. Half of all damage dealt to your pet is redirected to you.

424.name: Throw Dirt
424.description: Target touched foe and foes adjacent to your target become Blinded for 3...15 seconds.
424.concise: Inflicts Blindness condition (3...15 seconds). Also affects foes adjacent to target foe.

425.name: Dodge
425.description: For 5...11 seconds, you move 33% faster and have a 27...75% chance to block incoming projectiles. Dodge ends if you attack.
425.concise: (5...11 seconds.) You move 33% faster and have 27...75% chance to block projectile attacks. <gray>Ends if you attack.</gray>

426.name: Savage Shot
426.description: If Savage Shot hits, your target's action is interrupted. If that action was a spell, you strike for +13...28 damage.
426.concise: Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: deals +13...28 damage if action was a spell.

427.name: Antidote Signet
427.description: Cleanse yourself of Poison, Disease, and Blindness, and one additional condition.
427.concise: Remove Poison, Disease, and Blindness from yourself, and one additional condition.

428.name: Incendiary Arrows
428.description: Shoot arrows at target foe and up to 2 foes near your target. Those foes are set on fire for 1...3 seconds.
428.concise: Hits 2 foes near your target and inflicts burning (1...3 seconds).

429.name: Melandru's Arrows
429.description: For 18 seconds, whenever your arrows hit, they cause Bleeding for 3...25 seconds, and if they hit a target who is under an enchantment, they do +8...28 damage.
429.concise: (18 seconds.) Your arrows inflict Bleeding condition (3...25 seconds) and deal +8...28 damage to enchanted foes.

430.name: Marksman's Wager
430.description: For 18 seconds, you gain 5...10 Energy whenever your arrows hit, but lose 10 Energy whenever your arrows fail to strike.
430.concise: (18 seconds.) Gain 5...10 Energy whenever your arrows hit. <gray>Lose 10 Energy whenever your arrows fail to hit.</gray>

431.name: Ignite Arrows
431.description: For 24 seconds, your arrows explode on contact, dealing 3...18 fire damage to target and all adjacent foes.
431.concise: (24 seconds.) Your arrows deal 3...18 fire damage to target and foes adjacent to target.

432.name: Read the Wind
432.description: For 24 seconds, your arrows move twice as fast and deal 3...10 extra damage.
432.concise: (24 seconds). +3...10 damage. Your arrows move twice as fast.

433.name: Kindle Arrows
433.description: For 24 seconds, your arrows deal fire damage and hit for an additional 3...24 fire damage.
433.concise: (24 seconds.) +3...24 fire damage. Your arrows deal fire damage.

434.name: Choking Gas
434.description: For 1...12 seconds, your arrows deal 1...8 more damage and spread Choking Gas to all adjacent foes on impact. Choking Gas interrupts foes attempting to cast spells.
434.concise: (1...12 seconds.) +1...8 damage. Spreads Choking Gas to foes adjacent to target. Choking Gas interrupts spells.

435.name: Apply Poison
435.description: For 24 seconds, foes struck by your physical attacks become Poisoned for 3...15 seconds.
435.concise: (24 seconds.) Your physical attacks inflict Poisoned condition (3...15 seconds).

436.name: Comfort Animal
436.description: You heal your animal companion for 20...104 Health. If your companion is dead, it is resurrected with 10...58% Health. If you have Comfort Animal equipped, your animal companion will travel with you.
436.concise: Your pet gains 20...104 Health. Resurrects your pet (10...58% Health.) If you have Comfort Animal equipped, your animal companion will travel with you.

437.name: Bestial Pounce
437.description: Your animal companion attempts a Bestial Pounce that deals +5...20 damage. If the attack strikes a foe who is casting a spell, that foe is knocked down.
437.concise: Deals +5...20 damage. Causes knock-down if target foe is casting a spell.

438.name: Maiming Strike
438.description: Your animal companion attempts a Maiming Strike that deals +5...20 damage. If that attack hits a moving foe that foe becomes Crippled for 3...15 seconds.
438.concise: Deals +5...20 damage. Inflicts Crippled condition (3...15 seconds) if target foe is moving.

439.name: Feral Lunge
439.description: Your animal companion attempts a Feral Lunge that deals +5...35 damage. If the attack strikes a foe who is attacking, that foe suffers from Bleeding for 5...25 seconds.
439.concise: Deals +5...35 damage. Inflicts Bleeding condition if target foe is attacking (5...25 seconds).

440.name: Scavenger Strike
440.description: Your animal companion attempts a Scavenger Strike that deals +10...25 damage. If the attack strikes a foe who is suffering a condition, you gain 3...15 Energy.
440.concise: Deals +10...25 damage. You gain 3...15 Energy if target foe has a condition.

441.name: Melandru's Assault
441.description: Your animal companion attempts a Melandru's Assault that deals +5...20 damage to all nearby foes.

442.name: Ferocious Strike
442.description: Your animal companion attempts a Ferocious Strike that deals +13...28 damage. If that attack hits, you gain adrenaline and 3...10 Energy.
442.concise: Deals +13...28 damage. You gain adrenaline and 3...10 energy.

443.name: Predator's Pounce
443.description: Your animal companion attempts a Predator's Pounce that deals +5...35 damage. If that attack hits, your animal companion gains 5...50 Health.
443.concise: Deals +5...35 damage. Your pet gains 5...50 Health if this attack hits.

444.name: Brutal Strike
444.description: Your animal companion attempts a Brutal Strike that deals +5...35 damage. If that attack strikes a foe whose Health is below 50%, that foe takes an additional +5...35 damage.
444.concise: Deals +5...35 damage. Deals +5...35 more damage if target foe is under 50% health.

445.name: Disrupting Lunge
445.description: Your animal companion attempts a Disrupting Lunge that deals +1...12 damage. If that attack strikes a foe using a skill that skill is interrupted and is disabled for an additional 20 seconds.
445.concise: Deals +1...12 damage. Interrupts a skill. Interruption effect: interrupted skill is disabled for +20 seconds.

446.name: Troll Unguent
446.description: For 13 seconds, you gain +3...10 Health regeneration.

447.name: Otyugh's Cry
447.description: For 10...25 seconds, your animal companion gains +24 armor and cannot be blocked.
447.concise: (10...25 seconds.) Your pet has +24 armor and is unblockable.

448.name: Escape
448.description: For 1...8 seconds, you move 33% faster and have a 75% chance to block attacks.
448.concise: (1...8 seconds.) You move 33% faster and have 75% chance to block.

449.name: Practiced Stance
449.description: For 20...35 seconds, your Preparations recharge 50% faster and last 30...150% longer.
449.concise: (20...35 seconds.) Your preparations recharge 50% faster and last 30...150% longer.

450.name: Whirling Defense
450.description: For 8...20 seconds, you have 75% chance to block attacks. Whenever you block a projectile in this way, adjacent foes take 5...11 damage.
450.concise: (8...20 seconds.) You have 75% chance to block. Deals 5...11 damage to adjacent foes whenever you block a projectile attack.

451.name: Melandru's Resilience
451.description: For 8...20 seconds, you gain +4 Health regeneration and +1 Energy regeneration for each condition and hex you are suffering.
451.concise: (8...20 seconds.) You have +4 Health regeneration and +1 Energy regeneration for each condition and hex on you.

452.name: Dryder's Defenses
452.description: For 5...11 seconds, you gain 75% chance to block attacks and 34...60 armor against elemental damage.
452.concise: (5...11 seconds.) You have 75% chance to block and +34...60 armor against elemental damage.

453.name: Lightning Reflexes
453.description: For 5...11 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block melee and projectile attacks, and you attack 33% faster.
453.concise: (5...11 seconds.) You attack 33% faster and have 75% chance to block.

454.name: Tiger's Fury
454.description: All your non-attack skills are disabled for 5 seconds. For 5...11 seconds, you attack 25% faster.
454.concise: (5...11 seconds.) You attack 25% faster. <gray>Disables your non-attack skills (5 seconds).</gray>

455.name: Storm Chaser
455.description: For 8...20 seconds, you move 25% faster, and you gain 1...5 Energy whenever you take elemental damage.
455.concise: (8...20 seconds.) You move 25% faster and gain 1...5 Energy whenever you take elemental damage.

456.name: Serpent's Quickness
456.description: For 15...30 seconds, recharge times for your skills are reduced by 33%. Serpent's Quickness ends if your Health drops below 50%.
456.concise: (15...30 seconds.) Your skills recharge 33% faster. <gray>Ends if your Health drops below 50%.</gray>

457.name: Dust Trap
457.description: When Dust Trap is triggered, every second (for 5 seconds total), all nearby foes are Blinded for 3...8 seconds and take 10...25 damage. While activating this skill, you are easily interrupted. Dust Trap ends after 90 seconds.
457.concise: (90 seconds.) Affects nearby foes. Deals 10...25 damage every second (5 seconds). Inflicts Blindness condition (3...8 seconds) every second (5 seconds). <gray>Easily interrupted.</gray>

458.name: Barbed Trap
458.description: When Barbed Trap is triggered, all nearby foes are struck for 7...23 piercing damage, become Crippled, and begin Bleeding for 3...25 seconds. Barbed Trap ends after 90 seconds. While activating this skill, you are easily interrupted.
458.concise: (90 seconds.) Affects nearby foes. Deals 7...23 piercing damage. Inflicts Crippled and Bleeding conditions (3...25 seconds). <gray>Easily interrupted.</gray>

459.name: Flame Trap
459.description: When Flame Trap is triggered, every second (for 3 seconds total), all nearby foes are struck for 5...20 fire damage and set on fire for 1...3 seconds. Flame Trap ends after 90 seconds. While activating this skill, you are easily interrupted.
459.concise: (90 seconds.) Affects nearby foes. Deals 5...20 fire damage every second (3 seconds). Inflicts Burning condition (1...3 seconds). <gray>Easily interrupted.</gray>

460.name: Healing Spring
460.description: For 10 seconds, all adjacent allies are healed for 15...60 every 2 seconds. While activating this skill, you are easily interrupted.
460.concise: (10 seconds.) Affects adjacent allies. Heals for 15...60 every 2 seconds. <gray>Easily interrupted.</gray>

461.name: Spike Trap
461.description: When Spike Trap is triggered, every second (for 2 seconds), all nearby foes are struck for 10...40 piercing damage, become Crippled for 3...25 seconds, and are knocked down. Spike Trap ends after 90 seconds. While activating this skill, you are easily interrupted.
461.concise: (90 seconds.) Affects nearby foes. Every second, (for 2 seconds), this trap deals 10...40 piercing damage, causes knockdown, and inflicts Crippled condition (3...25 seconds). <gray>Easily interrupted.</gray>

462.name: Winter
462.description: Create a level 1...10 spirit. For creatures within its range, all elemental damage is cold damage instead. This spirit dies after 30...150 seconds.
462.concise: Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...150 second lifespan). Converts elemental damage to cold damage for creatures in range. Does not affect spirits.

463.name: Winnowing
463.description: Create a level 1...10 spirit. Non-spirit creatures within range take 4 additional damage whenever they take physical damage. This spirit dies after 30...150 seconds.
463.concise: Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...150 second lifespan). Increases physical damage by +4 for creatures in range. Does not affect spirits.

464.name: Edge of Extinction
464.description: Create a level 1...10 spirit. If a non-spirit creature within range dies, Edge of Extinction deals 14...50 damage to all creatures of the same type that are below 90% Health and within range of the spirit. This spirit dies after 30...150 seconds.
464.concise: Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...150 second lifespan). Deals 14...50 damage to creatures in its range whenever a creature of the same type dies. Does not affect spirits. <gray>No damage to creatures above 90% Health.</gray>

465.name: Greater Conflagration
465.description: Create a level 1...10 spirit. For non-spirit creatures within its range, all physical damage is fire damage instead. This spirit dies after 30...150 seconds.
465.concise: Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...150 second lifespan). Converts physical damage to fire damage for creatures in range. Does not affect spirits.

466.name: Conflagration
466.description: Create a level 1...10 spirit. For non-spirit creatures within its range, all arrows that hit strike for fire damage. This spirit dies after 30...150 seconds.
466.concise: Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...150 second lifespan). All arrows deal fire damage for creatures in range. Does not affect spirits.

467.name: Fertile Season
467.description: Create a level 1...10 spirit. Non-spirit creatures within range have +50...150 maximum Health and gain +8 armor. This spirit dies after 15...45 seconds.
467.concise: Creates a level 1...10 spirit (15...45 second lifespan). Creatures in range have +50...150 maximum health and +8 armor. Does not affect spirits.

468.name: Symbiosis
468.description: Create a level 1...10 spirit. For each enchantment on a non-spirit creature within range, that creature has +27...150 maximum Health. This spirit dies after 30...150 seconds.
468.concise: Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...150 second lifespan). Creatures in range have +27...150 maximum health for each enchantment on them. Does not affect spirits.

469.name: Primal Echoes
469.description: Create a level 1...10 Spirit. For non-Spirit creatures within its range, Signets cost 10 Energy to use. This Spirit dies after 30...150 seconds.
469.concise: Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...150 second lifespan). Signets cost 10 energy for creatures in range. Does not affect spirits.

470.name: Predatory Season
470.description: Create a level 1...10 spirit. For non-spirit creatures within its range, all healing is reduced by 20%. If any of your attacks hit, you gain 5 Health. This spirit dies after 30...150 seconds.
470.concise: Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...150 second lifespan). Creatures in range receive 20% less from healing. Creatures gain 5 health each time they hit with an attack. Does not affect spirits.

471.name: Frozen Soil
471.description: Create a level 1...10 spirit. Non-spirit creatures within its range cannot activate resurrection skills. This spirit dies after 30...90 seconds.
471.concise: Creates a level 1...10 spirit. (30...90 second lifespan). Creatures in range cannot activate resurrection skills. Does not affect spirits.

472.name: Favorable Winds
472.description: Create a level 1...10 spirit. For non-spirit creatures within its range, arrows move twice as fast and strike for +6 damage. This spirit dies after 30...150 seconds.
472.concise: Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...150 second lifespan). Arrows move twice as fast and hit for +6 damage for creatures in range. Does not affect spirits.

474.name: Energizing Wind
474.description: Create a level 1...6 spirit. For non-spirit creatures within its range, all skills cost 15 less Energy (minimum cost 10 Energy), and skills recharge 25% slower. This spirit dies after 1...31 seconds.
474.concise: Creates a level 1...6 spirit (1...31 seconds lifespan). Skills cost 15 less energy (minimum cost 10 energy) and recharge 25% slower for creatures in range. Does not affect spirits.

475.name: Quickening Zephyr
475.description: Create a level 1...10 spirit. For non-spirit creatures within its range, all skills recharge twice as fast and cost 30% more of the base Energy to cast. This spirit dies after 15...45 seconds.
475.concise: Creates a level 1...10 spirit (15...45 second lifespan). Skills cost 30% more Energy and recharge twice as fast for creatures in range. Does not affect spirits.

476.name: Nature's Renewal
476.description: Create a level 1...10 spirit. For 30...150 seconds, enchantments and hexes cast by non-spirit creatures in range take twice as long to cast, and it costs twice as much Energy to maintain enchantments. This spirit dies after 30...150 seconds.
476.concise: Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...150 second lifespan). For creatures in range, enchantments and Hexes <sic/> take twice as long to cast and it costs twice as much Energy to maintain enchantments. Does not affect spirits.

477.name: Muddy Terrain
477.description: Create a level 1...10 spirit. Non-spirit creatures within its range move 10% slower and speed boosts have no effect. This spirit dies after 30...90 seconds.
477.concise: Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...90 second lifespan). Creatures in range have 10% slower movement: also negates speed boosts. <gray>Does not affect spirits.</gray>

570.name: Mark of Insecurity
570.description: For 5...25 seconds, target foe suffers from -1...3 Health degeneration, and enchantments and stances on target foe expire 30...80% faster. All of your non-Assassin skills are disabled for 10 seconds.
570.concise: (5...25 seconds.) Causes -1...3 Health degeneration. Enchantments and stances expire 30...80% faster on target foe. <gray>Disables your non-Assassin skills (10 seconds).</gray>

571.name: Disrupting Dagger
571.description: Send out a Disrupting Dagger at target foe that strikes for 10...35 earth damage. If that foe was activating a skill, that skill is interrupted. This spell has half the normal range.
571.concise: Half Range Spell. Projectile: deals 10...35 earth damage. Interrupts a skill.

572.name: Deadly Paradox
572.description: All of your attack skills are disabled for 10 seconds. For 5...15 seconds, your Assassin skills activate and recharge 33% faster.
572.concise: (5...15 seconds.) Your Assassin skills activate and recharge 33% faster. <gray>Disables your attack skills (10 seconds).</gray>

763.name: Jaundiced Gaze
763.description: Remove an enchantment from target foe. If an enchantment is removed, for the next 1...15 seconds, your next enchantment spell casts 0...1 seconds faster and costs 1...10 less Energy.
763.concise: Removes an enchantment from target foe. Removal effect: your next enchantment casts 0...1 seconds faster and costs 1...10 less Energy. (1...15 seconds)

764.name: Wail of Doom
764.description: For 1...4 seconds, all of target foe's attributes are set to 0.

766.name: Gaze of Contempt
766.description: If target foe has more than 50% Health, that foe loses all enchantments.
766.concise: Removes target foe's enchantments. <gray>No effect unless this foe has more than 50% Health.</gray>

769.name: Viper's Defense
769.description: All adjacent foes are Poisoned for 5...20 seconds. Shadow Step to a nearby location directly away from your target.
769.concise: Inflict Poisoned condition (5...20 seconds) on all adjacent foes and Shadow Step to a nearby location directly away from your target.

770.name: Return
770.description: All adjacent foes are Crippled for 3...8 seconds. Shadow Step to target other ally's location.
770.concise: Inflicts Crippled condition (3...8 seconds) on all foes adjacent to you. You Shadow Step to target ally's location. <gray>Cannot self-target.</gray>

771.name: Aura of Displacement
771.description: When you cast Aura of Displacement, Shadow Step to target foe. When you stop maintaining Aura of Displacement you return to your original location.
771.concise: Shadow Step to target foe. End effect: return to your original location.

772.name: Generous Was Tsungrai
772.description: Hold Tsungrai's ashes for up to 15...60 seconds and gain +50...140 maximum Health. When you drop his ashes, you gain 100...280 Health.
772.concise: (15...60 seconds.) You have +50...140 maximum Health. Drop effect: you gain 100...280 Health.

773.name: Mighty Was Vorizun
773.description: Hold Vorizun's ashes for up to 15...60 seconds. While you hold his ashes, you gain +15 armor and +30 maximum Energy.
773.concise: (15...60 seconds.) You have +15 armor and +30 maximum Energy.

775.name: Death Blossom
775.description: Must follow an off-hand attack. If it hits, Death Blossom strikes target foe for +20...45 damage and all adjacent foes take 20...45 damage.
775.concise: Deals +20...45 damage. Also affects foes adjacent to target foe. <gray>Must follow an off-hand attack.</gray>

776.name: Twisting Fangs
776.description: Must follow an off-hand attack. If it hits, Twisting Fangs strikes for +10...20 damage and struck foe suffers from Bleeding and Deep Wound for 5...20 seconds.
776.concise: Deals +10...20 damage. Inflicts Bleeding and Deep Wound conditions (5...20 seconds). <gray>Must follow an off-hand attack.</gray>

777.name: Horns of the Ox
777.description: Must follow an off-hand attack. If it hits, Horns of the Ox strikes for +1...11 damage. If struck foe is not adjacent to any allies, that foe is knocked down.
777.concise: Deals +1...11 damage. Causes knock-down if the target foe is not adjacent to any of its allies. <gray>Must follow an off-hand attack.</gray>

778.name: Falling Spider
778.description: Must strike a knocked-down foe. If it hits, Falling Spider strikes for +15...35 damage and target foe is Poisoned for 5...20 seconds.
778.concise: Deals +15...35 damage. Inflicts Poisoned condition (5...20 seconds). <gray>No effect unless target foe is knocked-down.</gray>

779.name: Black Lotus Strike
779.description: If it hits, Black Lotus Strike strikes for +10...31 damage. If target foe is suffering from a Hex, you gain 5...13 Energy.
779.concise: Deals +10...31 damage. You gain 5...13 Energy if target foe is hexed.

780.name: Fox Fangs
780.description: Must follow a lead attack. Fox Fangs cannot be blocked and strikes for +10...35 damage if it hits.
780.concise: Deals +10...35 damage. Unblockable. <gray>Must follow a lead attack.</gray>

781.name: Moebius Strike
781.description: Must follow a Dual Attack. If it hits, Moebius Strike strikes for +10...35 damage. If you strike a foe whose Health is below 50%, all your other attack skills are recharged.
781.concise: Deals +10...35 damage. Recharges all your other attack skills if target foe's Health is below 50%. <gray>Must follow a dual attack.</gray>

782.name: Jagged Strike
782.description: If Jagged Strike hits, your target suffers from Bleeding for 5...20 seconds.

783.name: Unsuspecting Strike
783.description: If this attack hits, you strike for +19...31 damage. If your target was above 90% Health you deal an additional 15...75 damage.
783.concise: Deals +19...31 damage. Deals 15...75 more damage if target foe's Health is above 90%.

784.name: Entangling Asp
784.description: Entangling Asp must follow a lead attack. Target foe is knocked down and becomes Poisoned for 5...20 seconds.
784.concise: Causes knock-down. Inflicts Poisoned condition (5...20 seconds). <gray>Must follow a lead attack.</gray>

785.name: Mark of Death
785.description: For 4...10 seconds, target foe gains 33% less benefit from healing.
785.concise: (4...10 seconds.) Target foe receives 33% less from healing.

786.name: Iron Palm
786.description: Target touched foe suffers 5...50 damage, and if that foe is suffering from a hex or condition that foe is knocked down. Iron Palm counts as a lead attack.
786.concise: Deals 5...50 damage. Causes knock-down if target foe is hexed or has a condition. Counts as a lead attack.

787.name: Resilient Weapon
787.description: For 3...12 seconds, target ally has a Resilient Weapon. While suffering from a hex or condition, that ally gains +1...6 Health regeneration and +24 armor.
787.concise: (3...12 seconds.) +1...6 Health regeneration and +24 armor. <gray>No effect unless target ally is hexed or has a condition.</gray>

788.name: Blind Was Mingson
788.description: Hold Mingson's ashes for up to 15...60 seconds. When you drop his ashes, all nearby foes are Blinded for 3...8 seconds.
788.concise: (15...60 seconds.) Drop effect: inflicts Blindness condition (3...8 seconds) on all nearby foes.

789.name: Grasping Was Kuurong
789.description: Hold Kuurong's ashes for up to 15...60 seconds. When you drop his ashes, all nearby foes are struck for 15...75 damage and knocked down.
789.concise: (15...60 seconds.) Drop effect: deal 15...75 damage and knocks-down all nearby foes.

790.name: Vengeful Was Khanhei
790.description: Hold Khanhei's ashes for 5...11 seconds. Whenever a foe strikes you in combat while you are holding Khanhei's ashes, you steal 5...35 Health from that foe.
790.concise: (5...11 seconds.) You steal 5...35 Health from every foe that hits you with an attack.

791.name: Flesh of My Flesh
791.description: Lose half your Health. Resurrect target party member with your current Health and 5...20% Energy.
791.concise: Resurrect target party member (half your current Health and 5...20% Energy). <gray>Lose half your Health.</gray>

792.name: Splinter Weapon
792.description: For 20 seconds, target ally has a Splinter Weapon. Target ally's next 1...5 attacks deal 5...50 damage to up to 4 adjacent foes.
792.concise: (20 seconds.) Attacks deal 5...50 damage to 3 <sic/> adjacent foes. <gray>Ends after 1...5 attacks.</gray>

793.name: Weapon of Warding
793.description: For 3...8 seconds, target ally has a Weapon of Warding that grants target ally +2...4 Health regeneration and a 50% chance to block.
793.concise: (3...8 seconds.) +2...4 Health regeneration. 50% chance to block.

794.name: Wailing Weapon
794.description: For 3...9 seconds, target ally has a Wailing Weapon. Whenever the Wailing Weapon strikes an attacking foe, that foe is interrupted.

795.name: Nightmare Weapon
795.description: For 12 seconds, target ally has a Nightmare Weapon. Target ally's next 3 attacks are reduced by 10...50 damage and steal up to 10...50 Health.
795.concise: (12 seconds.) Target ally's attacks steal 10...50 Health but deal 10...50 less damage. <gray>Ends after 3 attacks.</gray>

799.name: Beguiling Haze
799.description: Shadow Step to target foe. That foe becomes Dazed for 3...9 seconds.
799.concise: You Shadow Step to this foe. Inflicts Dazed condition (3...9 seconds).

800.name: Enduring Toxin
800.description: For 5 seconds, target foe suffers -1...5 Health degeneration. If that foe is moving when Enduring Toxin would end, Enduring Toxin is renewed for another 5 seconds.
800.concise: (5 seconds.) Causes -1...5 Health degeneration. Renewal: if the target foe is moving when this hex ends.

801.name: Shroud of Silence
801.description: All of your spells are disabled for 15 seconds. For 1...3 seconds, target touched foe cannot cast spells.
801.concise: Elite Touch Hex Spell. (1...3 seconds.) Target foe cannot cast spells. <gray>Your spells are disabled for 15 seconds.</gray>

802.name: Expose Defenses
802.description: For 1...11 seconds, target foe cannot block your attacks.
802.concise: (1...11 seconds.) Target foe cannot block your attacks.

803.name: Power Leech
803.description: If target foe is casting a spell or chant, that skill is interrupted and for 10 seconds, whenever that foe casts a spell, you steal up to 5...15 Energy from that foe.
803.concise: Interrupt a spell or a chant. Interruption effect: steal 5...15 Energy whenever target foe casts a spell (10 seconds).

804.name: Arcane Languor
804.description: For 1...10 seconds, all spells cast by the target foe cause 10 Overcast.
804.concise: (1...10 seconds.) Target foe's spells cause 10 Overcast.

805.name: Animate Vampiric Horror
805.description: Exploit nearest corpse to animate a level 1...17 Vampiric Horror. Whenever a Vampiric Horror you control deals damage, you gain the same amount of Health.
805.concise: Creates a level 1...17 vampiric horror. You gain Health equal to the damage it deals. <gray>Exploits a fresh corpse.</gray>

806.name: Cultist's Fervor
806.description: For 5 seconds and 3 seconds longer for every rank of Soul Reaping, your Necromancer spells cost 1...6 Energy to cast but you suffer from Bleeding for 10 seconds each time you cast a Necromancer spell.
806.concise: (5 seconds plus 3 seconds more for every rank of Soul Reaping.) Your Necromancer spells cost 1...6 less Energy. <gray>You suffer from Bleeding (10 seconds) each time you cast a Necromancer spell.</gray>

808.name: Reaper's Mark
808.description: For 30 seconds, target foe suffers -1...5 Health degeneration. If that foe dies while hexed with Reaper's Mark, you gain 5...15 Energy.
808.concise: (30 seconds.) Causes -1...5 Health degeneration. You gain 5...15 Energy if target foe dies while suffering from this hex.

809.name: Shatterstone
809.description: Target foe is struck for 25...100 cold damage and is hexed with Shatterstone for 3 seconds. When Shatterstone ends, that foe and all nearby foes are struck for 25...100 cold damage.
809.concise: (3 seconds.) Initial effect: deals 25...100 cold damage. End effect: deals 25...100 cold damage to target and all nearby foes.

810.name: Protector's Defense
810.description: For 5...11 seconds, allies adjacent to you have a 75% chance to block incoming attacks. Protector's Defense ends if you move.
810.concise: (5...11 seconds.) Allies adjacent to you have 75% chance to block. <gray>Ends if you move.</gray>

811.name: Run as One
811.description: For 5...15 seconds, you and your pet run 25% faster.
811.concise: (5...15 seconds.) You and your pet move 25% faster.

812.name: Defiant Was Xinrae
812.description: Hold Xinrae's ashes for up to 15...60 seconds. While you hold her ashes, you cannot lose more than 20% of your max Health from a single hit. When you drop her ashes, you steal 5...50 Health from all nearby foes.
812.concise: (15...60 seconds.) You cannot lose more than 20% of your max Health from a single hit. Drop effect: steal 5...50 Health from nearby foes.

813.name: Lyssa's Aura
813.description: For 10 seconds, you have +0...5 Energy regeneration. This enchantment reapplies itself every time you cast a spell on a foe.
813.concise: (10 seconds.) You have +0...5 Energy regeneration. Renewal: every time you cast a spell on an enemy.

814.name: Shadow Refuge
814.description: For 6 seconds, you gain 5...10 Health regeneration. When Shadow Refuge ends, you gain 40...100 Health if you are attacking.
814.concise: (6 seconds.) You have +5...10 Health regeneration. End effect: heals you for 40...100 if you are attacking.

815.name: Scorpion Wire
815.description: For 8...20 seconds, the next time you and target foe are more than 100' apart, you Shadow Step to that foe and that foe is knocked down. This spell has half the normal range.
815.concise: Half Range Hex Spell. (8...20 seconds.) Shadow Step to target foe and cause knock-down the next time this foe is more than 100' away from you.

816.name: Mirrored Stance
816.description: For 10...35 seconds, whenever target foe enters a stance, you enter the same stance.
816.concise: (10...35 seconds.) You enter any stance used by target foe.

817.name: Discord
817.description: If target foe is suffering from a condition and under the effects of a hex or an enchantment, that foe suffers 30...110 damage.
817.concise: Deals 30...110 damage. <gray>No effect unless target foe has a condition and is either hexed or enchanted.</gray>

818.name: Well of Weariness
818.description: Exploit target corpse to create a Well of Weariness for 10...55 seconds. Enemies within the Well of Weariness suffer -1 Energy degeneration.
818.concise: (10...55 seconds.) Foes in this well have -1 Energy degeneration. <gray>Exploits a fresh corpse.</gray>

819.name: Vampiric Spirit
819.description: Steal up to 5...50 Health from target foe. For 10 seconds, you have +5...10 Health regeneration.
819.concise: Steal 5...50 Health from target foe. You have +5...10 Health regeneration (10 seconds).

820.name: Depravity
820.description: For 5...20 seconds, whenever target foe casts a spell, that foe and one nearby foe lose 1...5 Energy.
820.concise: (5...20 seconds.) Causes 1...5 Energy loss whenever target foe casts a spell. One foe near your target also loses Energy.

821.name: Icy Veins
821.description: Target foe is struck for 10...90 cold damage. For 10...35 seconds, if target foe dies all nearby foes are struck for 20...110 cold damage.
821.concise: (10...35 seconds.) Deals 20...110 cold damage to nearby foes if target foe dies. Initial effect: deals 10...90 cold damage.

822.name: Weaken Knees
822.description: For 1...16 seconds, target foe suffers -1...4 Health degeneration and takes 5...10 damage while moving.
822.concise: (1...16 seconds.) Target foe has -1...4 Health degeneration and takes 5...10 damage while moving.

823.name: Burning Speed
823.description: For 7 seconds, you are set on fire and move 30...45% faster. When Burning Speed ends, all adjacent foes are set on fire for 3...9 seconds.
823.concise: (7 seconds.) You move 30...45% faster. <gray>You suffer from Burning (7 seconds).</gray> End effect: inflicts Burning condition (3...9 seconds) on adjacent foes.

824.name: Lava Arrows
824.description: Lava Arrows fly toward up to 3 foes near your target and strike for 20...65 fire damage if they hit.
824.concise: Projectile: deals 20...65 fire damage. Bonus effect: sends projectiles at 2 other foes near your target.

825.name: Bed of Coals
825.description: Create a Bed of Coals at target foe's location. For 5 seconds, foes adjacent to target foe are struck for 5...29 fire damage each second. Any foe knocked down on the Bed of Coals is set on fire for 3...7 seconds.
825.concise: Deals 5...29 fire damage each second (5 seconds) to location of target foe. Hits foes adjacent to your target. Inflicts Burning condition (3...7 seconds) on knocked down foes.

826.name: Shadow Form
826.description: For 5...21 seconds, you cannot be the target of enemy spells, and you gain 5 damage reduction for each Assassin enchantment on you. You cannot deal more than 5...25 damage with a single skill or attack.
826.concise: (5...21 seconds.) Enemy spells cannot target you. Gain 5 damage reduction for each Assassin enchantment on you. <gray>You cannot deal more than 5...25 damage with a single skill or attack.</gray>

827.name: Siphon Strength
827.description: For 5...20 seconds, target foe deals 5...50 less damage with attacks and all of your attacks against that foe have an additional 33% chance of being a critical hit.
827.concise: (5...20 seconds.) Target foe deals 5...50 attack damage. You have +33% chance to land a critical hit on this foe.

828.name: Vile Miasma
828.description: Target foe is struck for 10...65 cold damage. If suffering from a condition, that foe is hexed with Vile Miasma and suffers -1...5 Health degeneration for 10 seconds.
828.concise: Causes -1...5 Health degeneration (10 seconds). Initial effect: deals 10...65 cold damage. <gray>Hex is only applied if target foe has a condition.</gray>

830.name: Ray of Judgment
830.description: Invoke a Ray of Judgment at target foe's location. For 5 seconds, target foe and all foes adjacent to this location take 5...45 holy damage each second and begin Burning for 1...3 seconds.
830.concise: Deals 5...45 holy damage and inflicts Burning (1...3 seconds) every second (5 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to target's initial location.

831.name: Primal Rage
831.description: For 1...15 seconds, you attack 33% faster and move 25% faster, but you take double damage.
831.concise: (1...15 seconds.) You attack 33% faster and move 25% faster. <gray>You take double damage.</gray>

832.name: Animate Flesh Golem
832.description: Exploit nearest corpse to animate a level 3...25 Flesh Golem. The Flesh Golem leaves an exploitable corpse. You can have only one Flesh Golem at a time.
832.concise: Creates a level 3...25 flesh golem which leaves a fresh corpse when it dies. <gray>Exploits a fresh corpse. You can have only one flesh golem at a time.</gray>

834.name: Reckless Haste
834.description: For 6...12 seconds, target foe and all adjacent foes are hexed with Reckless Haste. While hexed, they attack 25% faster but have a 50% chance to miss with attacks.
834.concise: Also hexes foes adjacent to your target (6...12 seconds). These foes have 50% chance to miss, but attack 25% faster.

835.name: Blood Bond
835.description: For 3...12 seconds, target foe and all adjacent foes are hexed with Blood Bond. Whenever an ally hits one of them with an attack, that ally gains 5...20 Health. If one of these foes dies while hexed, all allies adjacent to that foe are healed for 20...100 Health.
835.concise: Also hexes foes adjacent to your target (3...12 seconds). Allies hitting these foes gain 5...20 health. If any of these foes dies while hexed, adjacent allies are healed for 20...100.

836.name: Ride the Lightning
836.description: You Ride the Lightning to target. All adjacent foes are Blinded for 1...5 seconds. If your target is a foe, it is struck for 10...70 lightning damage. This spell has 25% armor penetration.
836.concise: Deals 10...70 lightning damage. 25% armor penetration. Blinds all adjacent foes (1...5 seconds). You instantly move to your target. May target allies.

837.name: Energy Boon
837.description: For 36...60 seconds, Energy Boon raises the maximum Health of you and target ally by 1...3 for each point of your respective maximum Energy. When this enchantment is first applied, you and your target gain 1...12 Energy. You gain an additional 1 Energy for every 2 points you have in Energy Storage.
837.concise: (36...60 seconds.) Maximum Health for you and target ally is increased by 1...3 for each point of maximum Energy. Initial effect: Both gain 1...12 Energy. You gain +1 Energy for every 2 points of Energy Storage.

838.name: Dwayna's Sorrow
838.description: For 30 seconds, target ally and all nearby allies are enchanted with Dwayna's Sorrow. If an ally dies while under the effects of Dwayna's Sorrow, your party is healed for 5...50.
838.concise: Enchants allies near your target (30 seconds). Your party is healed for 5...50 whenever one of these allies dies.

839.name: "Retreat!"
839.description: If there are any dead allies within earshot, your party moves 33% faster for 5...11 seconds.
839.concise: (5...11 seconds.) Party members in earshot move 33% faster. <gray>No effect unless there are dead allies within earshot.</gray>

840.name: Poisoned Heart
840.description: You and all adjacent foes are Poisoned for 5...15 seconds.
840.concise: Inflicts Poisoned condition (5...15 seconds) to adjacent foes. <gray>You are also Poisoned.</gray>

841.name: Fetid Ground
841.description: Target foe is struck for 15...65 cold damage. If that foe is knocked down, that foe becomes Poisoned for 5...20 seconds.
841.concise: Deals 15...65 cold damage. Inflicts Poisoned condition (5...20 seconds) if target foe is knocked-down.

842.name: Arc Lightning
842.description: Target foe is struck for 5...40 lightning damage. If you are Overcast, two foes near your target are struck for 15...85 lightning damage. Damage from Arc Lightning has 25% armor penetration.
842.concise: Deals 5...40 lightning damage. Deals 15...85 lightning damage to two nearby foes if you are Overcast. 25% armor penetration.

843.name: Gust
843.description: For 5...11 seconds, both you and target ally move 33% faster. When you cast this spell, all foes near you and your target take 15...70 cold damage. Foes struck by Gust while attacking or moving are knocked down.
843.concise: (5...11 seconds.) You and target ally move 33% faster. Initial effect: Foes near you and target ally are struck for 15...70 cold damage. Attacking or moving foes are knocked down.

844.name: Churning Earth
844.description: Create Churning Earth at target foe's location. For the next 5 seconds, Churning Earth strikes foes near that location for 10...40 earth damage each second. Any foe moving faster than normal when struck by Churning Earth is knocked down.
844.concise: Deals 10...40 earth damage each second (5 seconds). Hits foes near target's initial location. Causes knock-down to foes moving faster than normal.

845.name: Liquid Flame
845.description: Target foe is struck for 7...112 fire damage. If that foe is attacking or casting a spell, nearby foes are also struck for 7...112 fire damage.
845.concise: Deals 7...112 fire damage. Deals 7...112 fire damage to nearby foes if target was attacking or casting.

846.name: Steam
846.description: Target foe is struck for 20...60 cold damage. If target foe is on fire, Steam Blinds that foe for 5...10 seconds.
846.concise: Deals 20...60 cold damage. Inflicts Blindness condition (5...10 seconds) if target foe is Burning.

847.name: Boon Signet
847.description: Heal target ally for 20...80 Health. Your next Healing or Protection Prayer <sic/> spell that targets an ally heals for an additional 20...80 Health.
847.concise: Heals for 20...80. Your next Healing or Protection Prayer <sic/> spell that targets an ally heals for +20...80 Health.

848.name: Reverse Hex
848.description: Remove one hex from target ally. If a hex was removed in this way, for 5...10 seconds, the next time target ally would take damage, that damage is reduced by 5...50.
848.concise: (5...10 seconds.) Removes one hex from target ally. The next damage this ally takes is reduced by 5...50. <gray>No effect unless this ally is hexed.</gray>

849.name: Lacerating Chop
849.description: If Lacerating Chop hits, you deal +5...20 damage. If it strikes a knocked down foe your target suffers from Bleeding for 5...20 seconds.
849.concise: Deals +5...20 damage. Inflicts Bleeding condition (5...20 seconds) if target foe is knocked-down.

850.name: Fierce Blow
850.description: If Fierce Blow hits, you strike for +5...20 damage. If target foe was <sic/> suffering from Weakness, that foe also suffers from a Deep Wound for 1...8 seconds.
850.concise: Deals +5...20 damage. Inflicts Deep Wound (1...8 seconds) if target foe is Weakened.

851.name: Sun and Moon Slash
851.description: Attack target foe twice. These attacks cannot be blocked.
851.concise: You attack target foe twice. Unblockable.

852.name: Splinter Shot
852.description: If Splinter Shot hits, you deal +3...15 damage. If Splinter Shot is blocked, all foes adjacent to your target take 5...65 damage.
852.concise: Deals +3...15 damage. Deals 5...65 damage to adjacent foes if blocked.

853.name: Melandru's Shot
853.description: If Melandru's Shot hits, your target begins Bleeding for 5...25 seconds. If it hits a foe that is moving or knocked down, that foe takes +10...25 damage and is Crippled for 5...15 seconds.
853.concise: Inflicts Bleeding (5...25 seconds). Deals +10...25 damage and inflicts Crippled (5...15 seconds) if target foe was moving or knocked down.

854.name: Snare
854.description: When Snare is triggered, all nearby foes become Crippled for 3...15 seconds. Snare ends after 90 seconds. While activating this skill, you are easily interrupted.
854.concise: (90 seconds.) Affects nearby foes. Inflicts Crippled condition (3...15 seconds). <gray>Easily interrupted.</gray>

858.name: Dancing Daggers
858.description: Send out three Dancing Daggers at target foe, each striking for 5...35 earth damage if they hit. Dancing Daggers has half the normal range. This skill counts as a lead attack.
858.concise: Half Range Spell. Three projectiles: each deals 5...35 earth damage. Counts as a lead attack.

859.name: Conjure Nightmare
859.description: For 2...16 seconds, target foe suffers -8 Health degeneration.

860.name: Signet of Disruption
860.description: If target foe is casting a spell, the spell is interrupted and that foe suffers 10...51 damage. If that foe is hexed, Signet of Disruption can interrupt any non-spell skills.
860.concise: Interrupts a spell. Can interrupt any skill if target foe is hexed. Interruption effect: deals 10...51 damage.

862.name: Ravenous Gaze
862.description: Deal 15...30 damage and steal 15...30 Health from target foe and all nearby foes.
862.concise: Deals 15...30 damage and steals 15...30 Health from target and nearby foes.

863.name: Order of Apostasy
863.description: For 5 seconds, whenever a party member hits a foe with physical damage, that foe loses one enchantment. For each Monk enchantment removed, you lose 25...15% maximum Health.
863.concise: Enchants all party members (5 seconds). These party members remove one enchantment when they deal physical damage. <gray>Removal cost: for each Monk enchantment, you lose 25...15% maximum Health.</gray>

864.name: Oppressive Gaze
864.description: Target foe and adjacent foes take 10...30 shadow damage. Foes already suffering from a condition are Poisoned and Weakened for 3...12 seconds.
864.concise: Deals 10...30 damage to target and adjacent foes. Inflicts Poison and Weakness (3...12 second) on foes suffering from a condition.

865.name: Lightning Hammer
865.description: Target foe is struck for 10...100 lightning damage and applies<sic/> Cracked Armor for 5...20 seconds. Lightning Hammer has 25% armor penetration.
865.concise: Deals 10...100 lightning damage. Applies Cracked Armor (5...20 seconds). 25% armor penetration.

866.name: Vapor Blade
866.description: Target foe is struck for 15...135 cold damage. Vapor Blade deals half damage if that foe has any enchantments on them.
866.concise: Deals 15...135 cold damage. Half damage if target foe is enchanted.

867.name: Healing Light
867.description: Heal target ally for 40...100 Health. If your target has an enchantment, you gain 1...3 Energy.
867.concise: Heals for 40...100. You gain 1...3 Energy if target ally is enchanted.

869.name: "Coward!"
869.description: If target foe is moving, that foe is knocked down.
869.concise: Causes knock-down if target foe is moving.

870.name: Pestilence
870.description: Create a level 1...10 spirit. When any creature within its range dies, conditions on that creature spread to any creature in the area already suffering from a condition. This spirit dies after 30...90 seconds.
870.concise: Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...90 second lifespan). When any creature in range dies, conditions on this creature spread to any creature in the area with a condition. Spirits are not affected.

871.name: Shadowsong
871.description: Create a level 1...10 spirit. The spirit's attacks deal 5...20 damage and cause Blindness for 1...6 seconds. This spirit dies after 30 seconds.
871.concise: Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30-second lifespan). Its attacks deal 5...20 damage and inflict Blindness condition (1...6 seconds).

876.name: Signet of Shadows
876.description: Target foe takes 5...35 damage. If your target was Blinded, that foe suffers an additional 15...60 damage.
876.concise: Deals 5...35 damage. Deals 15...60 more damage if target foe is Blinded.

877.name: Lyssa's Balance
877.description: Target foe loses one Enchantment. If you have more Enchantments than target foe, this skill has no effect.
877.concise: Removes one enchantment from target foe. <gray>No effect if you have more enchantments than this foe.</gray>

878.name: Visions of Regret
878.description: For 10 seconds, target foe and adjacent foes take 15...45 damage whenever they use a skill and 5...50 additional damage if not under the effects of another Mesmer hex.
878.concise: Also hexes foes adjacent to target (10 seconds). These foes take 15...45 damage whenever they use a skill and 5...50 additional damage if not under the effects of another Mesmer hex.

879.name: Illusion of Pain
879.description: For 8 seconds, target foe has -3...10 Health degeneration and takes 3...10 damage each second. When Illusion of Pain ends, that foe is healed for 36...120.
879.concise: (8 seconds.) Causes -3...10 Health degeneration and target foe takes 3...10 damage each second. End effect: that foe is healed for 36...120.

880.name: Stolen Speed
880.description: For 1...10 seconds, spells cast by the target foe and all adjacent foes take 100% longer to cast. Spells targeting these foes that are cast by you or your allies take 50% less time to cast.
880.concise: Also hexes adjacent foes (1...10 seconds). Doubles spell casting time. Spells cast by you or your allies have -50% casting times.

881.name: Ether Signet
881.description: If you have less than 5...10 Energy, gain 10...20 Energy.
881.concise: You gain 10...20 Energy. <gray>No effect unless you have less than 5...10 Energy.</gray>

882.name: Signet of Disenchantment
882.description: Lose all Energy. Target foe loses one enchantment.
882.concise: Removes one enchantment. <gray>You lose all Energy.</gray>

883.name: Vocal Minority
883.description: For 5...20 seconds, target foe and all nearby foes cannot use shouts or chants.
883.concise: Also hexes foes near target (5...20 seconds). These foes cannot use shouts or chants.

884.name: Searing Flames
884.description: Target foe and all nearby foes are struck with Searing Flames. Foes already on fire when this skill is cast are struck for 10...100 fire damage. Foes not already on fire begin Burning for 1...7 seconds.
884.concise: Hits foes near your target. Deals 10...100 fire damage to foes already Burning. Inflicts Burning condition (1...7 seconds) to foes not Burning.

885.name: Shield Guardian
885.description: For 1...4 seconds, all party members in earshot have a 75% chance to block incoming attacks. If an attack is blocked, all allies in earshot are healed for 10...40 and Shield Guardian ends.
885.concise: (1...4 seconds). Party members in earshot have a 75% chance to block attacks. Block effect: Allies in earshot are healed for 10...40, and Shield Guardian ends.

886.name: Restful Breeze
886.description: For 8...18 seconds, target ally has +10 Health regeneration. This enchantment ends if that ally attacks or uses a skill.
886.concise: (8...18 seconds.) +10 Health regeneration. <gray>Ends if target ally attacks or uses a skill.</gray>

887.name: Signet of Rejuvenation
887.description: Heal target ally for 15...75. If target ally is casting a spell or attacking, that ally is healed for an additional 15...75 Health.
887.concise: Heals for 15...75. Heals for 15...75 more if target ally is casting a spell or attacking.

888.name: Whirling Axe
888.description: If Whirling Axe hits, you strike for +5...20 damage and any stance being used by your target ends. This attack cannot be blocked.
888.concise: Deals +5...20 damage and removes a stance. Unblockable.

889.name: Forceful Blow
889.description: If Forceful Blow hits, you strike for +10...30 damage and any stance being used by target foe ends. Target foe suffers from Weakness for 5...20 seconds. This attack cannot be blocked.
889.concise: Deals +10...30 damage. Remove target foe's stance. Inflicts Weakness condition (5...20 seconds). Unblockable.

891.name: "None Shall Pass!"
891.description: All nearby foes that are moving are knocked down. This skill recharges 1...8 seconds faster for each foe knocked down (maximum 25 seconds).
891.concise: Knocks down all nearby moving foes. Recharges 1...8 seconds faster for each affected foe (maximum 25 seconds).

892.name: Quivering Blade
892.description: If Quivering Blade hits, you strike for +10...40 damage. If this attack hits a moving foe, that foe is Dazed for 5 seconds.
892.concise: Deals +10...40 damage. Inflicts Dazed condition (5 seconds) if target foe was moving.

893.name: Seeking Arrows
893.description: For 3...14 seconds, your arrows cannot be blocked. Seeking Arrows ends if you fail to hit.
893.concise: (3...14 seconds.) Your arrows are unblockable. <gray>Ends if you fail to hit.</gray>

898.name: Overload
898.description: For 5 seconds, target foe suffers -1...3 Health degeneration. If target foe is using a skill, then Overload deals 15...75 damage to that foe and all adjacent foes.
898.concise: (5 seconds.) Causes -1...3 Health degeneration. If target foe is using a skill, that foe and all adjacent foes take 15...75 damage.

899.name: Images of Remorse
899.description: For 5...10 seconds, target foe suffers -1...3 Health degeneration. If that foe was attacking, that foe takes 10...52 damage.
899.concise: (5...10 seconds.) Causes -1...3 Health degeneration. Initial effect: 10...52 damage if target foe is attacking.

900.name: Shared Burden
900.description: For 5...20 seconds, target foe and all nearby foes attack, cast spells, and move 50% slower.
900.concise: Also hexes foes near your target (5...20 seconds). These foes attack, cast spells, and move 50% slower.

901.name: Soul Bind
