901.description: For 30 seconds, every time target foe is healed, the healer takes 20...80 damage. This hex ends if target is suffering from a Smiting Prayers hex.
901.concise: (30 seconds.) Every time target foe is healed, the healer takes 20...80 damage. <gray>Ends if target is suffering from a Smiting Prayers hex.</gray>

902.name: Blood of the Aggressor
902.description: Steal up to 5...45 Health from target foe. If that foe was attacking, that foe suffers Weakness for 3...12 seconds.
902.concise: Steal 5...45 Health. Inflicts Weakness (3...12 seconds) if target foe was attacking.

903.name: Icy Prism
903.description: Target foe is struck for 15...75 cold damage. If that foe has a Water Magic hex, Icy Prism deals +<sic/>15...75 cold damage to all other nearby foes.
903.concise: Deals 15...75 cold damage. Deals +<sic/>15...75 cold damage to other nearby foes if target has a Water Magic hex.

904.name: Furious Axe
904.description: If Furious Axe hits, you strike for +5...35 damage. If it is blocked you gain 3 strikes worth of adrenaline.
904.concise: Deals +5...35 damage. Gives you 3 strikes of adrenaline if blocked.

905.name: Auspicious Blow
905.description: If Auspicious Blow hits, you strike for +5...20 damage and gain 3...8 Energy. If target foe is suffering from Weakness, this attack is unblockable.
905.concise: Deals +5...20 damage and you gain 3...8 Energy. Unblockable if target foe is Weakened.

906.name: "On Your Knees!"
906.description: Lose all adrenaline. If any adjacent foes are knocked down, all of your stances are recharged.
906.concise: Recharges all your stances if you are adjacent to a knocked-down foe. <gray>You lose all adrenaline.</gray>

907.name: Dragon Slash
907.description: If Dragon Slash hits, you strike for +10...40 damage and gain 1...5 strikes of adrenaline.
907.concise: Deals +10...40 damage. You gain 1...5 strikes of adrenaline if it hits.

908.name: Marauder's Shot
908.description: If Marauder's Shot hits, you strike for +10...35 damage and all your non-attack skills are disabled for 10 seconds.
908.concise: Deals +10...35 damage. <gray>Your non-attack skills are disabled (10 seconds) if this attack hits.</gray>

909.name: Focused Shot
909.description: If Focused Shot hits, you strike for +10...25 damage but all of your other attack skills are disabled for 5...3 seconds.
909.concise: Deals +10...25 damage. <gray>Your other attack skills are disabled (5...3 seconds) if this attack hits.</gray>

910.name: Spirit Rift
910.description: Open a Spirit Rift at target foe's location. After 3 seconds, all adjacent foes are struck for 25...125 lightning damage and suffer from Cracked Armor for 1...20 seconds.
910.concise: After 3 seconds, affects foes adjacent to target's initial location. Deals 25...125 lightning damage and inflicts Cracked Armor (1...20 seconds).

911.name: Union
911.description: Create a level 1...12 spirit. Whenever a non-spirit ally in its range takes damage or life steal, it is reduced by 15 and the spirit takes 15 damage. This spirit dies after 30...60 seconds.
911.concise: Creates a level 1...12 spirit (30...60 second lifespan). Whenever a non-spirit ally within range takes damage or life steal, it is reduced by 15 and the spirit takes 15 damage.

913.name: Tranquil Was Tanasen
913.description: Hold Tanasen's ashes for up to 5...20 seconds. While you hold his ashes, you have +10...25 armor and cannot be interrupted.
913.concise: (5...20 seconds.) You have +10...25 armor. You cannot be interrupted.

914.name: Consume Soul
914.description: You steal 5...60 Health from target foe. All hostile summoned creatures in the area of that foe take 25...125 damage.
914.concise: Steals 5...60 Health. Deal 25...125 damage to hostile summoned creatures in the area of target foe.

915.name: Spirit Light
915.description: Target ally is healed for 60...180. If any spirits are within earshot, you don't sacrifice Health.
915.concise: Heals for 60...180. You don't sacrifice Health if you are within earshot of any spirits.

916.name: Lamentation
916.description: For 5...20 seconds, target foe and all nearby foes suffer -0...3 Health degeneration. When this hex is applied, these foes take 10...50 damage if you are within earshot of a spirit or corpse.
916.concise: Also hexes foes near your target (5...20 seconds). Causes -0...3 Health degeneration. Initial effect: Deals 10...50 damage to these foes if you are within earshot of a spirit or corpse.

917.name: Rupture Soul
917.description: Target allied spirit is destroyed. All nearby enemies are struck for 50...140 lightning damage and become blinded for 3...12 seconds.
917.concise: Destroys target allied spirit. Deals 50...140 lightning damage and inflicts Blindness condition (3...12 seconds) to nearby foes.

918.name: Spirit to Flesh
918.description: Target touched allied spirit is destroyed. All nearby allies are healed for 30...240.
918.concise: Touch Spell. Destroys target touched allied spirit. Heals nearby allies for 30...240.

919.name: Spirit Burn
919.description: Target foe is struck for 5...50 lightning damage. If any spirits are within earshot, Spirit Burn causes Burning for 1...5 seconds.
919.concise: Deals 5...50 lightning damage. Inflicts Burning condition (1...5 seconds) if you are within earshot of a spirit.

920.name: Destruction
920.description: Create a level 1...14 Spirit that dies after 30 seconds. When this Spirit dies, all foes in the area take 5...25 damage for each second the Spirit was alive (maximum 150 damage).
920.concise: Create a level 1...14 Spirit that dies after 30 seconds. When this Spirit dies, all foes in the area take 5...25 damage for each second the Spirit was alive (maximum 150 damage).

921.name: Dissonance
921.description: Create a level 1...12 spirit. This spirit deals 5...20 damage and anyone struck by its attack is interrupted. This spirit dies after 10...25 seconds.
921.concise: Creates a level 1...12 spirit (10...25 second lifespan). Its attacks deal 5...20 damage and interrupt actions.

923.name: Disenchantment
923.description: Create a level 1...12 spirit. This spirit deals 5...20 damage and anyone struck by its attack loses one enchantment. This spirit dies after 10...35 seconds.
923.concise: Creates a level 1...12 spirit (10...35 second lifespan). Its attacks deal 5...20 damage and remove one enchantment.

925.name: Recall
925.description: While you maintain Recall, nothing happens. When Recall ends, you Shadow Step to the ally you targeted when you activated this skill and all of your skills are disabled for 10 seconds.
925.concise: End effect: Shadow Step to target ally. <gray>Cannot self-target and disables all of your skills for 10 seconds when it ends.</gray>

926.name: Sharpen Daggers
926.description: For 5...30 seconds, your dagger attacks cause Bleeding for 5...15 seconds.
926.concise: (5...30 seconds.) Your dagger attacks inflict the Bleeding condition (5...15 seconds).

927.name: Shameful Fear
927.description: For 10 seconds, target foe moves 10% faster than normal. For each second, if that foe is moving, that foe takes 5...20 damage.
927.concise: (10 seconds.) Target foe takes 5...20 damage each second while moving, but moves 10% faster.

928.name: Shadow Shroud
928.description: For 3...9 seconds, target foe cannot be the target of enchantments.
928.concise: (3...9 seconds.) Target foe cannot be the target of enchantments.

929.name: Shadow of Haste
929.description: For 10...40 seconds you move 15% faster than normal. When Shadow of Haste ends, you shadow step to your original location.
929.concise: (10...40 seconds.) You move 15% faster. End effect: return to your original location.

930.name: Auspicious Incantation
930.description: For 20 seconds, the next spell you cast is disabled for an additional 10...5 seconds, and you gain 110...200% of that spell's Energy cost.
930.concise: (20 seconds.) Your next spell gives you 110...200% of its Energy cost. <gray>That spell takes 10...5 seconds longer to recharge.</gray>

931.name: Power Return
931.description: If target foe is casting a spell or chant, that skill is interrupted and target foe gains 10...5 Energy.
931.concise: Interrupts a spell or chant. Interruption effect: target foe gains 10...5 Energy.

932.name: Complicate
932.description: If target foe is using a skill, that skill is interrupted and disabled for target foe and all foes in the area for an additional 5...12 seconds.
932.concise: Interrupt a skill. Interruption effect: disables interrupted skill (+5...12 seconds) for target foe and all foes in the area.

933.name: Shatter Storm
933.description: Target foe loses all enchantments. For each enchantment removed this way, Shatter Storm is disabled for an additional 7 seconds.
933.concise: Removes all enchantments. <gray>Removal cost: Shatter Storm is disabled for +7 seconds for each enchantment removed.</gray>

934.name: Unnatural Signet
934.description: Target foe takes 15...75 damage. If that foe is under the effects of a hex or enchantment, foes adjacent to your target take 5...50 damage.
934.concise: Deals 15...75 damage. Deals 5...50 damage to other adjacent foes if the target is hexed or enchanted.

935.name: Rising Bile
935.description: For 20 seconds, this hex does nothing. When Rising Bile ends, that foe and all foes in the area take 1...6 damage for each second Rising Bile was in effect.
935.concise: (20 seconds.) End effect: deals 1...6 damage for each second Rising Bile was in effect. Also damages other foes in the area.

936.name: Envenom Enchantments
936.description: Target foe loses one enchantment. For every remaining enchantment, target foe is poisoned for 3...10 seconds.
936.concise: Removes one enchantment from target foe. Inflicts Poisoned condition (3...10 seconds for each remaining enchantment on that foe).

937.name: Shockwave
937.description: All foes in the area take 15...60 earth damage and are Weakened for 1...10 seconds. Nearby foes also take +15...60 earth damage and have Cracked Armor for 1...10 seconds. Adjacent foes suffer the previous effects, take +15...60 earth damage, and are Blinded for 1...10 seconds.
937.concise: Foes in the area take 15...60 earth damage and are Weakened (1...10 seconds). Nearby foes also take +15...60 earth damage and have Cracked Armor (1...10 seconds). Adjacent foes also take +15...60 earth damage and are Blinded (1...10 seconds).

938.name: Ward of Stability
938.description: Create a Ward of Stability at your current location. For 10...25 seconds, non-spirit allies cannot be knocked down.
938.concise: (10...25 seconds.) Allies in this ward cannot be knocked-down. <gray>Allied spirits are not affected.</gray>

939.name: Icy Shackles
939.description: For 1...10 seconds, target foe's movement speed is reduced by 66%. While under the effects of an enchantment, that foe's movement is reduced by 90%.
939.concise: (1...10 seconds.) Target foe moves 66% slower. This foe moves 90% slower if enchanted.

941.name: Blessed Light
941.description: Heal target ally for 10...140 Health and remove one condition and one hex.
941.concise: Heals for 10...140. Removes one condition and one hex.

942.name: Withdraw Hexes
942.description: Remove all hexes from target ally and all adjacent allies. This spell takes an additional 20...5 seconds to recharge for each hex removed in this way.
942.concise: Removes all hexes. Also affects adjacent allies. <gray>Removal cost: +20...5 seconds recharge for each hex removed.</gray>

943.name: Extinguish
943.description: Remove one condition from each party member. Party members relieved of Burning are healed for 10...100 Health.
943.concise: Affects all party members. Removes one condition. Party members relieved of Burning are healed for 10...100.

944.name: Signet of Strength
944.concise: Your attacks deal +5 damage. <gray>Ends after 1...16 attacks.</gray>

946.name: Trapper's Focus
946.description: For 12...24 seconds, your trap skills are not easily interruptible and your Wilderness Survival attribute is increased by +0...2.
946.concise: (12...24 seconds.) Your trap skills are no longer easy to interrupt. You gain +0...2 to your Wilderness Survival attribute.

947.name: Brambles
947.description: Create a level 1...10 Spirit. Non-Spirit creatures that are knocked down in its range take 5 damage and begin Bleeding for 5...20 seconds. This Spirit dies after 30...150 seconds.
947.concise: Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...150 second lifespan). Knocked-down creatures take 5 damage and begin Bleeding (5...20 seconds). Does not affect spirits.

948.name: Desperate Strike
948.description: If you have less than 50...80% Health, you deal +15...60 damage.
948.concise: Deals +15...60 damage if you have less than 50...80% Health.

949.name: Way of the Fox
949.description: For 10...35 seconds, your next 1...6 attacks cannot be blocked.
949.concise: (10...35 seconds.) Your attacks are unblockable. <gray>Ends after 1...6 attacks.</gray>

950.name: Shadowy Burden
950.description: For 3...15 seconds, target foe moves 25% slower and while target foe has no other hexes, that foe has 20 less armor against your attacks.
950.concise: (3...15 seconds.) Target foe moves 25% slower and has 20 less armor against your attacks. <gray>Armor reduction only affects this foe while it has no other hexes.</gray>

951.name: Siphon Speed
951.description: For 5...15 seconds, target foe moves 33% slower and you move 33% faster. This spell has half the normal range. This spell recharges 50% faster if cast on a moving foe.
951.concise: Half Range Hex Spell. (5...15 seconds.) Target foe moves 33% slower and you move 33% faster. Recharges 50% faster if cast on a moving foe.

952.name: Death's Charge
952.description: Shadow Step to target foe. If that foe has more Health than you, you are healed for 65...200.
952.concise: You Shadow Step to target foe. You are healed for 65...200 if this foe has more Health than you.

953.name: Power Flux
953.description: If target foe is casting a spell or chant, that skill is interrupted and for 4...10 seconds, that foe has -2 Energy degeneration.
953.concise: Interrupts a spell or chant. Interruption effect: -2 Energy degeneration (4...10 seconds).

954.name: Expel Hexes
954.description: Remove up to 2 Hexes from target ally.

955.name: Rip Enchantment
955.description: Remove 1 enchantment from target foe. If an enchantment was removed, that foe suffers from Bleeding for 5...25 seconds.
955.concise: Removes 1 enchantment. Removal effect: inflicts Bleeding (5...25 seconds).

957.name: Spell Shield
957.description: For 5...20 seconds, while you are casting spells, foes cannot target you with spells. When Spell Shield ends, all your skills are disabled for 10...5 seconds.
957.concise: (5...20 seconds.) While casting spells, you cannot be the target of spells. <gray>End effect: your skills are disabled (10...5 seconds).</gray>

958.name: Healing Whisper
958.description: Target other ally is healed for 40...100. This spell has half the normal range.
958.concise: Half Range Spell. Heals for 40...100. <gray>Cannot self-target.</gray>

959.name: Ethereal Light
959.description: Target ally is healed for 25...100. This spell is easily interrupted.

960.name: Release Enchantments
960.description: Lose all enchantments. Each party member is healed for 5...35 Health for each Monk enchantment lost.
960.concise: Removes all of your enchantments. Heals all party members for 5...35 for each Monk Enchantment removed.

961.name: Lacerate
961.description: Create a level 1...10 spirit. Bleeding creatures within its range suffer -2 Health degeneration. When this spirit dies, all non-spirit creatures within its range that have less than 90% Health begin Bleeding for 5...25 seconds. This spirit dies after 30...150 seconds.
961.concise: Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...150 second lifespan). Bleeding creatures in range have -2 Health degeneration. End effect: Inflicts Bleeding condition (5...25 seconds) on creatures in range that have less than 90% health. Does not affect spirits.

962.name: Spirit Transfer
962.description: The spirit nearest you loses 5...50 Health. Target ally is healed for 5 for each point of Health lost.
962.concise: The spirit nearest you loses 5...50 Health. Heals target ally for 5 for each point of Health lost.

963.name: Restoration
963.description: Create a level 1...14 spirit. When this spirit dies, all party members in the area are resurrected with 5...50% Health and zero Energy. This spirit dies after 30 seconds.
963.concise: Creates a level 1...14 spirit (30 second lifespan). End effect: resurrects party members in the area with 5...50% Health and zero Energy.

964.name: Vengeful Weapon
964.description: For 8 seconds, the next time target ally takes damage or life steal from a foe, that ally steals up to 15...60 Health from that foe.
964.concise: (8 seconds.) Steals 15...60 Health from the next foe that deals damage or life steal to target ally.

973.name: Blinding Powder
973.description: Must follow an off-hand attack. Target foe and all adjacent foes become Blinded for 3...15 seconds.
973.concise: Inflicts Blindness condition (3...15 seconds) on target and adjacent foes. <gray>Must follow an off-hand attack.</gray>

974.name: Mantis Touch
974.description: Must follow a lead attack. Target foe becomes Crippled for 5...20 seconds. This skill counts as an off-hand attack.
974.concise: Inflicts Crippled condition (5...20 seconds). This skill counts as an off-hand attack. <gray>Must follow a lead attack.</gray>

975.name: Exhausting Assault
975.description: Must follow a lead attack. Target foe's action is interrupted. If that action was casting a spell, target foe suffers 10 Overcast.
975.concise: Interrupts an action. Inflicts 10 Overcast if the interrupted action was a spell. <gray>Must follow a lead attack.</gray>

976.name: Repeating Strike
976.description: Must follow an off-hand attack. If it hits, this attack strikes for +10...30 damage. If it misses, it takes an additional 15 seconds to recharge.
976.concise: Deals +10...30 damage. <gray>This skill has +15 second recharge time if it misses. Must follow an off-hand attack.</gray>

977.name: Way of the Lotus
977.description: For 20 seconds, the next time you hit with a dual attack skill, you gain 5...20 Energy.
977.concise: (20 seconds.) You gain 5...20 Energy the next time you hit with a dual attack.

978.name: Mark of Instability
978.description: For 20 seconds, the next time you hit target foe with a dual attack skill that foe is knocked down.
978.concise: (20 seconds.) Causes knock-down the next time you hit target foe with a dual attack.

979.name: Mistrust
979.description: For 6 seconds, the next spell that target foe casts on one of your allies fails and deals 10...100 damage to that foe and all nearby foes.
979.concise: (6 seconds.) The next spell that target foe casts on one of your allies fails and deals 10...100 damage to target and nearby foes.

980.name: Feast of Souls
980.description: Destroy all nearby allies' spirits. For each spirit destroyed in this way, all party members are healed for 50...100 Health.
980.concise: Heals all party members for 50...100 for each nearby allied spirit. <gray>All nearby allied spirits are destroyed.</gray>

981.name: Recuperation
981.description: Create a level 1...14 spirit. Non-spirit allies within its range gain +1...3 Health regeneration. This spirit dies after 15...45 seconds.
981.concise: Creates a level 1...14 spirit (15...45 second lifespan). Non-spirit allies within range have +1...3 Health regeneration.

982.name: Shelter
982.description: Create a level 1...12 spirit. Non-spirit allies within its range cannot lose more than 10% maximum Health from a single attack. When this spirit prevents damage, it loses 75...45 Health. This spirit lasts 30...60 seconds.
982.concise: Creates a level 1...12 spirit (30...60 second lifespan). Non-spirit allies within range cannot lose more than 10% maximum Health from a single attack. <gray>Damage prevention cost: this spirit loses 75...45 Health.</gray>

983.name: Weapon of Shadow
983.description: For 1...7 seconds, target ally has a Weapon of Shadow. Whenever that ally is struck by an attack, that ally's attacker becomes Blinded for 5 seconds. The next 1...3 times <sic/> that ally hits with an attack, his target is Blinded for 5 seconds.
983.concise: (1...7 seconds.) Inflicts Blindness condition (5 seconds) on anyone who attacks target ally. Target ally's next 1...3 attacks inflict Blindness (5 seconds) if they hit.

985.name: Caltrops
985.description: Target foe and all foes adjacent to your target are Crippled for 5...15 seconds. Caltrops has half the normal range.
985.concise: Half Range Spell. Inflicts Crippled condition (5...15 seconds) on target and adjacent foes.

986.name: Nine Tail Strike
986.description: Must follow an off-hand attack. Nine Tail Strike cannot be blocked and strikes for +15...40 damage if it hits.
986.concise: Deals +15...40 damage. Unblockable. <gray>Must follow an off-hand attack.</gray>

987.name: Way of the Empty Palm
987.description: For 5...20 seconds, off-hand and dual attacks cost no Energy.
987.concise: (5...20 seconds.) Your off-hand and dual attacks cost no Energy.

988.name: Temple Strike
988.description: Must follow a lead attack. If this attack hits, target foe is Dazed and Blinded for 1...10 seconds, and if target foe is casting a spell, that foe is interrupted.
988.concise: Interrupts a spell. Inflicts Dazed and Blindness conditions (1...10 seconds). <gray>Must follow a lead attack.</gray>

989.name: Golden Phoenix Strike
989.description: If you are not under the effects of an enchantment, this skill misses. If it hits, Golden Phoenix Strike deals +10...30 damage and all adjacent foes take 10...30 damage.
989.concise: Deals +10...30 damage to target and deals 10...30 damage to adjacent foes. <gray>Fails if you are not enchanted.</gray>

990.name: Expunge Enchantments
990.description: Target foe loses 1 enchantment. All of your other non-attack skills are disabled for 10...5 seconds. For each skill disabled in this way, target touched foe loses 1 additional enchantment.
990.concise: Removes one enchantment for each non-attack skill you have. <gray>All your non-attack skills are disabled (10...5 seconds).</gray>

991.name: Deny Hexes
991.description: Remove one hex from target ally and one additional hex for each recharging Divine Favor skill you have.
991.concise: Removes one hex from target ally and one additional hex for each recharging Divine Favor skill you have.

992.name: Triple Chop
992.description: Attack target foe and adjacent foes. Each attack that hits deals +10...40 damage.
992.concise: Deals +10...40 damage. Also hits adjacent foes.

993.name: Enraged Smash
993.description: If Enraged Smash hits, you gain 1...4 strikes of adrenaline. If you hit a moving foe, you strike for +10...40 damage, and target foe is knocked down.
993.concise: Gives you 1...4 strikes of adrenaline if you hit. Deals +10...40 damage and causes knockdown if target foe was moving.

994.name: Renewing Smash
994.description: If Renewing Smash hits, it deals +10...40 damage. If you hit a knocked-down foe, you gain 3 Energy and this attack recharges instantly.
994.concise: Deals +10...40 damage. You gain 3 Energy and this attack recharges instantly if target foe was knocked down.

995.name: Tiger Stance
995.description: For 4...10 seconds, you attack 33% faster. Tiger Stance ends if any of your attacks fail to hit.
995.concise: (4...10 seconds.) You attack 33% faster. <gray>Ends if you fail to hit.</gray>

996.name: Standing Slash
996.description: If it hits, Standing Slash deals +5...20 damage plus an additional 5...20 damage if you are in a stance.
996.concise: Deals +5...20 damage. Deals 5...20 more damage if you are in a stance.

997.name: Famine
997.description: Create a level 1...10 spirit. Whenever a non-spirit creature in its range reaches 0 Energy, that creature takes 10...35 damage. This spirit dies after 30...90 seconds.
997.concise: Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...90 lifespan). Deals 10...35 damage to creatures in range that reach 0 energy. Does not affect spirits.

1018.name: Critical Eye
1018.description: For 10...35 seconds, you have an additional 3...15% chance to land a critical hit when attacking. You gain 1 Energy whenever you score a critical hit.
1018.concise: (10...35 seconds.) You have +3...15% chance to land a critical hit. You gain 1 Energy whenever you land a critical hit.

1019.name: Critical Strike
1019.description: Must follow an off-hand attack. If it hits, this attack strikes for +10...30 damage, results in a critical hit, and you gain 1...3 Energy.
1019.concise: Deals +10...30 damage. Automatic critical hit. You gain 1...3 Energy. <gray>Must follow an off-hand attack.</gray>

1020.name: Blades of Steel
1020.description: Must follow an off-hand attack. If it hits, this attack strikes for +5...16 damage (maximum bonus 60) for each recharging dagger attack.
1020.concise: Deals +5...16 damage (maximum 60) for each recharging dagger attack. <gray>Must follow an off-hand attack.</gray>

1021.name: Jungle Strike
1021.description: Must follow a lead attack. If it hits, this attack strikes for +10...25 damage. If it hits a foe that was Crippled, that foe and all adjacent foes take +1...31 damage.
1021.concise: Deals +10...25 damage. Deals +1...31 damage to target and adjacent foes if target foe is Crippled. <gray>Must follow a lead attack.</gray>

1022.name: Wild Strike
1022.description: Must follow a lead attack. If it hits, this attack strikes for +10...35 damage and any stance being used by target foe ends. This attack cannot be blocked.
1022.concise: Deals +10...35 damage. Removes target foe's stance. Unblockable. <gray>Must follow a lead attack.</gray>

1023.name: Leaping Mantis Sting
1023.description: If Mantis Sting hits, target foe takes +5...15 damage. If this attack strikes a moving foe, that foe is Crippled for 3...15 seconds.
1023.concise: Deals +5...15 damage. Inflicts Crippled condition (3...15 seconds) if target foe is moving.

1024.name: Black Mantis Thrust
1024.description: If this attack hits, you strike for +8...20 damage. If target foe is suffering from a Hex, that foe is Crippled for 3...15 seconds.
1024.concise: Deals +8...20 damage. Inflicts Crippled condition (3...15 seconds) if target foe is hexed.

1025.name: Disrupting Stab
1025.description: If this attack hits, it interrupts target foe's action. If that action was a spell, it is disabled for 3...10 seconds.
1025.concise: Interrupts an action. If the interrupted action was a spell, it is disabled (3...10 seconds).

1026.name: Golden Lotus Strike
1026.description: If it hits, this attack strikes for +5...20 damage. If you are under the effects of an Enchantment, you gain 5...8 Energy.
1026.concise: Deals +5...20 damage. You gain 5...8 Energy if you are enchanted.

1027.name: Critical Defenses
1027.description: For 4...10 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block. Critical Defenses refreshes every time you land a critical hit.
1027.concise: (4...10 seconds.) You have a 75% chance to block. Renewal: every time you land a critical hit.

1028.name: Way of Perfection
1028.description: For 60 seconds, whenever you successfully land a critical hit, you gain 10...40 Health.
1028.concise: (60 seconds.) Your critical hits heal you for 10...40.

1029.name: Dark Apostasy
1029.description: For 3...17 seconds, every time you successfully land a critical hit, you remove one enchantment from your target. If you remove an enchantment in this way, you lose 10...4 Energy or Dark Apostasy ends.
1029.concise: (3...17 seconds.) Your critical hits remove an enchantment. <gray>Removal cost: lose 10...4 Energy or Dark Apostasy ends.</gray>

1030.name: Locust's Fury
1030.description: For 10...35 seconds, you have an additional 50% chance to double strike while using daggers.
1030.concise: (10...35 seconds.) You have +50% chance to double strike. <gray>No effect unless you are wielding daggers.</gray>

1031.name: Shroud of Distress
1031.description: For 30...60 seconds, if you are below 50% Health, you have 3...8 health regeneration and a 75% chance to block attacks.
1031.concise: (30...60 seconds.) You have 3...8 health regeneration and a 75% chance to block. <gray>No effect unless your Health is below 50%.</gray>

1032.name: Heart of Shadow
1032.description: You are healed for 30...150. Shadow Step to a nearby location directly away from your target.
1032.concise: You are healed for 30...150 and you Shadow Step to a nearby location directly away from your target.

1033.name: Impale
1033.description: Must follow a dual attack. Target foe is struck for 25...100 earth damage and suffers from a Deep Wound for 5...20 seconds.
1033.concise: Deals 25...100 earth damage. Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...20 seconds). <gray>Must follow a dual attack.</gray>

1034.name: Seeping Wound
1034.description: For 1...7 seconds, target foe moves 33% slower. That foe takes 5...25 damage each second while suffering from a condition. This spell has half the normal range.
1034.concise: Elite Half Range Hex Spell. (1...7 seconds.) Target foe moves 33% slower. This foe takes 5...25 damage each second while suffering from a condition.

1035.name: Assassin's Promise
1035.description: For 5...15 seconds, if target foe dies, you gain 5...20 Energy and all your skills are recharged.
1035.concise: (5...15 seconds.) You gain 5...20 Energy and all your skills recharge if target foe dies.

1036.name: Signet of Malice
1036.description: For each condition suffered by target foe, you lose one condition.
1036.concise: You lose one condition for each condition on target foe.

1037.name: Dark Escape
1037.description: For 5...15 seconds, you move 25% faster and take half damage. Dark Escape ends if you successfully hit with an attack.
1037.concise: (5...15 seconds.) You move 25% faster and take half damage. <gray>Ends if you hit with an attack.</gray>

1038.name: Crippling Dagger
1038.description: Send out a Crippling Dagger at target foe. Crippling Dagger strikes for 15...60 earth damage if it hits, and Cripples moving foes for 3...15 seconds. This spell has half the normal range.
1038.concise: Half Range Spell. Projectile: deals 15...60 earth damage. Inflicts Crippled condition (3...15 seconds) if target foe is moving.

1041.name: Unseen Fury
1041.description: All adjacent foes are Blinded for 3...10 seconds. For 10...30 seconds, you cannot be blocked by Blinded foes.
1041.concise: Inflicts Blindness condition on adjacent foes (3...10). You cannot be blocked by Blinded foes for 10...30 seconds.

1042.name: Flashing Blades
1042.description: For 5...30 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block incoming attacks while attacking. If you block an attack in this way, your attacker takes 5...20 damage.
1042.concise: (5...30 seconds.) You have 75% chance to block while attacking. Block effect: 5...20 damage to your attacker.

1044.name: Dark Prison
1044.description: Shadow Step to target foe. For 1...6 seconds, that foe moves 33% slower.
1044.concise: Shadow Step to target foe. This foe moves 33% slower (1...6 seconds).

1045.name: Palm Strike
1045.description: Target touched foe takes 10...65 damage and is Crippled for 1...5 seconds. This skill counts as an off-hand attack.
1045.concise: Deals 10...65 damage and inflicts Crippled condition (1...5 seconds). This skill counts as an off-hand attack.

1048.name: Revealed Enchantment
1048.description: Remove an enchantment from target foe and gain 3...15 Energy. For 20 seconds, Revealed Enchantment is replaced with the enchantment removed from target foe.
1048.concise: Removes an enchantment from target foe. Removal effects: you gain 3...15 Energy; this spell is replaced with that enchantment (20 seconds).

1049.name: Revealed Hex
1049.description: Remove a hex from target ally and gain 4...10 Energy. For 20 seconds, Revealed Hex is replaced with the hex that was removed.
1049.concise: Removes a hex from target ally. Removal effects: you gain 4...10 Energy; this spell is replaced with that hex (20 seconds).

1052.name: Accumulated Pain
1052.description: Target foe takes 15...75 damage. If target foe is suffering from 2 or more hexes, that foe suffers a Deep Wound for 5...20 seconds.
1052.concise: Deals 15...75 damage. Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...20 seconds) if target foe has 2 or more hexes.

1053.name: Psychic Distraction
1053.description: All of your other skills are disabled for 8 seconds. If target foe is using a skill, that skill is interrupted and disabled for an additional 5...12 seconds.
1053.concise: Interrupts a skill. Interruption effect: disables interrupted skill (+5...12 seconds). <gray>Your other skills are disabled (8 seconds).</gray>

1054.name: Ancestor's Visage
1054.description: For 4...10 seconds, whenever target ally is hit by a melee attack, all adjacent foes lose all adrenaline and 3 Energy.
1054.concise: (4...10 seconds.) All adjacent foes lose all adrenaline and 3 Energy whenever a melee attack hits target ally.

1055.name: Recurring Insecurity
1055.description: For 10 seconds, target foe suffers from -1...5 Health degeneration. If that foe has another hex when Recurring Insecurity would end, it is reapplied.
1055.concise: (10 seconds.) Causes -1...5 Health degeneration. Renewal: if target foe has another hex when Recurring Insecurity would end.

1056.name: Kitah's Burden
1056.description: For 10 seconds, target foe moves 50% slower. When Kitah's Burden ends you gain 10...18 Energy.
1056.concise: (10 seconds.) Target foe moves 50% slower. End effect: you gain 10...18 Energy.

1057.name: Psychic Instability
1057.description: Interrupt the target foe's action. If that action was a skill, that foe and nearby foes are knocked down for 2...4 seconds. (50% failure chance with Fast Casting 4 or less.)
1057.concise: Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: if the action is a skill, cause knockdown for 2...4 seconds on target foe and all nearby foes. <gray>50% failure chance unless Fast Casting 5 or higher.</gray>

1059.name: Hex Eater Signet
1059.description: Target touched ally and up to 2...5 adjacent allies each lose one hex. You gain 1...4 Energy for each hex removed this way.
1059.concise: Touch Signet. Removes a hex from target and 2...5 adjacent allies. Removal effect: you gain 1...4 Energy for each hex removed.

1061.name: Feedback
1061.description: Target foe loses one enchantment. If an enchantment is removed in this way, that foe also loses 4...10 Energy.
1061.concise: Removes one enchantment. Removal effect: target foe loses 4...10 Energy.

1062.name: Arcane Larceny
1062.description: For 5...35 seconds, one random spell is disabled for target foe and Arcane Larceny is replaced by that spell.
1062.concise: (5...35 seconds.) Disables one random spell. This skill becomes that spell.

1066.name: Spoil Victor
1066.description: For 3...15 seconds, whenever target foe attacks or casts a spell on a creature with less Health, that foe loses 25...100 Health.
1066.concise: (3...15 seconds.) Causes 25...100 Health loss whenever target foe attacks or casts spells on a creature with less Health.

1067.name: Lifebane Strike
1067.description: Target foe takes 12...48 shadow damage. If that foe's Health is above 50%, you steal up to 12...48 Health.
1067.concise: Deals 12...48 damage. Steals 12...48 Health if target foe's Health is above 50%.

1068.name: Bitter Chill
1068.description: Target foe is struck for 15...60 cold damage. If that foe had more Health than you, Bitter Chill recharges instantly.
1068.concise: Deals 15...60 cold damage. Recharges instantly if target foe had more Health than you.

1069.name: Taste of Pain
1069.description: If target foe is below 50% Health, you gain 30...150 Health.
1069.concise: Heals you for 30...150. <gray>No effect unless target foe is below 50% Health.</gray>

1070.name: Defile Enchantments
1070.description: Target foe and all nearby foes take 6...60 shadow damage and 4...20 shadow damage for each enchantment on them.
1070.concise: Deals 6...60 damage to target and nearby foes. Deals 4...20 more damage for each enchantment on them.

1071.name: Shivers of Dread
1071.description: For 10...40 seconds, whenever target foe is struck for cold damage while using a skill, that foe is interrupted and you lose 10...5 Energy or Shivers of Dread ends.
1071.concise: (10...40 seconds.) Cold damage interrupts target foe's skills. <gray>Interruption cost: you lose 10...5 Energy or this hex ends.</gray>

1075.name: Vampiric Swarm
1075.description: Vampiric Swarm steals up to 15...60 Health from up to three foes in the area.
1075.concise: Steals 15...60 Health. Hits 2 additional foes in the area.

1076.name: Blood Drinker
1076.description: If your Health is above 50%, you begin Bleeding for 10 seconds. Steal up to 20...65 Health from target foe.
1076.concise: Steals 20...65 Health. <gray>You begin Bleeding (10 seconds) if your Health is above 50%.</gray>

1077.name: Vampiric Bite
1077.description: Touch target foe to steal up to 29...74 Health.

1079.name: Enfeebling Touch
1079.description: Target touched foe loses 5...50 Health and suffers from Weakness for 5...20 seconds.
1079.concise: Causes 5...50 Health loss. Inflicts Weakness condition (5...20 seconds).

1081.name: Teinai's Wind
1081.description: Target foe and all adjacent foes take 10...40 cold damage. Burning foes struck by Teinai's Wind take an additional 40...80 damage and are interrupted.
1081.concise: Deals 10...40 cold damage. Burning foes take +40...80 damage and are interrupted. Also strikes adjacent.

1082.name: Shock Arrow
1082.description: Send out a shocking arrow that flies swiftly toward target foe, striking for 5...50 lightning damage. If Shock Arrow strikes a foe suffering from Cracked Armor, you gain 5 Energy plus 1 Energy for every 2 ranks of Energy Storage. Shock Arrow has 25% armor penetration.
1082.concise: Rapid projectile: deals 5...50 lightning damage. Gain 5 Energy plus 1 Energy for every 2 ranks of Energy Storage if you hit a foe suffering from Cracked Armor. 25% armor penetration.

1083.name: Unsteady Ground
1083.description: You create Unsteady Ground at target foe's location. For 5 seconds, nearby foes take 10...40 earth damage each second. Attacking foes struck by Unsteady Ground are knocked down.
1083.concise: Deals 10...40 earth damage each second (5 seconds) and causes knock-down to attacking foes. Hits foes near target's initial location.

1084.name: Sliver Armor
1084.description: For 5...11 seconds, you have 25...50% chance to block attacks and whenever you are the target of a hostile spell or attack one nearby foe is struck for 5...35 earth damage.
1084.concise: (5...11 seconds.) You have 25...50% chance to block. Deals 5...35 earth damage to one nearby foe whenever you are the target of a hostile spell or attack.

1085.name: Ash Blast
1085.description: Target and adjacent foes are struck for 35...65 earth damage. Burning foes struck by Ash Blast are hexed for 5 seconds and have a 20...75% chance to miss with attacks.
1085.concise: Deals 35...65 earth damage. Burning foes are hexed for 5 seconds and miss 20...75% of attacks. Also strikes adjacent.

1086.name: Dragon's Stomp
1086.description: You invoke a Dragon's Stomp at target foe's location. All foes near this location are knocked down and are struck for 26...100 earth damage.
1086.concise: Deals 26...100 earth damage. Causes knock-down. Also hits foes near this foe.

1088.name: Second Wind
1088.description: You gain 1 Energy and 5 Health for each point of Energy restricted by Overcast. You lose all enchantments.
1088.concise: You gain 1 Energy and 5 Health for each point of Overcast. You lose all enchantments.

1090.name: Smoldering Embers
1090.description: Target foe is struck for 10...70 fire damage. If you are Overcast, that foe is hexed with Smoldering Embers for 3 seconds and takes 5...25 additional fire damage each second.
1090.concise: Deals 10...70 fire damage to target. If you are Overcast, foe is hexed for 3 seconds, taking 5...25 fire damage each second.

1091.name: Double Dragon
1091.description: Invoke the power of the Dragon. For 8 seconds, you and target ally are enchanted with Double Dragon. Adjacent foes are dealt 5...30 fire damage each second. Additionally, when you or your ally use skills that target a foe, that foe is set on fire for 0...3 seconds.
1091.concise: (8 seconds.) Enchants you and target ally. Adjacent foes take 5...30 fire damage each second. Skills that target a foe also inflict Burning (0...3 seconds).

1093.name: Teinai's Heat
1093.description: Place a ward of Teinai's Heat at your location for 10...15 seconds. Foes within the ward suffer 2...5 health <sic/> degeneration. Weakened foes attack 33% slower. This skill is disabled for 20 seconds.
1093.concise: (10...15 seconds.) Causes 2...5 health <sic/> degeneration. Weakened foes in the ward attack 33% slower. Disabled for 20 seconds.

1094.name: Breath of Fire
1094.description: Create Breath of Fire at target foe's current location. For 5 seconds, foes adjacent to that location are struck for 10...40 fire damage each second.
1094.concise: Deals 10...40 fire damage each second (5 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to target's initial location.

1095.name: Star Burst
1095.description: Target touched foe and all foes in the area are struck for 7...112 fire damage and set on fire for 1...4 seconds. For each foe you hit, gain 2 Energy.
1095.concise: Elite Touch Spell. Deals 7...112 fire damage. Inflicts Burning (1...4 seconds). <sic/> Gain 2 Energy for each foe struck. Also hits foes in the area.

1096.name: Glyph of Essence
1096.description: For 15 seconds, your next spell casts instantly but causes you to lose all Energy.
1096.concise: (15 seconds.) Your next spell casts instantly. <gray>You lose all Energy.</gray>

1097.name: Teinai's Prison
1097.description: For 1...6 seconds, target foe's legs are encased in ice, causing the foe to move 66% slower. If that foe has Cracked Armor, the chill seeps through causing -5...9 Health degeneration.
1097.concise: (1...6 seconds.) Target foe moves 66% slower. Foes with Cracked Armor have -5...9 Health degeneration.

1098.name: Mirror of Ice
1098.description: Shatter a Mirror of Ice. All foes near you and target ally take 15...70 cold damage and move 66% slower for 2...6 seconds. If you strike a foe hexed with Water Magic, Mirror of Ice recharges 50% faster.
1098.concise: Deals 15...70 cold damage and slows foes by 66% (2...6 seconds). Hits foes near you and target ally. Recharges 50% faster if it hits a foe hexed with Water Magic.

1099.name: Teinai's Crystals
1099.description: Target foe takes 20...40 damage. If target foe has a Water Magic hex, this spell strikes target and nearby foes for an additional 20...40 damage, and nearby foes also suffer Cracked Armor for 5...15 seconds.
1099.concise: Deals 20...40 damage to target. Deals +20...40 more <sic/> damage and causes Cracked Armor (5...15 seconds) nearby if that foe had a Water Magic hex.

1113.name: Kirin's Wrath
1113.description: For 5 seconds, foes adjacent to the location in which the spell was cast take 8...32 holy damage each second.
1113.concise: Deals 8...32 holy damage each second (5 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to your initial location.

1114.name: Spirit Bond
1114.description: For 8 seconds, whenever target ally takes more than 50 damage from the next 10 attacks or spells, that ally is healed for 30...90 Health.
1114.concise: (8 seconds.) Heals for 30...90 whenever target ally takes more than 50 damage. <gray>Ends after this ally takes damage from 10 attacks or spells.</gray>

1115.name: Air of Enchantment
1115.description: For 4...10 seconds, enchantments cast on target other ally cost 5 less Energy (minimum 1 Energy).
1115.concise: (4...10 seconds.) Enchantments cast on target ally cost 5 less Energy (minimum 1 Energy). <gray>Cannot self-target.</gray>

1117.name: Heaven's Delight
1117.description: Heals you and party members within earshot for 15...60 points.
1117.concise: Heals you and party members within earshot for 15...60 points.

1118.name: Healing Burst
1118.description: Target ally is healed for 10...160. All party members in earshot of your target gain Health equal to the Divine Favor bonus from this spell. Your Smiting Prayers are disabled for 20 seconds.
1118.concise: Heals for 10...160. Party members in earshot of your target gain Health equal to the Divine Favor bonus. <gray>Disables your Smiting Prayers (20 seconds).</gray>

1119.name: Karei's Healing Circle
1119.description: Heal yourself and all adjacent creatures for 30...180 points.
1119.concise: Heals you for 30...180. Also heals adjacent creatures.

1120.name: Jamei's Gaze
1120.description: Heal target other ally for 35...180 Health.

1121.name: Gift of Health
1121.description: All of your other Healing Prayers skills are disabled for 10...5 seconds. Target other ally is healed for 15...150 Health.
1121.concise: Heals for 15...150. <gray>Disables your other Healing Prayers skills (10...5 seconds). Cannot self-target.</gray>

1123.name: Life Sheath
1123.description: Remove 0...2 conditions from target ally. For 8 seconds, the next time that ally would take damage or life steal, that ally gains that amount of Health instead (maximum 20...100).
1123.concise: (8 seconds.) Converts the next incoming damage or life steal (maximum 20...100) to healing. Initial effect: Removes 0...2 conditions.

1126.name: Empathic Removal
1126.description: You and target other ally lose 1 condition and 1 hex, and are healed for 50.
1126.concise: Removes one condition and hex from target ally and yourself, and heals for 50. <gray>Cannot self-target.</gray>

1128.name: Resurrection Chant
1128.description: Resurrect target party member with up to your current Health and 5...35% Energy. This spell has half the normal range.
1128.concise: Half Range Spell. Resurrects target party member at your current Health and with 5...35% Energy.

1129.name: Word of Censure
1129.description: Target foe takes 15...75 holy damage. If your target was below 33% Health, Word of Censure takes 20 additional seconds to recharge.
1129.concise: Deals 15...75 holy damage. <gray>+20 recharge time if target foe is below 33% Health.</gray>

1130.name: Spear of Light
1130.description: Spear of Light flies toward target foe and deals 26...56 holy damage if it hits. Spear of Light deals +15...60 damage if it hits an attacking foe.
1130.concise: Projectile: deals 26...56 holy damage. Deals 15...60 more damage if target foe is attacking.

1131.name: Stonesoul Strike
1131.description: Touched target foe takes 10...55 holy damage. If knocked down, your target takes an additional 10...55 holy damage.
1131.concise: Deals 10...55 holy damage. Deals 10...55 more holy damage if target is knocked down.

1133.name: Drunken Blow
1133.description: If this attack hits, you strike for +10...40 damage and your target suffers from one of the following conditions: Deep Wound (for 20 seconds), Weakness (for 20 seconds), Bleeding (for 25 seconds), or Crippled (for 15 seconds). After making a Drunken Blow, you are knocked down.
1133.concise: Deals +10...40 damage. Inflicts one of the following random conditions: Deep Wound (20 seconds), Weakness (20 seconds), Bleeding (25 seconds), or Crippled (15 seconds). <gray>You are knocked-down.</gray>

1134.name: Leviathan's Sweep
1134.description: If this attack hits, you strike for +5...20 damage. If this attack is blocked, your target is knocked down and suffers 10...34 damage.
1134.concise: Deals +5...20 damage. Causes knock-down and deals 10...34 damage if blocked.

1135.name: Jaizhenju Strike
1135.description: If Jaizhenju Strike hits, you strike for +1...30 damage. If you are not using a stance, Jaizhenju Strike cannot be blocked.
1135.concise: Deals +1...30 damage. Unblockable unless you are in a stance.

1136.name: Penetrating Chop
1136.description: If this attack hits, you strike for +5...20 damage. This axe attack has 20% armor penetration.

1137.name: Yeti Smash
1137.description: Lose all adrenaline. Attack all adjacent foes. If this attack strikes a foe suffering from a condition, that foe is knocked down. (50% failure chance with Hammer Mastery 4 or less.)
1137.concise: Attack all adjacent foes. Knocks down foes suffering from a condition. <gray>You lose all adrenaline. 50% failure chance unless Hammer Mastery is 5 or more.</gray>

1141.name: "You Will Die!"
1141.description: If target foe is below 50% Health, you gain 1...3 strikes of adrenaline.
1141.concise: You gain 1...3 strikes of adrenaline. <gray>No effect unless target foe is under 50% Health.</gray>

1142.name: Auspicious Parry
1142.description: For 8 seconds, the next attack against you is blocked. You gain 1...4 strikes of adrenaline when this stance ends.
1142.concise: (8 seconds.) Blocks one attack. End effect: you gain 1...4 strikes of adrenaline.

1144.name: Silverwing Slash
1144.description: This attack strikes for +1...40 damage if it hits.

1146.name: Shove
1146.description: Target touched foe is knocked down. If that foe was moving, that foe's stance ends and that foe takes 15...75 damage before being knocked down.
1146.concise: Causes knockdown. Initial effect: ends foe's stance and deals 15...75 damage if target foe is moving.

1191.name: Sundering Attack
1191.description: If Sundering Attack hits, you strike for +5...25 damage and this attack has 10% armor penetration.

1192.name: Zojun's Shot
1192.description: Shoot an arrow that has half the normal range, but strikes for +10...40 damage.
1192.concise: Half Range Bow Attack. Deals +10...40 damage.

1194.name: Predatory Bond
1194.description: For 5...20 seconds, your animal companion attacks 25% faster and heals you for 1...31 Health with each successful attack.
1194.concise: (5...20 seconds.) Your pet attacks 25% faster and you gain 1...31 Health whenever your pet makes a successful attack.

1195.name: Heal as One
1195.description: For 15 seconds, your animal companion steals 1...20 Health whenever it hits with an attack. You and your companion are both healed for 20...104 Health. If your companion is dead, it's resurrected with 50% Health. If you have this skill equipped, your companion will travel with you.
1195.concise: (15 seconds.) Your pet's attacks steal 1...20 Health. Initial effect: heals you and your pet for 20...104; resurrects your pet (50% Health) if dead. If you have this equipped, your pet will travel with you.

1196.name: Zojun's Haste
1196.description: For 5...11 seconds, you move 33% faster and have a 27...75% chance to block incoming projectiles. Zojun's Haste ends if you attack.
1196.concise: (5...11 seconds.) You move 33% faster and have 27...75% chance to block projectiles. <gray>Ends if you attack.</gray>

1197.name: Needling Shot
1197.description: Needling Shot strikes for only 10...30 damage and moves faster than normal. If Needling Shot strikes a foe below 50% Health, Needling Shot recharges instantly. Your other attack skills are disabled for 2 seconds.
1197.concise: Fast-moving arrow. Deals 10...30 damage. Recharges instantly if target foe is below 50% Health. <gray>Your other attack skills are disabled (2 seconds).</gray>

1198.name: Broad Head Arrow
1198.description: You shoot a broad head arrow that moves slower than normal. If it hits, target foe is Dazed for 5...20 seconds, and if target foe is casting a spell that spell is interrupted.
1198.concise: Slow moving arrow. Interrupts a spell. Inflicts Dazed condition (5...20 seconds).

1199.name: Glass Arrows
1199.description: For 10...35 seconds, your arrows strike for +5...20 damage if they hit and cause Bleeding for 10...20 seconds if they are blocked.
1199.concise: (10...35 seconds.) Your arrows deal +5...20 damage. Inflicts Bleeding condition if blocked (10...20 seconds).

1200.name: Archer's Signet
1200.description: For 1...24 seconds, conditions you apply while wielding a bow last 100% longer.
1200.concise: (1...24 seconds.) Conditions you apply while wielding a bow last 100% longer.

1201.name: Savage Pounce
1201.description: Your animal companion attempts a Savage Pounce that deals +5...20 damage. If the attack strikes a foe who is casting a spell, that foe is knocked down.
1201.concise: Deals +5...20 damage. Causes knock-down if target foe is casting a spell.

1202.name: Enraged Lunge
1202.description: Your animal companion attempts an Enraged Lunge that applies a Deep Wound to target foe for 5...20 seconds and deals +10...50 damage.
1202.concise: Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...20 seconds) and deals +10...50 damage.

1203.name: Bestial Mauling
1203.description: Your animal companion attempts a Bestial Mauling that deals +5...20 damage. If the attack strikes a knocked-down foe, that foe is Dazed for 4...10 seconds.
1203.concise: Deals +5...20 damage. Inflicts Dazed condition (4...10 seconds) if target foe is knocked-down.

1205.name: Poisonous Bite
1205.description: Your animal companion attempts a Poisonous Bite that Poisons target foe for 5...20 seconds.

1206.name: Pounce
1206.description: Your animal companion's next attack is a Pounce that deals +5...20 damage. If the attack strikes a moving foe, that foe is knocked down.
1206.concise: Deals +5...20 damage. Causes knock-down if target foe is moving.

1209.name: Bestial Fury
1209.description: All your non-attack skills are disabled for 5 seconds. For 5...11 seconds, you attack 25% faster.
1209.concise: (5...11 seconds.) You attack 25% faster. <gray>Your non-attack skills are disabled (5 seconds).</gray>

1211.name: Viper's Nest
1211.description: Create a Viper's Nest. When it is triggered, all nearby foes are struck for 5...35 piercing damage and become Poisoned for 5...20 seconds. Viper's Nest expires after 90 seconds. This Trap is easily interrupted.
1211.concise: (90 seconds.) Affects nearby foes. Deals 5...35 piercing damage. Inflicts Poisoned condition (5...20 seconds). <gray>Easily interrupted.</gray>

1212.name: Equinox
1212.description: Create a level 1...10 spirit. Spells cast within its range that cause Overcast cause an additional 10 Overcast. This spirit dies after 30...150 seconds.
1212.concise: Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...150 second lifespan). Overcast-causing spells cast within range cause an additional 10 Overcast.

1213.name: Tranquility
1213.description: Create a level 1...10 spirit. Enchantments cast by non-spirit creatures within its range expire 20...50% faster. This spirit dies after 15...60 seconds.
1213.concise: Creates a level 1...10 spirit (15...60 second lifespan). Enchantments expire 20...50% faster on creatures in range. Does not affect spirits.

1215.name: Clamor of Souls
1215.description: Target foe and all nearby foes take 10...65 lightning damage. If you are within earshot of a spirit or holding a bundle item, you gain 10 Energy.
1215.concise: Deals 10...65 lightning damage to target and nearby foes. You gain 10 Energy if you are within earshot of a spirit or holding a bundle item.

1217.name: Ritual Lord
1217.description: For 5...35 seconds, your Ritualist attributes are boosted by 2...4 for your next skill. If that skill is a Binding Ritual, it recharges 10...60% faster and Ritual Lord recharges instantly.
1217.concise: (5...35 seconds.) You have +2...4 to all Ritualist attributes for your next skill. If that skill is a Binding Ritual, it recharges 10...60% faster and Ritual Lord recharges instantly.

1218.name: Cruel Was Daoshen
1218.description: Hold Daoshen's ashes for up to 15...60 seconds. While you hold his ashes, all Ritualist skills have 10% armor penetration. When you drop his ashes, all nearby foes are struck for 15...85 lightning damage.
1218.concise: (15...60 seconds.) Your Ritualist skills have 10% armor penetration. Drop effect: deals 15...85 lightning damage to all nearby foes.

1219.name: Protective Was Kaolai
1219.description: Hold Kaolai's ashes for up to 15...60 seconds. While you hold his ashes, you gain 10 armor. When you drop his ashes, all party members are healed for 10...85 Health.
1219.concise: (15...60 seconds.) You have +10 armor. Drop effect: all party members are healed for 10...85.

1220.name: Attuned Was Songkai
1220.description: Hold Songkai's ashes for up to 45 seconds. While you hold her ashes, your spells and binding rituals cost 5...50% of the base Energy to cast.
1220.concise: (45 seconds.) Your spells and binding rituals cost 5...50% of the base Energy.

1221.name: Resilient Was Xiko
1221.description: Hold Xiko's ashes for up to 5...20 seconds. For each hex or condition you are suffering from while holding her ashes, you gain +3 Health regeneration. When you drop her ashes, you lose 1...4 conditions.<sic/>
1221.concise: (5...20 seconds.) You have +3 Health regeneration for each hex or condition on you. Drop effect: you lose 1...4 conditions.

1222.name: Lively Was Naomei
1222.description: Hold Naomei's ashes for up to 45 seconds. When you drop her ashes, all party members in the area are resurrected with 15...75% Health and zero Energy.
1222.concise: (45 seconds.) Drop effect: resurrects party members in the area (15...75% Health and zero Energy).

1223.name: Anguished Was Lingwah
1223.description: Hold Lingwah's ashes for up to 10...60 seconds. While you hold her ashes, your Ritualist hexes cost 1...5 less energy and last 33% longer. When you drop her ashes all your Ritualist hexes are recharged.
1223.concise: (10...60 seconds.) Your Ritualist hexes cost 1...5 less energy and last 33% longer. Drop effect: all your Ritualist hexes are recharged.

1224.name: Draw Spirit
1224.description: Teleport target allied spirit to your location.
1224.concise: Teleports target allied spirit to your location.

1225.name: Channeled Strike
1225.description: Target foe is struck for 5...95 lightning damage. That foe is struck for an additional 5...35 lightning damage if you are holding an item.
1225.concise: Deals 5...95 lightning damage. Deals 5...35 additional lightning damage if you are holding an item.

1226.name: Spirit Boon Strike
1226.description: Target foe is struck for 20...65 lightning damage, and all spirits you control within earshot gain 20...65 Health.
1226.concise: Deals 20...65 lightning damage. Spirits you control within earshot gain 20...65 Health.

1227.name: Essence Strike
1227.description: Target foe is struck for 15...60 lightning damage. If any spirits are within earshot, you gain 1...9 Energy.
1227.concise: Deals 15...60 lightning damage. You gain 1...9 Energy if any spirits are within earshot.

1228.name: Spirit Siphon
1228.description: The spirit nearest you loses all Energy. You gain 15...50% of that Energy.
1228.concise: The spirit nearest you loses all Energy. You gain 15...50% of that Energy.

1229.name: Explosive Growth
1229.description: For 15...60 seconds, whenever you create a creature, up to 5 foes near that creature are struck for 20...65 lightning damage.
1229.concise: (15...60 seconds.) Deals 20...65 lightning damage each time you create a creature to 5 foes near that creature.

1230.name: Boon of Creation
1230.description: For 15...60 seconds, whenever you create a creature, you gain 5...50 Health and 1...6 Energy.
1230.concise: (15...60 seconds.) You gain 5...50 Health and 1...6 Energy whenever you create a creature.

1231.name: Spirit Channeling
1231.description: For 12 seconds, you have +1...6 Energy regeneration. When you cast this spell, you gain 3...12 Energy if you are within earshot of a spirit.
1231.concise: (12 seconds.) You have +1...6 Energy regeneration. Initial effect: you gain 3...12 Energy if you are within earshot of a spirit.

1232.name: Armor of Unfeeling
1232.description: For 10...35 seconds, your spirits within earshot take 50% less damage and are immune to critical attacks.
1232.concise: (10...35 seconds.) Your spirits within earshot take 50% less damage and are immune to critical attacks.

1233.name: Soothing Memories
1233.description: Target ally is healed for 10...100 Health. If you are holding an item, you gain 3 Energy.
1233.concise: Heals for 10...100. You gain 3 Energy if you are holding an item.

1234.name: Mend Body and Soul
1234.description: Target ally is healed for 20...115 Health. That ally loses one condition for each spirit within earshot.
1234.concise: Heals for 20...115. Removes one condition for each spirit within earshot.

1235.name: Dulled Weapon
1235.description: For 5...15 seconds, target foe and all adjacent foes cannot achieve a critical hit and deal 1...15 less damage.
1235.concise: Also hexes foes adjacent to your target (5...15 seconds). Removes ability to land a critical hit. Reduces damage by 1...15.

1236.name: Binding Chains
1236.description: For 3 seconds, target foe and all nearby foes move 90% slower and take 1...30 damage each second while moving.
1236.concise: Also hexes foes near your target. (3 seconds.) These foes move 90% slower and takes 1...30 damage each second while moving.

1237.name: Painful Bond
1237.description: For 10...20 seconds, target foe and all nearby foes are hexed with Painful Bond and take 8...20 damage whenever hit by a spirit's attack.
1237.concise: Also hexes foes near your target (10...20 seconds). Spirits do 8...20 more damage against these foes.

1238.name: Signet of Creation
1238.description: You gain 4 Energy for every summoned creature you control within earshot (maximum 3...12 Energy).
1238.concise: Gain 4 Energy (maximum 3...12 Energy) for each summoned creature you control within earshot.

1239.name: Signet of Spirits
1239.description: Create 3 level 1...12 spirits. These spirits deal 5...20 damage with attacks and die after 60 seconds.
1239.concise: Creates 3 level 1...12 spirits (60 second lifespan). These spirits deal 5...20 damage with attacks.

1240.name: Soul Twisting
1240.description: For 5...45 seconds, your Binding Rituals cost 15 less Energy (minimum 10) and recharge instantly. Soul Twisting ends after 1...3 Binding Rituals.
1240.concise: (5...45 seconds.) Your Binding Rituals cost 15 less Energy (minimum 10) and recharge instantly. <gray>Ends after 1...3 Binding Rituals.</gray>

1244.name: Ghostly Haste
1244.description: For 5...20 seconds, spells you cast while within earshot of a spirit recharge 25% faster.
1244.concise: (5...20 seconds.) Spells you cast recharge 25% faster. <gray>No effect unless you are within earshot of a spirit.</gray>

1245.name: Gaze from Beyond
1245.description: Target foe is struck for 20...65 lightning damage. If you are within earshot of a spirit, that foe is Blinded for 2...6 seconds.
1245.concise: Deals 20...65 lightning damage. Inflicts Blindness condition for 2...6 seconds if you are within earshot of a spirit.

1246.name: Ancestors' Rage
1246.description: For 1 second, nothing happens. When this skill ends, all foes adjacent to target ally are struck for 5...110 lightning damage.
1246.concise: (1 second.) End Effect: deals 5...110 lightning damage to foes adjacent to target ally.

1247.name: Pain
1247.description: Create a level 1...12 spirit. This spirit's attacks deal 5...30 damage. This spirit dies after 30...150 seconds.
1247.concise: Creates a level 1...12 spirit (30...150 second lifespan). Its attacks deal 5...30 damage.

1249.name: Displacement
1249.description: Create a level 1...14 spirit. All non-spirit allies within its range have a 75% chance to block incoming attacks. Every time an attack is blocked in this way, this spirit takes 60 damage. This spirit dies after 30...60 seconds.
1249.concise: Creates a level 1...14 spirit (30...60 second lifespan). Non-spirit allies within range have 75% chance to block. <gray>Block effect: this spirit takes 60 damage.</gray>

1250.name: Preservation
1250.description: Create a level 1...14 spirit. Every 4 seconds, this spirit heals one non-spirit ally in the area for 10...115 Health. This spirit dies after 90 seconds.
1250.concise: Creates a level 1...14 spirit (90 second lifespan). Every 4 seconds this spirit heals one non-spirit ally for 10...115.

1251.name: Life
1251.description: Create a level 1...14 spirit. When this spirit dies, all non-spirit allies within its range are healed for 1...7 Health for each second this spirit was alive. This spirit dies after 20 seconds.
1251.concise: Creates a level 1...14 spirit (20 second lifespan). Affects non-spirit allies within range. End effect: heals for 1...7 for each second this spirit was alive.

1252.name: Earthbind
1252.description: Create a level 1...14 spirit. All non-spirit foes knocked down within its range are knocked down for at least 3 seconds. Whenever this happens, this spirit loses 50...25 Health. This spirit dies after 15...45 seconds.
1252.concise: Creates a level 1...14 spirit (15...45 second lifespan). Any time non-spirit foes within range are knocked down, they are knocked down for at least 3 seconds. <gray>Knock-down cost: this spirit loses 50...25 Health.</gray>

1253.name: Bloodsong
1253.description: Create a level 1...12 spirit who dies after 30...150 seconds. Attacks by that spirit steal up to 5...25 Health.
1253.concise: Creates a level 1...12 spirit (30...150 second lifespan). Its attacks steal 5...25 Health.

1255.name: Wanderlust
1255.description: Create a level 1...12 spirit. Whenever this spirit's attack hits a stationary foe, that foe is knocked down and the spirit loses 70...50 Health. This spirit dies after 30...60 seconds.
1255.concise: Creates a level 1...12 spirit (30...60 second lifespan). Its attacks against stationary foes cause knock-down. <gray>Knock-down cost: this spirit loses 70...50 Health.</gray>

1257.name: Spirit Light Weapon
1257.description: For 10 seconds, target ally gains 1...15 Health per second and an additional 1...15 Health per second if that ally is within earshot of a spirit.
1257.concise: (10 seconds.) Target ally gains 1...15 Health each second. 1...15 more healing per second while within earshot of a spirit.

1258.name: Brutal Weapon
1258.description: Give target ally a Brutal Weapon for 10...40 seconds. The bearer's weapon strikes for +5...15 damage as long as the bearer is under no enchantments.
1258.concise: (10...40 seconds.) Attacks deal +5...15 damage. <gray>No effect while target ally is enchanted.</gray>

1259.name: Guided Weapon
1259.description: For 4...10 seconds, target ally's attacks cannot be blocked.

1260.name: Meekness
1260.description: For 5...30 seconds, target foe and all foes in the area attack 50% slower.
1260.concise: Also hexes foes in the area of target (5...30 seconds). These foes attack 50% slower.

1261.name: Frigid Armor
1261.description: For 10...25 seconds, you have +10...40 armor against physical damage and cannot be set on fire.
1261.concise: (10...25 seconds.) You have +10...40 armor against physical damage and immunity to Burning.

1262.name: Healing Ring
1262.description: Heal adjacent creatures for 30...180 Health. The caster is not healed.
1262.concise: Heals adjacent allies and foes for 30...180. <gray>The caster is not healed.</gray>

1263.name: Renew Life
1263.description: Resurrect target touched dead target <sic/> party member with 50% Health and 5...20% Energy. That party member and all allies within earshot are healed for 55...130 Health.
1263.concise: Touch Spell. Resurrects target party member (50% Health and 5...20% Energy). Heals allies within earshot for 55...130.

1264.name: Doom
1264.description: Strike target foe for 10...40 lightning (maximum 135) damage for every recharging binding ritual you have.
1264.concise: Deals 10...40 lightning damage (maximum 135) for each of your recharging binding rituals.

1265.name: Wielder's Boon
1265.description: Heal target ally for 15...60 points. If that ally is under the effects of a weapon spell, Wielder's Boon heals for an additional 15...75 Health.
1265.concise: Heals for 15...60. Heals for 15...75 more if this ally is under a Weapon <sic/> spell.

1266.name: Soothing
1266.description: Create a level 1...12 spirit. All foes within its range take twice as long to build adrenaline. This spirit dies after 15...45 seconds.
1266.concise: Creates a level 1...12 spirit (15...45 second lifespan). Building adrenaline takes twice as long for foes within range.

1267.name: Vital Weapon
1267.description: For 5...30 seconds, target ally has a Vital Weapon and has +40...175 maximum Health.

1268.name: Weapon of Quickening
1268.description: For 5...25 seconds, target ally has a Weapon of Quickening, and spells and binding rituals recharge 33% faster.
1268.concise: (5...25 seconds.) Spells and binding rituals recharge 33% faster.

1269.name: Signet of Rage
1269.description: Target foe takes 5...50 holy damage and +5...10 holy damage for each adrenaline skill that foe has.
1269.concise: Deals 5...50 holy damage. Deals 5...10 more holy damage for each of target foe's adrenaline skills.

1333.name: Extend Conditions
1333.description: Spread all conditions from target foe to foes near your target. The durations of those conditions are increased by 5...100% (maximum 30 seconds).
1333.concise: Spread all conditions from target foe to foes near your target. Those <sic/> durations of those conditions are increased by 5...100% (maximum 30 seconds).

1334.name: Hypochondria
1334.description: Transfer all conditions from all foes in the area to target foe.
1334.concise: Transfer all conditions from foes in the area to target foe.

1335.name: Wastrel's Demise
1335.description: For 5 seconds, target foe is hexed with Wastrel's Demise. Each second while hexed, target foe and all foes adjacent to that foe take 1...10 damage and an additional 1...10 damage for each second this spell is in effect. This hex ends prematurely if target foe uses a skill.
1335.concise: (5 seconds.) Each second while hexed, target foe and all foes adjacent to that foe take 1...10 damage. Foes take +1...10 damage each second this hex is in effect. <gray>Ends early if target foe uses a skill.</gray>

1336.name: Spiritual Pain
1336.description: Target foe takes 15...75 damage. All hostile summoned creatures in the area of that foe take 25...125 damage.
1336.concise: Deals 15...75 damage. Deals 25...125 damage to hostile summoned creatures in the area of your target foe.

1337.name: Drain Delusions
1337.description: Remove one Mesmer hex from target foe. If a hex was removed in this way, that foe loses 1...5 Energy and you gain 4 Energy for each point lost.
1337.concise: Removes one Mesmer hex from target foe. Causes 1...5 Energy loss. You gain 4 Energy for each point lost. <gray>No effect unless a hex was removed.</gray>

1338.name: Persistence of Memory
1338.description: For 5...20 seconds, whenever a spell you cast is interrupted, that spell is instantly recharged.
1338.concise: (5...20 seconds.) Your interrupted spells recharge instantly.

1339.name: Symbols of Inspiration
1339.description: For 1...31 seconds, this skill becomes the Elite of target foe. Elite spells you cast use your Fast Casting attribute instead of their normal attributes.
1339.concise: (1...31 seconds.) This skill becomes the Elite of target foe. Elite spells you cast use your Fast Casting attribute instead of their normal attributes.

1340.name: Symbolic Celerity
1340.description: For 36...60 seconds, all of your signets use your Fast Casting attribute instead of their normal attributes.
1340.concise: (36...60 seconds.) Your signets use your Fast Casting attribute.

1341.name: Frustration
1341.description: For 5...20 seconds, target foe casts spells 50% slower and takes 5...50 damage whenever interrupted. If a skill is interrupted, Frustration deals double damage.
1341.concise: (5...20 seconds.) Causes 50% slower spell casting. Target foe takes 5...50 damage whenever interrupted. Deals double damage on skill interrupt.

1342.name: Tease
1342.description: If target foe is using a skill, that foe and other foes in the area are interrupted and you steal 0...5 Energy from all foes in the area.
1342.concise: Interrupts a skill. Interruption effect: also interrupts other foes in the area, and you steal 0...5 Energy from all foes in the area.

1343.name: Ether Phantom
1343.description: For 10 seconds, target foe has -1 Energy degeneration. If this hex is removed prematurely, that foe loses 1...5 Energy.
1343.concise: (10 seconds.) Causes -1 Energy degeneration. Causes 1...5 Energy loss if this hex ends early.

1344.name: Web of Disruption
1344.description: Interrupt target foe. For 10 seconds, target foe is hexed with Web of Disruption. When this hex ends, that foe is interrupted again.
1344.concise: (10 seconds.) Initial effect: interrupts a skill. End effect: interrupts a skill.

1345.name: Enchanter's Conundrum
1345.description: For 10 seconds, target foe casts enchantments 100...200% slower. If target foe is not under the effects of an enchantment when this hex is applied, that foe and all adjacent foes take 10...100 damage.
1345.concise: Causes 100...200% slower enchantment casting (10 seconds). Initial effect: deals 10...100 damage to target and adjacent foes if target foe is not enchanted.

1346.name: Signet of Illusions
1346.description: Your next 1...3 spells use your Illusion attribute instead of its normal attribute.
1346.concise: Your next 1...3 spells use your Illusion attribute instead of its normal attribute.

1347.name: Discharge Enchantment
1347.description: Remove one enchantment from target foe. If that foe is hexed, this skill recharges 20...50% faster.
1347.concise: Removes one enchantment from target foe. 20...50% faster recharge if that foe was hexed.

1348.name: Hex Eater Vortex
1348.description: Remove a hex from target ally. If a hex is removed in this way, foes near that ally take 30...90 damage and lose one enchantment.
1348.concise: Removes one hex from target ally. Removal effect: deals 30...90 damage and removes one enchantment from foes near this ally.

1349.name: Mirror of Disenchantment
1349.description: Remove one enchantment from target foe. All of that foe's party members also lose that same enchantment.
1349.concise: Removes one enchantment from target foe. That foe's party members also lose this enchantment.

1350.name: Simple Thievery
1350.description: Interrupt target foe's action. If that action was a skill, that skill is disabled for 5...20 seconds, and Simple Thievery is replaced by that skill.
1350.concise: Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: If a skill was interrupted, that skill is disabled and Simple Thievery becomes that skill (5...20 seconds).

1351.name: Animate Shambling Horror
1351.description: Exploit nearest corpse to create a level 1...17 shambling horror. When the shambling horror dies, it is replaced by a level 0...15 jagged horror that causes Bleeding with each of its attacks.
1351.concise: Creates a level 1...17 shambling horror. When the shambling horror dies, it is replaced by a level 0...15 jagged horror that causes Bleeding with each of its attacks. <gray>Exploits a fresh corpse.</gray>

1352.name: Order of Undeath
1352.description: For 5 seconds, your minions deal +3...16 damage, but you lose 2% of your maximum Health whenever one of your minions hits with an attack.
1352.concise: (5 seconds.) Your undead servants deal +3...16 damage. <gray>You lose 2% of your maximum Health whenever your servants hit.</gray>

1353.name: Putrid Flesh
1353.description: Destroy one of your target animated undead minions. All foes near that creature are Diseased for 5...15 seconds.
1353.concise: Destroys one of your undead servants. Inflicts Diseased condition (5...15 seconds) to foes near this servant.

1354.name: Feast for the Dead
1354.description: Destroy target animated undead ally. All of your other animated undead allies are healed for 10...100 Health.
1354.concise: Destroys one of your undead servants. Heals your servants for 10...100.

1355.name: Jagged Bones
1355.description: For 30 seconds, whenever target undead servant dies, it is replaced by a level 0...15 jagged horror that causes Bleeding with each of its attacks.
1355.concise: (30 seconds.) When target undead servant dies, it is replaced by a level 0...15 jagged horror that inflicts Bleeding with attacks.

1356.name: Contagion
1356.description: For 60 seconds, whenever you suffer from a new condition, all foes in the area suffer from that same condition and you sacrifice 10...5% maximum Health.
1356.concise: (60 seconds.) Whenever you gain a condition, all foes in the area gain that same condition. <gray>You sacrifice 10...5% maximum Health each time this happens.</gray>

1358.name: Ulcerous Lungs
1358.description: For 10...25 seconds, target foe and all nearby foes suffer from -4 Health degeneration when Bleeding, and whenever they use a shout or chant, they Bleed for 3...15 seconds.
1358.concise: Also hexes foes near your target (10...25 seconds). Causes -4 Health degeneration to any of these foes that are Bleeding. Inflicts Bleeding (3...15 seconds) whenever these foes use a shout or chant.

1359.name: Pain of Disenchantment
1359.description: Target foe loses 1...3 enchantments. If an enchantment was lost in this way, that foe and all adjacent foes lose 10...100 Health.
1359.concise: Target foe loses 1...3 enchantments. Removal effect: that foe and all adjacent foes lose 10...100 Health.

1360.name: Mark of Fury
1360.description: For 5 seconds, allies hitting target foe gain 0...2 strikes of adrenaline. When this hex ends, that foe suffers from Cracked Armor for 1...15 seconds.
1360.concise: (5 seconds.) Allies hitting target foe gain 0...2 strikes of adrenaline. End effect: inflicts Cracked Armor (1...15 seconds.)

1362.name: Corrupt Enchantment
1362.description: Remove one enchantment from target foe. If an enchantment is removed in this way, that foe suffers from -1...8 Health degeneration for 10 seconds.
1362.concise: Removes one enchantment from target foe. Removal effect: -1...8 Health degeneration (10 seconds).

1363.name: Signet of Sorrow
1363.description: Target foe takes 15...75 damage. If target foe is near a corpse or has a dead pet, this skill recharges instantly.
1363.concise: Deals 15...75 damage. Recharges instantly if target foe is near a corpse or has a dead pet.

1364.name: Signet of Suffering
1364.description: You suffer from Bleeding for 6 seconds. The next Necromancer skill that targets a foe causes Bleeding for 2...16 seconds.
1364.concise: You Bleed for 6 seconds. Applies Bleeding (2...16 seconds) to the target of your next Necromancer skill.

1365.name: Signet of Lost Souls
1365.description: If target foe is below 50% Health, you gain 10...100 Health and 1...10 Energy.
1365.concise: You gain 10...100 Health and 1...10 Energy if target foe is below 50% Health.

1366.name: Well of Darkness
1366.description: Exploit nearest corpse to create a Well of Darkness for 5...50 seconds. Hexed foes within the Well of Darkness miss 50% of the time.
1366.concise: (5...50 seconds.) Hexed foes in this well have 50% chance to miss. <gray>Exploits a fresh corpse</gray>.

1367.name: Blinding Surge
1367.description: Target foe is struck for 5...50 lightning damage. That foe and all adjacent foes are Blinded for 3...8 seconds. This spell has 25% armor penetration. If this spell strikes an attacking foe, all adjacent foes are also struck and this spell deals 50% more damage.
1367.concise: Deals 5...50 lightning damage. Inflicts Blindness condition (3...8 seconds) on target and adjacent foes. 25% armor penetration. If target was attacking, also hits adjacent foes and deals 50% more damage.

1368.name: Chilling Winds
1368.description: Target foe and all adjacent foes are struck for 30...60 cold damage. For 10 seconds, the next Water Magic hex targeting a hexed foe lasts 25...100% longer.
1368.concise: (10 seconds.) The next water hex on target foe lasts 25...100% longer. Initial effect: 30...60 cold damage. Also strikes adjacent.

1369.name: Lightning Bolt
