1369.description: Send out a Lightning Bolt that strikes for 5...50 lightning damage if it hits. If Lightning Bolt strikes a moving foe, that foe is struck for 5...50 additional lightning damage. This spell has 25% armor penetration.
1369.concise: Projectile: deals 5...50 lightning damage. Deals 5...50 more lightning damage if target foe is moving. 25% armor penetration.

1370.name: Storm Djinn's Haste
1370.description: For 10...25 seconds, you move 25% faster. Each second that you are moving, you lose 1 Energy.
1370.concise: (10...25 seconds.) You move 25% faster. <gray>Lose 1 Energy each second while moving.</gray>

1371.name: Stone Striker
1371.description: For 5...30 seconds, whenever you take or deal elemental or physical damage, that damage is converted to earth damage.
1371.concise: (5...30 seconds.) Converts elemental and physical damage you take or deal to earth damage.

1372.name: Sandstorm
1372.description: Create a Sandstorm at target foe's location. For 10 seconds, nearby foes are struck for 10...30 earth damage each second and attacking foes are struck for an additional 10...30 earth damage each second.
1372.concise: Deals 10...30 earth damage each second (10 seconds). Hits foes near target foe's initial location. Hits attacking foes for 10...30 more earth damage each second.

1373.name: Stone Sheath
1373.description: For 5...20 seconds, you and target ally have +1...30 armor and are immune to critical hits. When you cast this spell, all foes near you and your target take 15...70 earth damage and are Weakened for 5...20 seconds.
1373.concise: (5...20 seconds.) Gives you and target ally +1...30 armor and immunity to critical hits. Initial effect: Foes near you and target ally are struck for 15...70 earth damage and are Weakened (5...20 seconds).

1374.name: Ebon Hawk
1374.description: Send a projectile that strikes target foe for 10...85 earth damage and causes Weakness for 5...15 seconds if it hits.
1374.concise: Projectile: deals 10...85 earth damage and inflicts Weakness condition (5...15 seconds).

1375.name: Stoneflesh Aura
1375.description: For 5...15 seconds, damage you receive is reduced by 1...31, and you are immune to critical attacks.
1375.concise: (5...15 seconds.) Reduces damage you take by 1...31, and you are immune to critical hits.

1376.name: Glyph of Restoration
1376.description: For 15 seconds, your next 2 spells heal you for 30...105 Health, and you are healed for 150...400% of the Energy cost of each spell.
1376.concise: (15 seconds.) Your next 2 spells heal you for 30...105, and you are healed for 150...400% of the Energy cost of each spell.

1377.name: Ether Prism
1377.description: For 3 seconds, all damage you take is reduced by 75%. When Ether Prism ends, you gain 5...20 Energy.
1377.concise: (3 seconds.) All damage you take is reduced by 75%. End effect: gain 5...20 Energy.

1378.name: Master of Magic
1378.description: For 1...61 seconds, all of your elemental attributes are set to 8...14 and your elemental spells return 30% of their Energy cost.
1378.concise: (1...61 seconds). Your elemental attributes are set to 8...14 and elemental spells return 30% of their Energy cost.

1379.name: Glowing Gaze
1379.description: Target foe takes 5...50 fire damage. If that foe is on Fire, <sic/> you gain 5 Energy plus 1 Energy for every 2 ranks of Energy Storage.
1379.concise: Deals 5...50 fire damage. You gain 5 Energy plus 1 Energy for every 2 ranks of Energy Storage if target foe is Burning.

1380.name: Savannah Heat
1380.description: You create Savannah Heat at target foe's location. For 5 seconds, all nearby foes take 5...20 fire damage for each second this spell has been in effect.
1380.concise: Deals 5...20 fire damage for each second since casting this spell (5 seconds). <gray>Hits foes near target's initial location.</gray>

1381.name: Flame Djinn's Haste
1381.description: All adjacent foes are struck for 15...120 fire damage. For 8...14 seconds, you move 25% faster. Flame Djinn's Haste recharges 50% faster if a foe was struck by this spell.
1381.concise: (8...14 seconds.) You move 25% faster. Initial effect: deals 15...120 fire damage to foes adjacent to you. If you damage a foe with this spell, it recharges 50% faster.

1382.name: Freezing Gust
1382.description: If target foe is under the effect of a Water Magic hex, that foe is struck for 20...80 cold damage. Otherwise, that foe moves 66% slower for 1...5 seconds.
1382.concise: Deals 20...80 cold damage if target foe is hexed with Water Magic. Otherwise, this foe moves 66% slower (1...5 seconds).

1390.name: Judge's Intervention
1390.description: For 10 seconds, the next time target ally receives damage that would be fatal, the damage is negated and one nearby foe takes 30...180 holy damage.
1390.concise: (10 seconds.) Negates the next fatal damage. Negation effect: deals 30...180 holy damage to one foe near target ally.

1391.name: Supportive Spirit
1391.description: For 5...23 seconds, whenever target ally takes damage while knocked down, that ally is healed for 5...35 Health.
1391.concise: (5...23 seconds.) Heals for 5...35 whenever target ally takes damage while knocked-down.

1392.name: Watchful Healing
1392.description: For 10 seconds, target ally gains +1...4 Health regeneration. If this skill ends prematurely, that ally gains 30...120 Health.
1392.concise: (10 seconds.) Target ally has +1...4 Health regeneration and gains 30...120 Health if this enchantment ends early.

1393.name: Healer's Boon
1393.description: For 10...55 seconds. <sic/> Healing Prayers spells cast 50% faster and heal for 50% more Health.
1393.concise: (10...55 seconds.) Healing Prayers spells cast 50% faster and heal for 50% more.

1394.name: Healer's Covenant
1394.description: While you maintain this enchantment, your Healing Prayers spells heal for 25% less Health, but cost 1...3 Energy.
1394.concise: Your Healing Prayers spells cost 1...3 less Energy. <gray>These spells heal for 25% less.</gray>

1395.name: Balthazar's Pendulum
1395.description: For 5...10 seconds, the next time target ally would be knocked down by a foe, that foe is knocked down instead.
1395.concise: (5...10 seconds.) Causes knock-down to the next foe attempting to knock-down target ally.

1396.name: Words of Comfort
1396.description: Target ally is healed for 15...60 Health and an additional 15...45 Health if that ally is suffering from a condition.
1396.concise: Heals for 15...60. Heals for 15...45 more if target ally has a condition.

1397.name: Light of Deliverance
1397.description: All party members are healed for 5...70 Health.

1398.name: Scourge Enchantment
1398.description: For 30 seconds, each time target foe is the target of an enchantment, the caster of that enchantment takes 15...75 damage.
1398.concise: (30 seconds.) Deals 15...75 damage to anyone casting an enchantment on target foe.

1399.name: Shield of Absorption
1399.description: For 3...7 seconds, damage received by target ally is reduced by 5 each time that ally is hit while under the effects of this enchantment.
1399.concise: (3...7 seconds.) Reduces incoming damage by 5 each time target ally takes damage.

1400.name: Reversal of Damage
1400.description: For 8 seconds, the next time target ally would take damage, the foe dealing the damage takes that damage instead (maximum 5...75).
1400.concise: (8 seconds.) Negates the next damage and hits the source for that same amount (maximum 5...75).

1401.name: Mending Touch
1401.description: Touched ally loses two conditions and is healed for 15...60 Health for each condition removed in this way.
1401.concise: Touch Spell. Removes two conditions. Heals for 15...60 for each condition removed.

1402.name: Critical Chop
1402.description: If this attack hits, you inflict +5...20 damage. If this attack results in a critical hit, target foe is interrupted.
1402.concise: Deals +5...20 damage. Interrupts an action if you land a critical hit.

1403.name: Agonizing Chop
1403.description: When this attack hits, you deal +5...20 damage. If target foe is suffering from a Deep Wound, you interrupt that foe's action.
1403.concise: Deals +5...20 damage. Interrupts an action if target foe has a Deep Wound.

1404.name: Flail
1404.description: For 1...15 seconds, you attack 33% faster but move 33% slower.
1404.concise: (1...15 seconds.) You attack 33% faster. <gray>You move 33% slower.</gray>

1405.name: Charging Strike
1405.description: For 1...10 seconds, you run 33% faster. Your next successful melee hit does +10...40 damage and this stance ends. This stance ends if you use a skill.
1405.concise: (1...10 seconds.) You move 33% faster and deal +10...40 damage with your next melee hit. <gray>Ends when you hit or if you use a skill.</gray>

1406.name: Headbutt
1406.description: Target touched foe takes 40...100 damage. You are Dazed for 5...20 seconds.

1407.name: Lion's Comfort
1407.description: All of your signets are disabled for 12 seconds. You are healed for 50...110 Health, and gain 0...3 strikes of adrenaline.
1407.concise: You are healed for 50...110 and gain 0...3 strikes of adrenaline. <gray>Disables your signets (12 seconds).</gray>

1408.name: Rage of the Ntouka
1408.description: Gain 1...7 strikes of adrenaline. For 10 seconds, whenever you use an adrenal skill, that skill recharges for 5 seconds.
1408.concise: You gain 1...7 adrenaline. <gray>For 10 seconds, adrenal skills have a 5 second recharge when used.</gray>

1409.name: Mokele Smash
1409.description: If this attack hits, you strike for +5...20 damage and gain 2 strikes of adrenaline.
1409.concise: Deals +5...20 damage and you gain 2 strikes of adrenaline.

1410.name: Overbearing Smash
1410.description: If this attack hits, you deal +1...20 damage. If target foe is knocked down, that foe is Dazed for 1...8 seconds.
1410.concise: Deals +1...20 damage. If target foe is knocked down, they are Dazed (1...8 seconds).

1411.name: Signet of Stamina
1411.description: You have +50...300 maximum Health. This signet ends if you successfully hit with an attack.
1411.concise: You have +50...300 maximum Health. <gray>Ends if you hit with an attack.</gray>

1412.name: "You're All Alone!"
1412.description: If target foe isn't near an ally, that foe suffers from Cripple and Weakness for 8 seconds.
1412.concise: Inflicts Cripple and Weakness conditions (8 seconds). <gray>No effect if target foe is near one of its allies.</gray>

1413.name: Burst of Aggression
1413.description: For 2...10 seconds, you attack 33% faster. When this stance ends, you lose all adrenaline.
1413.concise: (2...10 seconds.) You attack 33% faster. <gray>End effect: lose all adrenaline.</gray>

1414.name: Enraging Charge
1414.description: For 5...15 seconds, you move 25% faster. Enraging Charge ends when you successfully strike a target, at which point you gain 0...3 strikes of adrenaline if you hit with a melee attack.
1414.concise: (5...15 seconds.) You move 25% faster. Gain +0...3 adrenaline on your next melee attack. <gray>Ends after your next hit.</gray>

1415.name: Crippling Slash
1415.description: If this attack hits, target foe is Crippled for 5...15 seconds and begins Bleeding for 10...25 seconds.
1415.concise: Inflicts Crippled condition (5...15 seconds) and Bleeding condition (10...25 seconds).

1416.name: Barbarous Slice
1416.description: If this attack hits, you deal +5...30 damage. If you are currently not in a stance, you also inflict Bleeding for 5...15 seconds.
1416.concise: Deals +5...30 damage. Inflicts Bleeding condition (5...15 seconds) if you are not in a stance.

1465.name: Prepared Shot
1465.description: If this attack hits, you strike for +10...25 damage. If you are under the effects of a preparation, you gain 1...9 Energy.
1465.concise: Deals +10...25 damage. You gain 1...9 Energy if you have a preparation active.

1466.name: Burning Arrow
1466.description: If this attack hits, you strike for +10...30 damage and cause Burning for 1...7 seconds.
1466.concise: Deals +10...30 damage. Inflicts Burning condition (1...7 seconds).

1467.name: Arcing Shot
1467.description: If this arrow hits, it strikes for +10...25 damage. This arrow cannot be blocked, but it moves 50% slower.
1467.concise: Deals +10...25 damage. Unblockable. <gray>This arrow moves 50% slower.</gray>

1468.name: Strike as One
1468.description: Your animal companion instantly moves to your target and causes Bleeding for 5...15 seconds with its next attack. The next time you hit with an attack, target foe is Crippled for 5...15 seconds.
1468.concise: Your animal companion instantly moves to your target and inflicts Bleeding (5...15 seconds) with its next attack. The next time you hit with an attack, you inflict Crippled condition (5...15 seconds).

1469.name: Crossfire
1469.description: If this attack hits target foe, it deals +5...20 damage. If that foe is near any of your allies, this attack cannot be blocked.
1469.concise: Deals +5...20 damage. Unblockable if target foe is near any of your allies.

1470.name: Barbed Arrows
1470.description: For 24 seconds, your arrows cause Bleeding for 3...15 seconds. You have -40 armor while activating this skill.
1470.concise: (24 seconds.) Your arrows inflict Bleeding condition (3...15 seconds). <gray>You have -40 armor while activating this skill.</gray>

1471.name: Scavenger's Focus
1471.description: For 10 seconds if you strike a foe who is suffering from a condition you gain 3...12 Energy.
1471.concise: (10 seconds). You gain 3...12 Energy if you strike a foe who has a condition.

1472.name: Toxicity
1472.description: Create a level 1...10 spirit. Poisoned or Diseased creatures within its range suffer -2 Health degeneration. This spirit dies after 30...90 seconds.
1472.concise: Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...90 second lifespan.) Poisoned or Diseased creatures within range have -2 Health degeneration.

1473.name: Quicksand
1473.description: Create a level 1...10 spirit. All non-spirit creatures within its range lose 1 Energy each time they attack or use a skill. This spirit dies after 30...90 seconds.
1473.concise: Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...90 second lifespan). Creatures lose 1 Energy each time they attack or use a skill. Does not affect spirits.

1474.name: Storm's Embrace
1474.description: For 10 seconds, you move 25% faster. This stance is refreshed whenever you take Elemental damage.
1474.concise: (10 seconds.) You move 25% faster. Renewal: whenever you take elemental damage.

1475.name: Trapper's Speed
1475.description: For 5...30 seconds, your Traps recharge 25% faster and activate 25% faster. This Stance ends if you successfully hit with an attack.
1475.concise: (5...30 seconds.) Your traps recharge 25% faster and activate 25% faster. <gray>Ends if you hit with an attack.</gray>

1476.name: Tripwire
1476.description: When Tripwire is triggered, all nearby foes are struck for 5...20 piercing damage. Any Crippled foes are knocked down. Tripwire ends after 90 seconds. While activating this skill, you are easily interrupted.
1476.concise: (90 seconds.) Deals 5...20 piercing damage to nearby foes. Causes knock-down to Crippled foes. <gray>Easily interrupted.</gray>

1478.name: Renewing Surge
1478.description: For 8 seconds, target foe suffers 2...12 damage each second. When this hex ends, you gain 1...8 Energy.
1478.concise: (8 seconds.) Deals 2...12 damage each second. End effect: You gain 1...8 energy.

1479.name: Offering of Spirit
1479.description: Gain 8...17 Energy. If any spirits are within earshot, you do not sacrifice Health.
1479.concise: You gain 8...17 Energy. You do not sacrifice Health if any spirits are within earshot.

1480.name: Spirit's Gift
1480.description: For 60 seconds, whenever you create a creature, all allies near that creature gain 5...50 Health and lose 1 condition.
1480.concise: (60 seconds.) Whenever you create a creature, all nearby allies gain 5...50 Health and lose one condition.

1481.name: Death Pact Signet
1481.description: Resurrect target party member with your current Health and 15...100% Energy. The next time that ally dies within 120 seconds, so do you.
1481.concise: Resurrects target party member with your current Health and 15...100% maximum Energy. <gray>For 120 seconds, you die the next time this party member dies.</gray>

1482.name: Reclaim Essence
1482.description: All of your Spirits die. You gain 5...20 Energy and all of your Binding Rituals are recharged if a Spirit died in this way.
1482.concise: All of your Spirits die. If a Spirit dies in this way, you gain 5...20 Energy and all of your Binding Rituals are recharged.

1483.name: Banishing Strike
1483.description: If it hits, this attack deals 10...60 holy damage. It deals double damage to summoned creatures.
1483.concise: Deals 10...60 holy damage. Deals double damage to summoned creatures.

1484.name: Mystic Sweep
1484.description: If this attack hits, you deal +3...12 damage. If you are enchanted, this attack deals an additional +3...12 damage.
1484.concise: Deals +3...12 damage. Deals an additional +3...12 damage if you are enchanted.

1485.name: Eremite's Attack
1485.description: If it hits, this attack deals +1...10 damage and removes a Dervish enchantment. If an enchantment is removed, you do an additional +1...10 damage and strike all adjacent foes.
1485.concise: Deals +1...10 damage and removes a Dervish enchantment. Removal Effect: Deals +1...10 damage and strikes all adjacent foes.

1486.name: Reap Impurities
1486.description: If this attack hits, you deal +3...15 damage. Each foe you hit loses 1 condition. For each foe who loses a condition, all foes adjacent to that target foe take 10...40 holy damage.
1486.concise: Deals +3...15 damage. Struck foes lose 1 condition. Removal Effect: all foes adjacent to those struck take 10...40 holy damage.

1487.name: Twin Moon Sweep
1487.description: You lose 1 Dervish enchantment and gain 10...50 Health. If an enchantment is lost in this way, you cannot be blocked, you strike twice, and you gain an additional 10...70 Health.
1487.concise: Remove 1 of your Dervish enchantments. Gain 10...50 Health. Removal effect: unblockable, attack twice, and gain 10...70 more Health.

1488.name: Victorious Sweep
1488.description: If this attack hits, you deal +5...25 damage. If target foe has less Health than you, you gain 30...80 Health.
1488.concise: Deals +5...25 damage. You gain 30...80 Health for each foe you hit that has less Health than you.

1489.name: Irresistible Sweep
1489.description: Deal +3...15 damage and lose 1 Dervish enchantment. If you lose an enchantment in this way, Irresistible Sweep cannot be blocked, removes a stance, and deals +3...15 additional damage.
1489.concise: Deals +3...15 damage. Remove 1 of your Dervish enchantments. Removal effect: unblockable, removes a stance, deals +3...15 additional damage.

1490.name: Pious Assault
1490.description: If it hits, this attack deals +10...20 damage and removes 1 Dervish enchantment. If a Dervish enchantment was removed, this skill recharges 75% faster and adjacent foes take 10...30 damage.
1490.concise: Deals +10...20 damage. Removes 1 of your Dervish enchantments. Removal Effect: this skill recharges 75% faster and adjacent foes take 10...30 damage.

1491.name: Mystic Twister
1491.description: Deals 10...60 cold damage to all nearby foes. If you are enchanted, this spell deals an additional 10...60 cold damage.
1491.concise: Deals 10...60 cold damage to all nearby foes. Deals 10...60 more cold damage if you are enchanted.

1493.name: Grenth's Fingers
1493.description: All nearby foes are struck for 10...40 cold damage. For 30 seconds, your attacks deal cold damage. When this enchantment ends, you transfer 1...2 conditions to all nearby foes. <sic/>
1493.concise: (30 seconds.) Your attacks deal cold damage. Initial effect: hits nearby foes for 10...40 cold damage. End effect: transfers 1...2 conditions to all nearby foes.

1495.name: Aura of Thorns
1495.description: All nearby foes begin Bleeding for 5...15 seconds. For 30 seconds, this enchantment does nothing. When this enchantment ends, all nearby foes are Crippled for 3...8 seconds.
1495.concise: (30 seconds.) Initial effect: inflicts Bleeding condition (5...15 seconds) on nearby foes. End effect: inflicts Crippled condition (3...8 seconds) on nearby foes.

1496.name: Balthazar's Rage
1496.description: All nearby foes are set on fire for 1...3 seconds. For 20 seconds afterward, this enchantment does nothing. When this enchantment ends, you gain 1...2 strikes of adrenaline if any foes are within earshot.
1496.concise: (20 seconds.) Initial Effect: Inflicts burning (1...3 seconds) on nearby foes. End effect: gain 1...2 strikes of adrenaline if any foes are within earshot.

1497.name: Dust Cloak
1497.description: All adjacent foes are struck for 10...40 earth damage. For 30 seconds, your attacks deal earth damage. When this enchantment ends, all adjacent foes are Blinded for 1...4 seconds.
1497.concise: (30 seconds.) Your attacks deal earth damage. Initial effect: deals 10...40 earth damage to adjacent foes. End effect: inflicts Blindness condition (1...4 seconds) on adjacent foes.

1498.name: Staggering Force
1498.description: All nearby foes are struck for 10...40 earth damage. For 30 seconds, your attacks deal earth damage. When this enchantment ends, all nearby foes have Cracked Armor for 1...10 seconds.
1498.concise: (30 seconds.) Your attacks deal earth damage. Initial effect: deals 10...40 earth damage to nearby foes. End effect: inflicts Cracked Armor condition (1...10 seconds) on nearby foes.

1499.name: Pious Renewal
1499.description: For 8 seconds, nothing happens. When this enchantment ends, Pious Renewal is recharged and you gain 0...5 Energy and 0...30 Health.
1499.concise: (8 seconds.) End Effect: recharges itself and you gain 0...5 Energy and 0...30 Health.

1500.name: Mirage Cloak
1500.description: For 1...7 seconds, you have a 40...80% chance to block incoming attacks. When you cast this enchantment, all nearby foes are struck for 10...40 earth damage.
1500.concise: (1...7 seconds.) You have 40...80% chance to block. Initial Effect: deals 10...40 earth damage to nearby foes.

1502.name: Arcane Zeal
1502.description: For 10 seconds, whenever you cast a spell, you gain 1 Energy for each enchantment on you (maximum 1...7 Energy).
1502.concise: (10 seconds.) You gain 1 Energy (maximum 1...7) for each enchantment on you whenever you cast a spell.

1503.name: Mystic Vigor
1503.description: For 20 seconds, every time you successfully hit with an attack, you gain 3...15 Health for each enchantment on you (maximum 25 Health).
1503.concise: (20 seconds.) You gain 3...15 Health (maximum 25) for each enchantment on you whenever you hit with an attack.

1504.name: Watchful Intervention
1504.description: For 60 seconds, the next time damage drops target ally's Health below 25%, that ally is healed for 50...200 Health.
1504.concise: (60 seconds.) Heals for 50...200 the next time damage drops target ally's Health below 25%.

1505.name: Vow of Piety
1505.description: For 20 seconds, you have +24 armor and +1...4 Health regeneration. Vow of Piety renews whenever an enchantment on you ends.
1505.concise: (20 seconds) +24 armor and +1...4 Health regeneration. Renewal: Whenever an enchantment on you ends.

1506.name: Vital Boon
1506.description: For 20 seconds, you have +40...100 maximum Health. When this enchantment ends, you are healed for 75...200 Health.
1506.concise: (20 seconds.) You have +40...100 maximum Health. End effect: Heals you for 75...200.

1507.name: Heart of Holy Flame
1507.description: All nearby foes take 5...30 holy damage. For 30 seconds, your attacks deal holy damage. When this enchantment ends, all nearby foes are set on fire for 2...5 seconds.
1507.concise: (30 seconds.) Your attacks deal holy damage. Initial effect: deals 5...30 holy damage to nearby foes. End effect: inflicts Burning condition (2...5 seconds) on nearby foes.

1508.name: Extend Enchantments
1508.description: For 10 seconds, your next Dervish enchantment lasts 10...150% longer.
1508.concise: (10 seconds.) Your next Dervish enchantment lasts 10...150% longer.

1509.name: Faithful Intervention
1509.description: If damage drops your Health below 50%, Faithful Intervention ends. When Faithful Intervention ends, you are healed for 30...150 Health.
1509.concise: You gain 30...150 Health the next time damage drops your Health below 50%.

1510.name: Sand Shards
1510.description: For 30 seconds, the next 1...5 times you hit with a scythe, all other adjacent foes take 10...60 earth damage.
1510.concise: (30 seconds.) Deal 10...60 earth damage to all other adjacent foes whenever you hit with your scythe. <gray>Ends after 1...5 hits.</gray>

1512.name: Lyssa's Haste
1512.description: For 3...15 seconds, your Dervish enchantments recharge 33% faster. When you activate this enchantment, all adjacent foes are interrupted. When this enchantment ends, all adjacent foes are interrupted. 50% failure chance unless Wind Prayers 5 or higher.
1512.concise: (3...15 seconds.) Your Dervish enchantments recharge 33% faster. Initial Effect: interrupts all adjacent foes. End Effect: interrupts all adjacent foes. <gray>50% failure chance unless Wind Prayers 5 or higher.</gray>

1513.name: Guiding Hands
1513.description: For 20 seconds, your next 0...3 attacks cannot be blocked. When activated, this skill removes the Blindness condition.
1513.concise: (20 seconds.) Your next 0...3 attacks cannot be blocked. Initial effect: removes Blindness.

1514.name: Fleeting Stability
1514.description: For 2...6 seconds, you cannot be knocked down and move 25% faster. This enchantment ends prematurely if it prevents a knockdown.
1514.concise: (2...6 seconds.) You cannot be knocked down and move 25% faster. Ends if knockdown prevented.

1515.name: Armor of Sanctity
1515.description: All adjacent foes suffer from Weakness for 5...15 seconds. For 15 seconds, you take 5...20 less damage from foes suffering from a condition.
1515.concise: Inflicts Weakness condition on all adjacent foes (5...15). You take 5...20 less damage from foes with a condition. (15 seconds.)

1516.name: Mystic Regeneration
1516.description: For 5...20 seconds, you have +1...4 Health regeneration for each enchantment (maximum of 8) on you.
1516.concise: (5...20 seconds.) You have +1...4 Health regeneration for each enchantment (maximum of 8) on you.

1517.name: Vow of Silence
1517.description: For 5...10 seconds, you cannot be the target of spells, and you cannot cast spells.
1517.concise: (5...10 seconds.) Spells cannot target you. <gray>You cannot cast spells.</gray>

1518.name: Avatar of Balthazar
1518.description: For 10...90 seconds, you gain +20 armor against physical damage, you gain adrenaline 25% faster, your attacks deal holy damage, and whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment, nearby foes are set on fire for 1...3 seconds. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.
1518.concise: (10...90 seconds.) You gain +20 armor against physical damage, you gain adrenaline 25% faster, your attacks deal holy damage, you inflict Burning (1...3 seconds) on nearby foes whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.

1519.name: Avatar of Dwayna
1519.description: For 10...90 seconds, your attacks deal holy damage. Whenever you use a Dervish attack skill, you lose 1 hex. Whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment, all allies in earshot are healed for 5...50 Health. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.
1519.concise: (10...90 seconds.) You deal holy damage. Whenever you use a Dervish attack skill, you lose 1 hex. Heal allies in earshot for 5...50 Health when you lose a Dervish enchantment. <gray>This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.</gray>

1520.name: Avatar of Grenth
1520.description: For 10...90 seconds, your scythe attacks deal dark damage, and steal 0...12 Health. You are immune to Disease, and inflict Disease on all adjacent foes for 3 seconds whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.
1520.concise: (10...90 seconds.) Your scythe attacks deal dark damage and steal 0...12 Health. You are immune to Disease. Apply Disease to all adjacent foes (3 seconds) when you lose a Dervish enchantment. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.

1521.name: Avatar of Lyssa
1521.description: For 10...90 seconds, your Dervish enchantments recharge 50% faster and your attacks deal chaos damage. Whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment, steal 1 Energy from all nearby foes. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.
1521.concise: (10...90 seconds.) Your Dervish enchantments recharge 50% faster and deal chaos damage with attacks. Steal 1 Energy from nearby foes when you lose a Dervish enchantment. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.

1522.name: Avatar of Melandru
1522.description: For 10...90 seconds, you have +150 Health, +30 elemental armor, and your attacks deal earth damage. Whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment, all party members in earshot lose 1 condition. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.
1522.concise: (10...90 seconds.) You have +150 maximum Health, +30 elemental armor, and your attacks deal earth damage. Cure 1 condition from all party members in earshot whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment. <gray>This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.</gray>

1523.name: Meditation
1523.description: Lose all adrenaline. For 20 seconds, you gain 1...4 Energy every time an enchantment on you ends.
1523.concise: (20 seconds.) <gray>Lose all adrenaline.</gray> Gain 1...4 Energy whenever an enchantment on you ends.

1524.name: Eremite's Zeal
1524.description: You gain 1...3 Energy for each foe within earshot, maximum 8 Energy. For 10 seconds afterward, this enchantment does nothing. When this enchantment ends, you gain 1...3 Energy for each foe within earshot, maximum 8 Energy.
1524.concise: (10 seconds.) Initial effect: you gain 1...3 Energy (maximum 8) for each foe in earshot. End effect: you gain 1...3 Energy (maximum 8) for each foe in earshot.

1525.name: Natural Healing
1525.description: You are healed for 50...170 Health. If you are not enchanted, this spell activates 50% faster.
1525.concise: Heals you for 50...170. This skill activates 50% faster if you are not enchanted.

1526.name: Imbue Health
1526.description: Target other ally is healed for 5...50% of your current Health (maximum 300 Health).
1526.concise: Heals for 5...50% of your current Health (maximum 300). <gray>Cannot self-target.</gray>

1527.name: Mystic Healing
1527.description: You are healed for 5...65 Health. Also heals all enchanted party members for 5...65 Health.
1527.concise: Heals you for 5...65. Heals all enchanted party members for 5...65 Health.

1528.name: Dwayna's Touch
1528.description: Target touched ally is healed for 15...60 Health for each Enchantment on you (maximum 150).
1528.concise: Touch Spell. Heals for 15...60 (maximum 150) for each enchantment on you.

1529.name: Pious Restoration
1529.description: You gain 80...150 Health and remove 1 Dervish enchantment. If an enchantment was removed in this way, you also lose 1...2 hexes.
1529.concise: Gain 80...150 Health and remove 1 Dervish enchantment. Removal effect: lose 1...2 hexes.

1530.name: Signet of Pious Light
1530.description: Remove 1 Dervish enchantment. Target ally is healed for 30...150 Health. If an enchantment was removed in this way, this signet recharges 75% faster.
1530.concise: Heals for 30...150. Removes one of your Dervish enchantments. Removal effect: recharges 75% faster.

1531.name: Intimidating Aura
1531.description: For 60 seconds, you have +40...100 max Health and take 1...10 less damage from foes with less Health than you.
1531.concise: (60 seconds.) You have +40...100 max Health and take 1...10 damage from foes with less Health than you.

1532.name: Mystic Sandstorm
1532.description: Create a sandstorm at your location that lasts 3 seconds. Each second, foes nearby this location take 10...20 earth damage. Attacking foes take an additional 10...20 damage. If you are enchanted when you cast this spell, it lasts twice as long.
1532.concise: (3 seconds.) Deals 10...20 earth damage each second. Deals an additional 10...20 damage to attacking foes. Hits foes nearby your initial location. Lasts twice as long if you are enchanted.

1533.name: Winds of Disenchantment
1533.description: Lose 1 Dervish enchantment. If a Dervish enchantment was removed in this way, all nearby foes lose 1 enchantment and take 20...80 cold damage.
1533.concise: Remove one of your Dervish enchantments. Removal effect: all nearby foes lose 1 enchantment and take 20...80 cold damage.

1534.name: Rending Touch
1534.description: Deals 15...65 cold damage to target foe. You lose one Dervish enchantment. If an enchantment was removed, target foe loses 1 enchantment and you gain 1 strike of adrenaline.
1534.concise: Touch Spell. Deals 15...65 cold damage. Lose 1 Dervish enchantment. Removal effect: target foe loses 1 enchantment and you gain 1 strike of adrenaline.

1535.name: Crippling Sweep
1535.description: If this attack hits a foe, that foe is Crippled for 3...12 seconds. This skill deals +3...15 extra damage if that foe is moving.
1535.concise: (3...12 seconds.) Inflicts Cripple <sic/> condition. Deals +3...15 damage to moving foes.

1536.name: Wounding Strike
1536.description: If this attack hits, you do +5...20 damage, target foe suffers from Bleeding for 5...20 seconds, and you lose 1 Dervish enchantment. If an enchantment is removed, target foe also suffers from a Deep Wound for 5...20 seconds.
1536.concise: Deals +5...20 damage and inflicts Bleeding condition (5...20 seconds). Remove 1 Dervish enchantment. Removal Effect: inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...20 seconds).

1537.name: Wearying Strike
1537.description: You remove 1 Dervish enchantment. If an enchantment was removed, you inflict a Deep Wound for 3...10 seconds. You suffer from Weakness for 10 seconds if an enchantment is not removed.
1537.concise: Remove 1 Dervish Enchantment. Removal Effect: Inflicts Deep Wound condition (3...10 seconds). <gray>You are Weakened (10 seconds) if an enchantment is not lost.</gray>

1538.name: Lyssa's Assault
1538.description: This attack interrupts an action if it hits. If you are enchanted, any skill you interrupt is disabled for additional 1...10 seconds. This attack does 50% normal damage.
1538.concise: Interrupts an action. If you are enchanted, the interrupted skill is disabled for an additional 1...10 seconds. This attack does 50% of normal damage.

1539.name: Chilling Victory
1539.description: If it hits, this attack strikes for +3...15 damage. For each foe hit who has less Health than you, that foe and all adjacent foes are struck for 10...30 cold damage.
1539.concise: Deals +3...15 damage. Deals 10...30 cold damage to each foe hit who has less Health than you and foes adjacent to those targets.

1540.name: Conviction
1540.description: For 10 seconds, you gain +10 armor if you have a condition and gain 1...3 Health regen <sic/> for each condition you are suffering from. When this enchantment ends, you are cured of 1...2 conditions.
1540.concise: (10 seconds.) Gain +10 armor while conditioned. Gain 1...3 Health regeneration for each condition you have. End Effect: Remove 1...2 conditions.

1541.name: Enchanted Haste
1541.description: For 7 seconds, you move 25% faster. If this enchantment ends prematurely, you lose 1 condition.
1541.concise: (7 seconds). You move 25% faster. Lose 1 condition if this enchantment ends prematurely.

1542.name: Pious Concentration
1542.description: For 5...20 seconds, you cannot be interrupted, but each time you would have been interrupted, you lose 1 Dervish enchantment or Pious Concentration ends.
1542.concise: (5...20 seconds.) Prevents interrupts. <gray>Prevention cost: you lose one Dervish enchantment or Pious Concentration ends.</gray>

1543.name: Pious Haste
1543.description: You remove 1 Dervish enchantment and for 1...7 seconds you move 25% faster. If an enchantment was removed you move 50% faster instead.
1543.concise: (1...7 seconds.) Lose 1 Dervish enchantment and move 25% faster. Removal Effect: Run 50% faster instead.

1544.name: Whirling Charge
1544.description: For 1...6 seconds, you move 33% faster than normal. The next time you strike a foe, all other nearby foes take 10...60 cold damage and this enchantment ends.
1544.concise: (1...6 seconds.) You move 33% faster. Deal 10...60 cold damage to all other nearby foes the next time you hit a foe and this enchantment ends.

1545.name: Test of Faith
1545.description: Deals 15...65 cold damage and takes 1 enchantment from target foe. If that foe was not enchanted, that foe is Dazed for 1...4 seconds.
1545.concise: Touch Spell. Deals 15...65 cold damage and removes 1 enchantment. Target foe is Dazed for 1...4 seconds if that foe was not enchanted.

1546.name: Blazing Spear
1546.description: If this attack hits, it deals +5...25 damage and sets target foe on Fire <sic/> for 1...3 seconds.
1546.concise: Deals +5...25 damage. Inflicts Burning condition (1...3 seconds).

1547.name: Mighty Throw
1547.description: Your spear moves three times faster. If it hits, you deal +10...40 damage.
1547.concise: Deals +10...40 damage. This spear moves three times faster.

1548.name: Cruel Spear
1548.description: If this attack hits, you deal +1...31 damage. If it hits a non-moving target, you inflict a Deep Wound for 5...20 seconds.
1548.concise: Deals +1...31 damage. Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...20 seconds) if target is not moving.

1549.name: Harrier's Toss
1549.description: If this attack hits, you deal +5...20 damage. If this attack hits a moving foe, it deals an additional 5...30 damage.
1549.concise: Deals +5...20 damage. Deals 5...30 more damage if target is moving.

1550.name: Unblockable Throw
1550.description: If this attack hits, you deal +10...40 damage. This attack cannot be blocked.

1551.name: Spear of Lightning
1551.description: If this attack hits, it deals +8...20 lightning damage. This attack has 25% armor penetration.

1552.name: Wearying Spear
1552.description: If this attack hits, you deal +10...40 damage. You are Weakened for 5 seconds.

1553.name: Anthem of Fury
1553.description: For 10 seconds, all party members within earshot gain 1...4 strikes of adrenaline the next time they use an attack skill.
1553.concise: (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot gain 1...4 adrenaline with their next attack skill.

1554.name: Crippling Anthem
1554.description: For 10 seconds, the next attack skill used by each ally within earshot causes Crippling for 5...15 seconds.
1554.concise: (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot inflict Crippled condition (5...15 seconds) with their next attack skill.

1555.name: Defensive Anthem
1555.description: For 4...10 seconds, each party member within earshot has a 50% chance to block incoming attacks. This chant ends if that party member hits with an attack skill.
1555.concise: (4...10 seconds.) Party members in earshot have 50% chance to block. <gray>Ends when hitting with an attack skill.</gray>

1556.name: Godspeed
1556.description: For 5...20 seconds, all allies within earshot move 25% faster while under the effects of an enchantment.
1556.concise: (5...20 seconds.) Allies in earshot move 25% faster while enchanted.

1557.name: Anthem of Flame
1557.description: For 10 seconds, the next attack skill used by each party member within earshot also causes Burning for 1...3 seconds.
1557.concise: (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot inflict Burning condition (1...3 seconds) with their next attack skill.

1558.name: "Go for the Eyes!"
1558.description: For 10 seconds, the next time each ally within earshot makes an attack, that attack has an additional 30...100% chance to critical.
1558.concise: (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot have +30...100% to land a critical hit with their next attack.

1559.name: Anthem of Envy
1559.description: For 10 seconds, the next attack skill used by each ally within earshot deals +10...25 damage against foes with more than 50% Health.
1559.concise: (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot do +10...25 damage with their next attack skill. <gray>Damage bonus only applies to foes with more than 50% Health.</gray>

1560.name: Song of Power
1560.description: For 5...20 seconds, each ally within earshot gains 4 Energy regeneration until that ally uses a Skill.
1560.concise: (5...20 seconds.) Allies in earshot gain +4 Energy regeneration. <gray>Ends when using a skill.</gray>

1561.name: Zealous Anthem
1561.description: For 10 seconds, the next time each ally within earshot uses an attack skill, that ally gains 1...8 Energy.
1561.concise: (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot gain 1...8 Energy with their next attack skill.

1562.name: Aria of Zeal
1562.description: For 10 seconds, the next time each ally within earshot uses a Spell, that ally gains 1...6 Energy.
1562.concise: (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot gain 1...6 Energy with their next spell.

1563.name: Lyric of Zeal
1563.description: For 10 seconds, the next time each ally within earshot uses a signet, that ally gains 1...8 Energy.
1563.concise: (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot gain 1...8 Energy with their next signet.

1564.name: Ballad of Restoration
1564.description: For 10 seconds, the next time each party member within earshot takes damage, that party member gains 15...75 Health.
1564.concise: (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot gain 15...75 Health the next time they take damage.

1565.name: Chorus of Restoration
1565.description: For 10 seconds, the next time each ally within earshot uses a shout or chant, that ally is healed for 30...90 Health.
1565.concise: (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot are healed for 30...90 with their next shout or chant.

1566.name: Aria of Restoration
1566.description: For 10 seconds, the next time each party member within earshot uses a spell, that party member gains 30...90 Health.
1566.concise: (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot gain 30...90 Health with their next spell.

1567.name: Song of Concentration
1567.description: For 10 seconds, the next skill used by each ally within earshot cannot be interrupted.
1567.concise: (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot are uninterruptible with their next skill.

1568.name: Anthem of Guidance
1568.description: For 10 seconds, the next attack skill used by each party member within earshot cannot be blocked.
1568.concise: (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot are unblockable with their next attack skill.

1569.name: Energizing Chorus
1569.description: For 10 seconds, the next Shout or Chant used by each ally within earshot costs 3...7 less Energy.
1569.concise: (10 seconds.) The next shout or chant costs 3...7 less Energy for allies within earshot.

1570.name: Song of Purification
1570.description: For 20 seconds, the next 1...3 skills used by each ally within earshot remove 1 condition from that ally.
1570.concise: (20 seconds.) Allies in earshot lose one condition with their next 1...3 skills.

1571.name: Hexbreaker Aria
1571.description: For 10 seconds, the next time each ally within earshot casts a spell, that ally loses 1 hex.
1571.concise: (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot lose one hex with their next spell.

1572.name: "Brace Yourself!"
1572.description: For 5...15 seconds, the next time target other ally would be knocked down, all nearby foes take 15...75 damage instead.
1572.concise: (5...15 seconds.) Prevents the next knock-down and deals 15...75 damage to all foes near target ally. <gray>Cannot self-target.</gray>

1573.name: Awe
1573.description: If this skill hits a knocked-down foe, that foe becomes Dazed for 5...15 seconds. Awe has half the normal range.
1573.concise: Half Range Skill. Inflicts Dazed condition (5...15 seconds). <gray>No effect unless target is knocked-down.</gray>

1574.name: Enduring Harmony
1574.description: For 10...35 seconds, chants and shouts last 50% longer on target non-spirit ally.
1574.concise: (10...35 seconds.) Chants and shouts last 50% longer on target ally. <gray>Cannot target spirits.</gray>

1575.name: Blazing Finale
1575.description: For 10...35 seconds, whenever a chant or shout ends on target non-spirit ally, all foes adjacent to that ally are set on Fire for 1...7 seconds.
1575.concise: (10...35 seconds.) Inflicts Burning condition (1...7 seconds) to adjacent foes whenever a chant or shout ends on target ally. <gray>Cannot target spirits.</gray>

1576.name: Burning Refrain
1576.description: For 20 seconds, if target non-spirit ally hits a foe with more Health than that ally, that foe is set on Fire <sic/> for 1...3 seconds. This echo is reapplied every time a chant or shout ends on that ally.
1576.concise: (20 seconds.) Inflicts Burning condition (1...3 seconds) if target ally hits a foe with more Health. Renewal: Whenever a chant or shout ends on that ally. <gray>Cannot target spirits.</gray>

1577.name: Finale of Restoration
1577.description: For 10...35 seconds, whenever a chant or shout ends on target non-spirit ally, that ally is healed for 15...75 Health.
1577.concise: (10...35 seconds.) Target ally gains <sic/> 15...75 Health whenever a shout or chant ends on that ally. <gray>Cannot target spirits.</gray>

1578.name: Mending Refrain
1578.description: For 15 seconds, target non-spirit ally has +2...3 Health regeneration. This echo is reapplied every time a chant or shout ends on that ally.
1578.concise: (15 seconds.) Target ally has +2...3 Health regeneration. Renewal: whenever a chant or shout ends on that ally. <gray>Cannot target spirits.</gray>

1579.name: Purifying Finale
1579.description: For 10...35 seconds, target non-spirit ally loses 1 condition whenever a chant or shout ends on that ally.
1579.concise: (10...35 seconds.) Target ally loses one condition whenever a chant or shout ends on that ally. <gray>Cannot target spirits.</gray>

1580.name: Bladeturn Refrain
1580.description: For 20 seconds, target non-spirit ally has a 5...20% chance to block incoming attacks. This echo is reapplied every time a chant or shout ends on that ally.
1580.concise: (20 seconds.) Target ally has 5...20% chance to block. Renewal: Whenever a chant or shout ends on that ally. <gray>Cannot target spirits.</gray>

1581.name: Glowing Signet
1581.description: If target foe is Burning, you gain 5...15 Energy.
1581.concise: You gain 5...15 Energy if target foe is Burning.

1583.name: Leader's Zeal
1583.description: For each nearby ally, you gain 2 Energy (maximum 8...12 Energy).
1583.concise: You gain 2 Energy (maximum 8...12 Energy) for each nearby ally.

1584.name: Leader's Comfort
1584.description: You gain 30...75 Health. For each ally within earshot, you also gain +10...20 Health (maximum 140 Health).
1584.concise: You gain 30...75 Health. You also gain 10...20 Health (maximum 140) for each ally in earshot.

1585.name: Signet of Synergy
1585.description: Target other ally is healed for 40...100 Health. If you are not under the effects of an enchantment, you are also healed for 40...100 Health.
1585.concise: Heal target ally for 40...100. You are also healed for 40...100 if you are not enchanted. <gray>Cannot self-target.</gray>

1586.name: Angelic Protection
1586.description: For 10 seconds, any time target other ally takes more than 250...100 damage per second, that ally is healed for any damage over that amount.
1586.concise: (10 seconds.) Each second that target ally takes damage over 250...100, that ally is healed for any damage over that amount. <gray>Cannot self target.</gray>

1587.name: Angelic Bond
1587.description: For 10 seconds, the next time an ally within earshot would take fatal damage, that damage is negated and that ally is healed for 20...200 Health. Angelic Bond ends on all other allies.
1587.concise: (10 seconds.) The next time an ally within earshot would take fatal damage, that damage is negated and that ally is healed for 20...200. <gray>Ends on other allies.</gray>

1588.name: Cautery Signet
1588.description: All party members lose all conditions. You are set on Fire <sic/> for 1 second for each condition removed in this way.
1588.concise: All party members lose all conditions. <gray>You begin Burning (one second for each condition removed).</gray>

1589.name: "Stand Your Ground!"
1589.description: For 5...20 seconds, all party members within earshot receive +24 armor when not moving.
1589.concise: (5...20 seconds.) Party members in earshot gain +24 armor when not moving.

1590.name: "Lead the Way!"
1590.description: Target ally moves 25% faster for 1...5 seconds for each ally within earshot (maximum of 20 seconds).
1590.concise: Target ally moves 25% faster for 1...5 seconds (maximum of 20 seconds) for each ally in earshot.

1591.name: "Make Haste!"
1591.description: For 5...20 seconds, target other ally moves 33% faster. This skill ends if that ally successfully hits with an attack.
1591.concise: (5...20 seconds.) Target ally moves 33% faster. <gray>Ends if target ally hits with an attack. Cannot self-target.</gray>

1592.name: "We Shall Return!"
1592.description: All party members in earshot are resurrected with 25...50% Health and 5...20% Energy.
1592.concise: All party members in earshot are resurrected (25...50% Health and 5...20% Energy).

1593.name: "Never Give Up!"
1593.description: All allies within earshot and below 75% Health gain 1...10 Energy.
1593.concise: Allies in earshot gain 1...10 Energy. <gray>Only affects allies below 75% Health.</gray>

1594.name: "Help Me!"
1594.description: You gain 15...90 Health. For 1...10 seconds, other allies' spells targeting you cast 50% faster.
1594.concise: (1...10 seconds.) Other allies' spells targeting you cast 50% faster. You gain 15...90 Health.

1595.name: "Fall Back!"
1595.description: For 4...10 seconds, all allies within earshot gain 5...15 Health per second while moving and move 33% faster. "Fall Back!" ends on an ally affected by this shout when that ally successfully hits with an attack.
1595.concise: (4...10 seconds.) Allies in earshot gain 5...15 Health per second while moving and move 33% faster. <gray>Ends for an ally if that ally hits with an attack.</gray>

1596.name: "Incoming!"
1596.description: For 4...10 seconds, all allies within earshot move 33% faster, and gain 5...15 Health while moving.
1596.concise: (4...10 seconds) Allies in earshot move 33% faster and gain 5...15 Health while moving.

1597.name: "They're on Fire!"
1597.description: For 10 seconds, party members within earshot take 5...35% less damage from foes suffering from Burning.
1597.concise: (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot take 5...35% less damage from Burning foes.

1598.name: "Never Surrender!"
1598.description: For 15 seconds, all party members within earshot and below 75% Health gain +1...5 Health regeneration.
1598.concise: (15 seconds.) Party members in earshot gain +1...5 Health regeneration. <gray>Only affects party members below 75% Health.</gray>

1599.name: "It's Just a Flesh Wound."
1599.description: Target other ally loses all conditions. If a condition was removed in this way, that ally moves 25% faster for 1...10 seconds.
1599.concise: Remove all conditions from target ally. That ally moves 25% faster (1...10 seconds) if a condition was removed. <gray>Cannot self-target.</gray>

1600.name: Barbed Spear
1600.description: If this attack hits, your target begins Bleeding for 5...20 seconds.

1601.name: Vicious Attack
1601.description: If this attack hits, you deal +5...20 damage. If you land a critical hit with this attack, target foe suffers from a Deep Wound for 5...15 seconds.
1601.concise: Deals +5...20 damage. Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...15 seconds) with a critical hit.

1602.name: Stunning Strike
1602.description: If this attack hits, you deal +5...30 damage. If it hits a foe suffering from a condition, that foe is also Dazed for 4...10 seconds.
1602.concise: Deals +5...30 damage. Inflicts Dazed condition (4...10 seconds) if target has a condition.

1603.name: Merciless Spear
1603.description: If this attack hits a foe with less than 50% Health, that foe suffers from a Deep Wound for 5...20 seconds.
1603.concise: Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...20 seconds). <gray>No effect unless target has less than 50% Health.</gray>

1604.name: Disrupting Throw
1604.description: If this attack hits a foe suffering from a condition, that foe is interrupted.
1604.concise: Interrupts actions. <gray>No effect unless target has a condition.</gray>

1605.name: Wild Throw
1605.description: If this attack hits, it deals +5...20 damage, and any stance being used by your target ends. This attack cannot be blocked. All of your non-spear attack skills are disabled for 3 seconds.
1605.concise: Deals +5...20 damage. Unblockable. Ends target's stance. <gray>Disables <sic/> your non-spear attack skills for 3 seconds.</gray>

1633.name: Malicious Strike
1633.description: If this attack hits a foe suffering from a condition, you deal +10...30 damage and this attack results in a critical hit.
1633.concise: If target foe has a condition, this attack deals +10...30 damage and is a critical hit.

1634.name: Shattering Assault
1634.description: Must follow an off-hand attack. If it hits, you deal 5...50 damage and target foe loses one enchantment. This attack cannot be blocked.
1634.concise: Deals 5...50 damage. Removes one enchantment. Unblockable. <gray>Must follow an off-hand attack.</gray>

1635.name: Golden Skull Strike
1635.description: If you are under the effects of an enchantment and this attack hits, target foe is Dazed 1...5 seconds.
1635.concise: Inflicts Dazed condition (1...5 seconds). <gray>No effect unless you are enchanted.</gray>

1636.name: Black Spider Strike
1636.description: Must strike a hexed foe. If it hits, this attack strikes for +5...20 damage and target foe is Poisoned for 5...20 seconds.
1636.concise: Deals +5...20 damage. Inflicts Poisoned condition (5...20 seconds). <gray>Must strike a hexed foe.</gray>

1637.name: Golden Fox Strike
1637.description: If this attack hits, target foe takes +10...30 damage. If you are under the effects of an Enchantment, this attack cannot be blocked.
1637.concise: Deals +10...30 damage. Unblockable if you are Enchanted.

1638.name: Deadly Haste
1638.description: For 10...35 seconds, half-ranged spells cast 5...50% faster and recharge 5...50% faster.
1638.concise: (10...35 seconds.) Your half-ranged spells cast 5...50% faster and recharge 5...50% faster.

1639.name: Assassin's Remedy
1639.description: For 30 seconds, the next 1...10 attack skills you use remove one condition.
1639.concise: (30 seconds.) Your next 1...10 attack skills each remove one condition.

1640.name: Fox's Promise
1640.description: For 5...20 seconds, your dagger attacks cannot be blocked. This enchantment ends the next time you fail to hit.
1640.concise: (5...20 seconds.) Your dagger attacks are unblockable. <gray>Ends the next time you fail to hit.</gray>

1641.name: Feigned Neutrality
1641.description: For 4...10 seconds, you have +7 Health regeneration and +80 armor. This enchantment ends if you successfully hit with an attack or use a skill.
1641.concise: (4...10 seconds.) You have +7 Health regeneration and +80 armor. <gray>Ends if you hit with an attack or use a skill.</gray>

1642.name: Hidden Caltrops
1642.description: Your non-Assassin skills are disabled for 10 seconds. For 1...10 seconds, target foe moves 50% slower. When this hex ends that foe is Crippled for 1...15 seconds.
1642.concise: (1...10 seconds.) Causes 50% slower movement. End effect: inflicts Crippled condition (1...15 seconds). Your non-Assassin skills are disabled (10 seconds.)

1643.name: Assault Enchantments
1643.description: Must follow a dual attack. Target foe loses all enchantments.
1643.concise: Removes all enchantments. <gray>Must follow a dual attack.</gray>

1644.name: Wastrel's Collapse
1644.description: Shadow Step to target foe. If target foe is not using a skill, that foe is knocked down. All of your non-dagger attack skills are disabled for 10 seconds.
1644.concise: Shadow Step to target foe. Causes knock-down if target foe is not using a skill. <gray>Disables your non-dagger attack skills (10 seconds).</gray>

1645.name: Lift Enchantment
1645.description: If target touched foe is knocked down, that foe loses one enchantment.
1645.concise: Removes one enchantment. <gray>No <sic/> effect unless target foe is knocked-down.</gray>

1646.name: Augury of Death
1646.description: For 5...35 seconds, the next time damage would drop target foe's Health below 50%, you inflict a Deep Wound for 5...20 seconds and Shadow Step to that foe. This spell has half the normal range.
1646.concise: Half Range Hex Spell. (5...35 seconds.) Inflict Deep Wound condition (5...20 seconds) and Shadow Step to target foe the next time damage would drop this foe's Health below 50%.

1647.name: Signet of Toxic Shock
1647.description: If target foe is suffering from Poison, that foe takes 10...100 damage.
1647.concise: Deals 10...100 damage. <gray>No effect unless target foe is Poisoned</gray>

1648.name: Signet of Twilight
1648.description: For each hex on target foe, that foe loses one enchantment.
1648.concise: Removes one enchantment for each hex on target foe.

1649.name: Way of the Assassin
1649.description: For the next 20 seconds while wielding daggers, you attack 5...20% faster and have a +5...35% chance to land a critical hit.
1649.concise: (20 seconds.) While wielding daggers, you attack 5...20% faster and have +5...35% chance to land a critical hit.

1650.name: Shadow Walk
1650.description: Shadow Step to target foe. For 15 seconds nothing happens. Your attack skills are disabled for 1 second, and your stances and enchantments are disabled for 10 seconds. When this stance ends, you return to your original location.
1650.concise: (15 seconds.) Shadow Step to target foe. End effect: return to your original location. <gray>Disables your attack skills for 1 second. Disables your stances and enchantments for 10 seconds.</gray>

1651.name: Death's Retreat
1651.description: Shadow Step to target ally. If you have less Health than that ally, you gain 40...130 Health.
1651.concise: Gain 40...130 Health if you have less Health than target ally. Initial effect: Shadow Step to this ally. <gray>Cannot self-target.</gray>

1652.name: Shadow Prison
1652.description: Shadow Step to target foe. For 1...7 seconds, that foe moves 66% slower.
1652.concise: Shadow Step to target foe. This foe moves 66% slower (1...7 seconds).

1653.name: Swap
1653.description: You and target summoned creature Shadow Step to each other's location.
1653.concise: You and target summoned creature Shadow Step to each other's locations.

1654.name: Shadow Meld
1654.description: Shadow Step to target other ally. When you stop maintaining this Enchantment, you return to your original location.
1654.concise: Shadow Step to target ally. End effect: return to your original location. <gray>Cannot self-target.</gray>

1655.name: Price of Pride
1655.description: For 5...20 seconds, the next time target foe uses an elite skill, that foe loses 1...7 Energy.
1655.concise: (5...20 seconds.) Causes 1...7 Energy loss the next time target foe uses an elite skill.

1656.name: Air of Disenchantment
1656.description: Remove one enchantment from target foe and all nearby foes. For 5...20 seconds, enchantments expire 150...300% faster on those foes.
1656.concise: Also hexes foes near your target (5...20 seconds). Remove one enchantment from target and nearby foes. Enchantments expire 150...300% faster on those foes.

1657.name: Signet of Clumsiness
1657.description: If target foe is attacking, that foe and all adjacent foes are interrupted and take 15...60 damage. Any foes using attack skills are knocked down.
1657.concise: Interrupts an attack for target foe and all adjacent foes. Interruption effect: deals 15...60 damage; knocks down foes using attack skills.

1658.name: Symbolic Posture
1658.description: For 5...20 seconds, the next signet you activate recharges 20...80% faster.
1658.concise: (5...20 seconds.) Your next signet recharges 20...80% faster.

1659.name: Toxic Chill
1659.description: Target foe is struck for 15...75 cold damage. If that foe is under the effects of a hex or enchantment, that foe becomes Poisoned for 10...25 seconds.
1659.concise: Deals 15...75 cold damage. Inflicts Poisoned condition (10...25 seconds) if target foe is hexed or enchanted.

1660.name: Well of Silence
1660.description: Exploit target corpse to create a Well of Silence for 10...30 seconds. Foes within the well cannot use shouts or chants and suffer -1...4 Health degeneration.
1660.concise: (10...30 seconds.) Foes in this well cannot use shouts and chants and have -1...4 Health degeneration. <gray>Exploits a fresh corpse.</gray>

1661.name: Glowstone
1661.description: Send a projectile that strikes for 5...50 earth damage if it hits. If this spell hits a weakened <sic/> foe, you gain 5 Energy plus 1 Energy for every 2 ranks of Energy Storage.
1661.concise: Projectile: deals 5...50 earth damage. You gain 5 Energy plus 1 Energy for every 2 ranks of Energy Storage if target foe is Weakened.

1662.name: Mind Blast
1662.description: Target foe is struck for 15...60 fire damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, you gain 1...8 Energy.
1662.concise: Deals 15...60 fire damage. You gain 1...8 Energy if you have more Energy than target foe.

1663.name: Elemental Flame
1663.description: For 10...35 seconds, whenever you apply an Elemental hex to a foe, that foe is set on fire for 1...5 seconds.
1663.concise: (10...35 seconds.) Inflicts Burning condition (1...5 seconds) whenever you apply an Elemental hex to a target.

1664.name: Invoke Lightning
1664.description: Target foe and up to two other foes near your target are struck for 10...90 lightning damage. This spell has 25% armor penetration.
1664.concise: Deals 10...90 lightning damage. Hits two foes near target. 25% armor penetration.

1683.name: Pensive Guardian
1683.description: For 5...11 seconds, target ally has a 50% chance to block attacks from enchanted foes.
1683.concise: (5...11 seconds.) 50% chance to block enchanted foes.

1684.name: Scribe's Insight
1684.description: For 10...35 seconds, you gain 3 Energy whenever you use a Signet.
1684.concise: (10...35 seconds.) You gain 3 Energy whenever you use a signet.

1685.name: Holy Haste
1685.description: For 1...60 seconds, your Healing Prayers spells cast 50% faster. This enchantment ends if you cast another enchantment.
1685.concise: (1...60 seconds.) Your Healing Prayers spells cast 50% faster. <gray>Ends if you cast an enchantment.</gray>

1687.name: Zealous Benediction
1687.description: Heal target ally for 30...180 Health. If target was below 50% Health, you gain 7 Energy.
1687.concise: Heals for 30...180. You gain 7 Energy if target ally was below 50% Health.

1688.name: Defender's Zeal
1688.description: For 5...25 seconds, whenever target foe hits with an attack, you gain 2 Energy.
1688.concise: (5...25 seconds.) You gain 2 Energy whenever target foe hits with an attack.

1689.name: Signet of Mystic Wrath
1689.description: Target foe takes 5...35 holy damage for each enchantment on you (maximum 100 holy damage).
1689.concise: Deals 5...35 holy damage for each enchantment on you (maximum 100 holy damage).

1690.name: Signet of Removal
1690.description: If target ally is under the effects of an enchantment, that ally loses one hex and one condition.
1690.concise: Removes one hex and one condition. <gray>No effect unless target ally is enchanted.</gray>

1691.name: Dismiss Condition
1691.description: Remove one condition from target ally. If that ally is under the effects of an enchantment, that ally is healed for 15...75 Health.
1691.concise: Removes one condition. Heals for 15...75 if target ally is enchanted.

1692.name: Divert Hexes
1692.description: Remove up to 1...3 hexes from target ally. For each hex removed in this way, that ally loses one condition and gains 15...75 Health.
1692.concise: Removes 1...3 hexes. For each hex removed, target ally loses one condition and gains 15...75 Health.

1693.name: Counterattack
1693.description: If this attack hits, you strike for +5...35 damage. If you hit an attacking foe, you gain 2...6 Energy.
1693.concise: Deals +5...35 damage. You gain 2...6 Energy if target foe is attacking.

1694.name: Magehunter Strike
1694.description: If this attack hits, you strike for +5...20 damage. If your target is under the effects of an enchantment, this attack cannot be blocked.
1694.concise: Deals +5...20 damage. Unblockable if target foe is enchanted.

1695.name: Soldier's Strike
1695.description: If this attack hits, you deal +10...40 more damage. If you are under the effects of a chant or shout, this attack cannot be blocked.
1695.concise: Deals +10...40 damage. Unblockable if you are under the effects of a chant or shout.

1696.name: Decapitate
1696.description: You lose all adrenaline and all Energy. If this attack hits, you deal +5...50 damage and cause a Deep Wound for 5...20 seconds. This attack always results in a critical hit.
1696.concise: Deals +5...50 damage. Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...20 seconds). Automatic critical hit. <gray>You lose all adrenaline and Energy.</gray>

1697.name: Magehunter's Smash
1697.description: If this attack hits, target foe is knocked down. If your target is under the effects of an enchantment, this attack cannot be blocked.
1697.concise: Causes knock-down. Unblockable if target foe is enchanted.

1698.name: Soldier's Stance
1698.description: For 5...15 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block. You attack 33% faster while under the effects of a shout or chant.
1698.concise: (5...15 seconds.) You have a 75% chance to block. You attack 33% faster while under the effects of a chant or shout.

1699.name: Soldier's Defense
1699.description: For 1...6 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block attacks while under the effects of a shout or chant. You gain 1 strike of adrenaline for each blocked attack.
1699.concise: (1...6 seconds.) You have 75% chance to block while under the effects of a shout or chant. Block effect: gain 1 adrenaline.

1700.name: Frenzied Defense
1700.description: For 8 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block incoming attacks, but take double damage.
1700.concise: (8 seconds.) You have 75% chance to block. <gray>You take double damage.</gray>

1701.name: Steady Stance
1701.description: For 10 seconds, the next time you would be knocked down, you gain 1...3 strikes of adrenaline and 1...7 Energy instead.
1701.concise: (10 seconds.) The next time you would be knocked-down, you gain 1...3 adrenaline and 1...7 Energy instead.

1702.name: Steelfang Slash
1702.description: If this attack hits, you deal +1...31 damage. If you hit a foe that is knocked down, you gain 1...5 adrenaline.
1702.concise: Deals +1...31 damage. You gain 1...5 adrenaline if target foe is knocked down.

1719.name: Screaming Shot
1719.description: If this attack hits, you deal +10...25 damage. If your target is within earshot, that foe begins Bleeding for 5...20 seconds.
1719.concise: Deals +10...25 damage. Inflicts Bleeding condition (5...20 seconds) if target foe is within earshot.

1720.name: Keen Arrow
1720.description: If this attack hits, you strike for +5...20 damage. If you land a critical hit, you deal an additional +5...25 damage.
1720.concise: Deals +5...20 damage. Deals +5...25 more damage if you land a critical hit.

1721.name: Rampage as One
1721.description: For 3...15 seconds, both you and your animal companion attack 33% faster and run 25% faster.
1721.concise: (3...15 seconds.) You and your pet attack 33% faster and move 25% faster. <gray>No effect unless your pet is alive.</gray>

1722.name: Forked Arrow
1722.description: Shoot two arrows simultaneously at target foe. If you are under the effects of an enchantment or hex, you shoot only one arrow.
1722.concise: You shoot two arrows simultaneously. <gray>Shoot only one arrow if you are enchanted or hexed.</gray>

1723.name: Disrupting Accuracy
1723.description: For 36 seconds, whenever your arrows critical, they also interrupt your target.
1723.concise: (36 seconds.) Interrupts an action whenever your arrows critical.

1724.name: Expert's Dexterity
1724.description: For 1...20 seconds, you attack 33% faster and your Marksmanship attribute is increased by 2.
1724.concise: (1...20 seconds.) You attack 33% faster and you gain +2 to your Marksmanship attribute.

1725.name: Roaring Winds
1725.description: Create a level 1...10 spirit. Chants and shouts cost 1...5 more Energy. This spirit dies after 30...60 seconds.
1725.concise: Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...60 second lifespan). Chants and shouts cost 1...5 more Energy for creatures in range.

1726.name: Magebane Shot
1726.description: If this attack hits, it interrupts target foe's action. If that action was a spell, it is disabled for an additional 10 seconds. This attack cannot be blocked.
1726.concise: Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: an interrupted spell is disabled for +10 seconds. Unblockable.

1727.name: Natural Stride
1727.description: For 1...8 seconds, you run 33% faster and have a 50% chance to block incoming attacks. Natural Stride ends if you become hexed or enchanted.
1727.concise: (1...8 seconds.) You move 33% faster and have 50% chance to block. <gray>Ends if you become hexed or enchanted.</gray>

1728.name: Heket's Rampage
1728.description: For 5...11 seconds, you attack 33% faster. This stance ends if you use an attack skill.
1728.concise: (5...11 seconds). You attack 33% faster. <gray>Ends if you use an attack skill.</gray>

1729.name: Smoke Trap
1729.description: When Smoke Trap is triggered, nearby foes are Blinded and Dazed for 5...10 seconds. Smoke Trap ends after 90 seconds. While activating this skill, you are easily interrupted.
1729.concise: (90 seconds.) Inflicts Blinded and Dazed conditions (5...10 seconds) to nearby foes. <gray>Easily interrupted.</gray>

1730.name: Infuriating Heat
1730.description: Create a level 1...10 spirit. Non-spirit creatures within its range gain adrenaline twice as fast. This spirit dies after 30...60 seconds.
1730.concise: Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...60 second lifespan). Doubles adrenaline gain for creatures in range.

1731.name: Vocal Was Sogolon
1731.description: For 60 seconds, all shouts and chants you use last 20...50% longer.
1731.concise: (60 seconds.) Shouts and chants you use last 20...50% longer.

1732.name: Destructive Was Glaive
1732.description: Hold Glaive's ashes for up to 30...60 seconds. While you hold her ashes, all Ritualist skills have 20% armor penetration. When you drop her ashes, all foes in the area are struck for 15...85 lightning damage.
1732.concise: (30...60 seconds.) Your Ritualist skills have 20% armor penetration. Drop effect: deals 15...85 lightning damage to all foes in the area.

1733.name: Wielder's Strike
1733.description: Target foe is struck for 5...50 lightning damage. If you are under the effects of a weapon spell, you deal an additional 10...40 lightning damage.
1733.concise: Deals 5...50 lightning damage. Deals 10...40 more lightning damage if you are under a weapon spell.

1734.name: Gaze of Fury
1734.description: Destroy target spirit and create a level 1...14 Spirit of Fury. This spirit's attacks deal 5...20 damage. This spirit dies after 30...60 seconds.
1734.concise: Destroys a spirit. Creates a level 1...14 spirit (30...60 second lifespan). Its attacks deal 5...20 damage.

1736.name: Spirit's Strength
1736.description: For 15...60 seconds, your attacks deal 5...35 more damage while under the effects of a weapon spell.
1736.concise: (15...60 seconds.) Your attacks deal +5...35 damage if you are under a weapon spell.

1737.name: Wielder's Zeal
1737.description: For 10...30 seconds, whenever you cast a Weapon Spell on an ally, you gain 1...5 Energy.
1737.concise: (10...30 seconds.) You gain 1...5 Energy whenever you cast a weapon spell.

1738.name: Sight Beyond Sight
1738.description: For 8...20 seconds, you cannot be Blinded.
1738.concise: (8...20 seconds). You are immune to Blindness.

1739.name: Renewing Memories
1739.description: For 5...20 seconds, while holding an item, any weapon and item Spells you cast cost 5...35% less Energy.
1739.concise: (5...20 seconds.) Your weapon and item spells cost 5...35% less Energy. <gray>No effect unless holding an item.</gray>

1740.name: Wielder's Remedy
1740.description: For 10...30 seconds, whenever you cast a weapon spell on an ally, that ally loses 1 condition.
1740.concise: (10...30 seconds.) Whenever you cast a weapon spell, the targeted ally loses one condition.

1741.name: Ghostmirror Light
1741.description: Target other ally is healed for 15...90 Health. If you are within earshot of a spirit, you are also healed for 15...90 Health.
1741.concise: Heals for 15...90. You gain 15...90 Health if you are within earshot of a spirit. <gray>Cannot self-target.</gray>

1742.name: Signet of Ghostly Might
1742.description: For 5...20 seconds, all spirits you control within earshot attack 33% faster and deal 5...10 additional damage.
1742.concise: (5...20 seconds.) All spirits you control within earshot attack 33% faster and deal +5...10 damage.

1743.name: Signet of Binding
1743.description: You lose 200...50 Health and take control of target enemy-controlled spirit. (50% failure chance with Spawning Power 4 or less.)
1743.concise: You lose 200...50 Health. Gain control of target enemy-controlled spirit. <gray>50% failure chance unless Spawning Power 5 or more.</gray>

1744.name: Caretaker's Charge
1744.description: Target foe is struck for 20...75 lightning damage. If you are holding an item, you gain 5 Energy and 5...50 Health.
1744.concise: Deals 20...75 lightning damage. You gain 5 Energy and 5...50 Health if you are holding an item.

1745.name: Anguish
1745.description: Create a level 1...11 spirit. This spirit's attacks deal 5...20 damage and deal double damage to hexed foes. This spirit dies after 15...45 seconds.
1745.concise: Creates a level 1...11 spirit (15...45 second lifespan). Its attacks deal 5...20 damage. Double damage to hexed foes.

1747.name: Empowerment
1747.description: Create a level 1...14 spirit. All allies within its range holding an item gain 15...45 maximum Health and 10 maximum Energy. This spirit dies after 15...60 seconds.
1747.concise: Creates a level 1...14 spirit (15...60 second lifespan). Allies in range holding an item gain 15...45 maximum Health and 10 maximum Energy.

1748.name: Recovery
1748.description: Create a level 1...14 spirit. Conditions on allies within range of this spirit expire 20...50% faster. This spirit dies after 30...60 seconds.
1748.concise: Creates a level 1...14 spirit (30...60 second lifespan). Conditions on allies in range expire 20...50% faster.

1749.name: Weapon of Fury
1749.description: For 5...20 seconds, target ally gains 5...50% more adrenaline and 1 Energy whenever that ally successfully hits with an attack.
1749.concise: (5...20 seconds.) 5...50% more adrenaline gain and +1 Energy whenever target ally hits with an attack.

1750.name: Xinrae's Weapon
1750.description: For 8 seconds, the next time target ally takes damage from a foe that damage is limited to 5% of that ally's max Health and that ally steals up to 20...80 Health from that foe.
1750.concise: (8 seconds). The next time target ally takes damage from a foe, that damage is limited to 5% of target ally's max Health and that ally steals 20...80 Health from that foe.

1751.name: Warmonger's Weapon
1751.description: For 3...13 seconds, if target ally attacks a foe who is not attacking, that foe is interrupted.
1751.concise: (3...13 seconds.) Attacks interrupt an action. Does not interrupt attacking foes.

1752.name: Weapon of Remedy
1752.description: For 8 seconds, the next time target ally takes damage or life steal from a foe, that ally steals up to 15...75 Health from that foe and loses 1 condition.
1752.concise: (8 seconds.) The next time target ally takes damage or life steal from a foe, this ally steals 15...75 Health from that foe and loses 1 condition.

1753.name: Rending Sweep
1753.description: You deal +5...20 and lose 1 Dervish enchantment. If an enchantment was lost, you remove an enchantment from each foe you hit.
1753.concise: Deals +5...20 damage. You lose 1 Dervish enchantment. Removal effect: struck foes lose an enchantment.

1754.name: Onslaught
1754.description: For 3...15 seconds, you attack, move and gain adrenaline 25% faster.
1754.concise: (3...15 seconds.) You attack, move and gain adrenaline 25% faster.

1755.name: Mystic Corruption
1755.description: All adjacent foes suffer from Disease for 1...2 seconds. For 20 seconds, nothing happens. Disease duration is doubled if you are enchanted when you activate this skill. When this enchantment ends, all party members in earshot are cured of Disease.
1755.concise: (20 seconds.) Initial Effect: all adjacent foes are Diseased (1...2 seconds.) Double duration if you are already enchanted. End Effect: party members in earshot lose Disease.

1756.name: Grenth's Grasp
1756.description: For 20 seconds, if you are wielding a cold weapon, your attack skills also Cripple that <sic/> foe for 1...11 seconds and you transfer 1 condition from yourself to that foe.
1756.concise: (20 seconds.) Inflicts Crippled condition (1...11 seconds) with your attack skills and transfer 1 condition. <gray>No effect unless wielding a cold weapon.</gray>

1757.name: Veil of Thorns
1757.description: When you cast this enchantment, all nearby foes are struck for 5...50 piercing damage. For 5...25 seconds you take 5...35% less damage from spells.
1757.concise: (5...25 seconds.) Spell damage is reduced by 5...35%. Initial Effect: nearby foes are struck for 5...50 piercing damage.

1758.name: Harrier's Grasp
1758.description: For 5...20 seconds, attacks against moving foes also Cripple that foe for 2...9 seconds. This enchantment ends after you apply Cripple 1...3 times. <sic/> When you cast this spell, you lose Cripple and 1 other condition.
1758.concise: (5...20 seconds.) Attacks on moving foes also Cripple them. <sic/> <gray>Ends after you apply Cripple 1...3 times. <sic/> </gray> Initial Effect: you lose Cripple and 1 other condition.

1759.name: Vow of Strength
1759.description: For 15 seconds, whenever you attack a foe with your scythe, you deal 10...25 slashing damage to all adjacent foes.
1759.concise: (15 seconds.) When you attack with a scythe, deals 10...25 slashing damage to adjacent foes.

1760.name: Ebon Dust Aura
1760.description: When you cast this enchantment, all nearby foes are Blinded for 1...7 seconds. For 30 seconds, if you are wielding an earth weapon, your melee attacks deal +3...15 earth damage. When this enchantment ends, you are cured of Blindness.
1760.concise: (30 seconds.) Deal +3...15 earth damage with your melee attacks. Initial Effect: Blinds nearby foes for 1...7 seconds. End Effect: removes Blindness. <gray>No effect unless wielding an earth weapon.</gray>

1761.name: Zealous Vow
1761.description: For 20 seconds, you have -3 Energy regeneration, and you gain 1...6 Energy every time you hit with an attack.
1761.concise: (20 seconds.) You gain 1...6 Energy each time you hit with an attack. <gray>You have -3 Energy regeneration.</gray>

1763.name: Zealous Renewal
1763.description: All nearby foes take 5...30 holy damage. For 5...25 seconds, you have -1 Energy regeneration, and gain 1 Energy whenever you hit a foe. If this enchantment ends prematurely, you gain 1...5 Energy.
1763.concise: (5...25 seconds.) Initial effect: deals 5...30 holy damage to nearby foes. You have -1 Energy regeneration and gain 1 Energy when you hit. Gain 1...5 Energy if this enchantment ends early.

1764.name: Attacker's Insight
