1764.description: For 3...10 seconds you have a 50% chance to block while attacking. When this enchantment ends, you inflict Weakness on all adjacent foes for 3...15 seconds.
1764.concise: (3...10 seconds.) Gives 50% block chance while attacking. End Effect: Causes Weakness 3...15 seconds to adjacent foes.

1765.name: Rending Aura
1765.description: When you cast this enchantment, all nearby foes take 10...40 cold damage. For 30 <sic/> seconds, your attack skills remove enchantments from knocked-down foes. When this enchantment ends, nearby foes are affected by Cracked Armor for 1...10 seconds.
1765.concise: (30 seconds.) Your attack skills remove enchantments from knocked-down foes. Initial effect: deals 10...40 cold damage to all nearby foes. End effect: nearby foes have Cracked Armor for 1...10 seconds.

1766.name: Featherfoot Grace
1766.description: For 5...20 seconds, you move 25% faster, and conditions expire 25% faster.
1766.concise: (5...20 seconds.) You move 25% faster, and conditions expire 25% faster.

1767.name: Reaper's Sweep
1767.description: If this attack hits, you Cripple your target for 3...15 seconds. You lose 1 Dervish enchantment. If an enchantment was removed, this attack knocks down for 2...3 seconds.
1767.concise: (3...15 seconds.) Cause Cripple. Lose 1 Dervish enchantment. Removal Effect: cause knockdown for 2...3 seconds.

1768.name: Harrier's Haste
1768.description: For 2...8 seconds, you move 25% faster and deal +3...12 more damage against moving foes.
1768.concise: (2...8 seconds.) You move 25% faster and deal +3...12 damage to moving foes.

1769.name: Focused Anger
1769.description: For 45 seconds, you gain 0...150% more adrenaline.

1770.name: Natural Temper
1770.description: For 4...10 seconds, you gain 33% more adrenaline while not under the effects of an Enchantment.
1770.concise: (4...10 seconds.) You gain 33% more adrenaline. <gray>No effect if you are enchanted.</gray>

1771.name: Song of Restoration
1771.description: For 10 seconds, the next time each party member within earshot uses a skill, that party member gains 45...110 Health.
1771.concise: (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot gain 45...110 Health with their next skill.

1772.name: Lyric of Purification
1772.description: For 5...20 seconds, the next time each ally within earshot uses a Signet, that ally loses 1 Condition.
1772.concise: (5...20 seconds.) Allies in earshot lose one condition with their next signet.

1773.name: Soldier's Fury
1773.description: For 10...35 seconds, if you are under the effects of a chant or a shout, you attack 33% faster and gain 33% more adrenaline, but you have -20 armor.
1773.concise: (10...35 seconds.) You attack 33% faster and gain 33% more adrenaline if under the effects of a shout or chant. <gray>You have -20 armor.</gray>

1774.name: Aggressive Refrain
1774.description: For 5...25 seconds, you attack 25% faster but have -20 armor. This echo is reapplied every time a chant or shout ends on you.
1774.concise: (5...25 seconds.) You attack 25% faster. Renewal: whenever a chant or shout ends on you. <gray>You have -20 armor.</gray>

1775.name: Energizing Finale
1775.description: For 10...35 seconds, whenever a shout or chant ends on target non-spirit ally, that ally gains 1 Energy.
1775.concise: (10...35 seconds.) Target ally gains 1 Energy whenever a shout or chant ends on that ally. <gray>Cannot target spirits.</gray>

1776.name: Signet of Aggression
1776.description: If you are under the effects of a shout or chant, you gain 2 strikes of adrenaline.
1776.concise: You gain 2 adrenaline if you are under the effects of a shout or chant.

1778.name: Signet of Return
1778.description: Resurrect target party member with 5...15% Health and 1...4% Energy for each party member within earshot.
1778.concise: Resurrects target party member (5...15% Health and 1...4% Energy for each party member in earshot).

1779.name: "Make Your Time!"
1779.description: You gain 1 strike of adrenaline for each party member within earshot (maximum 1...5 adrenaline).
1779.concise: You gain one adrenaline (maximum 1...5) for each party member in earshot.

1780.name: "Can't Touch This!"
1780.description: For 20 seconds, the next 1...5 touch skills used against allies <sic/> within earshot fails.
1780.concise: (20 seconds.) The next 1...5 touch-range skills used against allies <sic/> within earshot fails.

1781.name: "Find Their Weakness!"
1781.description: For 5...20 seconds, the next time target ally attacks, that ally deals +5...50 damage and inflicts a Deep Wound for 5...20 seconds.
1781.concise: (5...20 seconds.) Target ally deals +5...50 damage and inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...20 seconds) with the next attack.

1782.name: "The Power Is Yours!"
1782.description: For 3 seconds, all allies within earshot gain 0...1 Energy regeneration.
1782.concise: (3 seconds.) Allies within earshot gain 0...1 Energy regeneration.

1783.name: Slayer's Spear
1783.description: If this attack hits, you deal +5...25 damage. If that foe has more Health than you, that foe suffers from a Deep Wound for 5...20 seconds.
1783.concise: Deals +5...25 damage. Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...20 seconds) if target has more Health than you.

1784.name: Swift Javelin
1784.description: If this attack hits, you deal +5...20 damage. If you are under the effects of an enchantment, this spear flies twice as fast and cannot be blocked.
1784.concise: Deals +5...20 damage. This spear moves twice as fast and is unblockable if you are enchanted.

1814.name: Lightbringer's Gaze
1814.description: Target demonic servant of Abaddon takes 100 holy damage and is interrupted. This skill strikes one additional foe in the area for each rank of Lightbringer you have attained. This skill is disabled for 15 seconds after it is used.
1814.concise: Target demonic servant of Abaddon takes 100 holy damage and is interrupted. Hits one additional foe in the area for each rank of Lightbringer you have attained. <gray>This skill is disabled (15 seconds).</gray>

1815.name: Lightbringer Signet
1815.description: If you are within the area of a demonic servant of Abaddon, you gain 4...5 strikes of adrenaline and 22...24 Energy.
1815.concise: You gain 4...5 strikes of adrenaline and 22...24 Energy if you are within the area of a demonic servant of Abaddon.

1816.name: Sunspear Rebirth Signet
1816.description: Resurrect target dead party member at your location with full Health and 10% Energy for each Sunspear rank you have attained. This signet can only be used once per mission unless recharged by a morale boost.
1816.concise: Resurrect target dead ally <sic/> at your location (full Health and 10% Energy for each Sunspear Rank attained). <gray>This signet only recharges when you gain a morale boost.</gray>

1948.name: Shadow Sanctuary (Luxon)
1948.description: You are Blinded for 5 seconds. For 10 seconds, you gain +7...10 Health regeneration and +40 armor.
1948.concise: (10 seconds.) You gain +7...10 Health regeneration and +40 armor. <gray>You are Blind (5 seconds).</gray>

1949.name: Ether Nightmare (Luxon)
1949.description: Target foe loses 5...8 Energy. For each point of Energy lost in this way, that foe and all foes in the area suffer -1 Health degeneration for 10 seconds.
1949.concise: Causes 5...8 Energy loss. Target and foes in the area have -1 Health degeneration for each point of Energy lost (10 seconds).

1950.name: Signet of Corruption (Luxon)
1950.description: Target foe and all nearby foes take 20...30 damage. For each affected foe suffering from a condition or hex, you gain 2 Energy (maximum 12...20 Energy).
1950.concise: Deals 20...30 damage to target and nearby foes. You gain 2 Energy (maximum 12...20) for each of these foes with a condition or hex.

1951.name: Elemental Lord (Luxon)
1951.description: For 40...60 seconds, your elemental attributes are boosted by 1. Each time you cast a spell, you gain 1 Energy for every 10 ranks of Energy Storage and are healed for 100...300% of the spell's Energy cost.
1951.concise: (40...60 seconds.) Your elemental attributes are boosted by 1. Each time you cast a spell, you gain 1 energy for every 10 ranks of Energy Storage and are healed for 100...300% of the spell's Energy cost.

1952.name: Selfless Spirit (Luxon)
1952.description: For 15...20 seconds, spells you cast that target another ally cost 3 less energy.
1952.concise: (15...20 seconds.) Spells you cast that target another ally cost 3 less Energy.

1953.name: Triple Shot (Luxon)
1953.description: Shoot 3 arrows simultaneously at target foe. These arrows deal 40...25% less damage.
1953.concise: Shoot 3 arrows simultaneously at target foe. <gray>These arrows deal 40...25% less damage</gray>

1954.name: "Save Yourselves!" (Luxon)
1954.description: For 4...6 seconds, all other party members gain +100 armor.
1954.concise: (4...6 seconds.) All other party members gain +100 armor.

1955.name: Aura of Holy Might (Luxon)
1955.description: For 45 seconds, you deal 20...25 holy damage to all adjacent foes whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment.
1955.concise: (45 seconds.) Whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment, adjacent foes take 20...25 holy damage.

1957.name: Spear of Fury (Luxon)
1957.description: This attack deals +30...40 damage. If this attack hits a foe suffering from a condition, you gain 3...6 strikes of adrenaline.
1957.concise: Deals +30...40 damage. Gain 3...6 strikes of adrenaline if you hit a foe with a condition.

1986.name: Vampiric Assault
1986.description: Must follow an off-hand attack. If this attack hits, you steal 10...40 Health.
1986.concise: Steals 10...40 Health if this attack hits. <gray>Must follow an off-hand attack.</gray>

1987.name: Lotus Strike
1987.description: Must follow a lead attack. If it hits, this attack strikes for +10...25 damage and you gain 5...20 Energy.
1987.concise: Deals +10...25 damage; you gain 5...20 Energy. <gray>Must follow a lead attack.</gray>

1988.name: Golden Fang Strike
1988.description: Must follow a lead attack. If you are under the effects of an enchantment and this attack hits, target foe suffers from a Deep Wound for 5...20 seconds.
1988.concise: Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...20 seconds) if you are enchanted. <gray>Must follow a lead attack.</gray>

1990.name: Falling Lotus Strike
1990.description: Must strike a knocked-down foe. If it hits, you strike for +15...35 damage and gain 1...12 Energy.
1990.concise: Deals +15...35 damage; you gain 1...12 Energy. <gray>No effect unless target foe is knocked-down.</gray>

1991.name: Sadist's Signet
1991.description: You gain 10...40 Health for each condition on target foe.
1991.concise: You gain 10...40 Health for each condition on target foe.

1992.name: Signet of Distraction
1992.description: If target foe is casting a spell, that spell is interrupted and disabled for 1...5 seconds for each signet you have equipped.
1992.concise: Interrupts a spell. Interruption effect: target foe's spell is disabled for 1...5 seconds for each signet you have equipped.

1993.name: Signet of Recall
1993.description: For 10 seconds, you have -4 Energy regeneration. When this effect ends, you gain 13...20 Energy.
1993.concise: (10 seconds.) You have -4 Energy regeneration. End effect: you gain 13...20 Energy.

1994.name: Power Lock
1994.description: If target foe is casting a spell or chant, that skill is interrupted and disabled for an additional 5...13 seconds.
1994.concise: Interrupts a spell or chant. Interruption effect: interrupted spell or chant is disabled for +5...13 seconds.

1995.name: Waste Not, Want Not
1995.description: If target foe is not casting a spell or attacking, you gain 8...13 Energy.
1995.concise: You gain 8...13 Energy if target foe is not attacking or casting a spell.

1996.name: Sum of All Fears
1996.description: For 1...10 seconds, target foe moves, attacks, and casts spells 33% slower.
1996.concise: (1...10 seconds.) Target foe moves, attacks, and casts spells 33% slower.

1997.name: Withering Aura
1997.description: For 5...20 seconds, target ally's melee attacks cause Weakness for 5...20 seconds.
1997.concise: (5...20 seconds.) Target ally's melee attacks cause Weakness condition (5...20 seconds.)

1998.name: Cacophony
1998.description: For 10 seconds, whenever target foe uses a shout or chant, that foe takes 35...105 damage.
1998.concise: (10 seconds.) Deals 35...105 damage whenever target foe uses a shout or chant.

1999.name: Winter's Embrace
1999.description: For 2...6 seconds, target foe moves 66% slower and takes 5...15 damage while moving.
1999.concise: (2...6 seconds.) Target foe moves 66% slower and takes 5...15 damage while moving.

2000.name: Earthen Shackles
2000.description: For 3 seconds, target and all nearby foes move 90% slower. When Earthen Shackles ends, it applies Weakness for 5...20 seconds.
2000.concise: (3 seconds.) Target and nearby foes move 90% slower. Applies Weakness for 5...20 seconds when it ends.

2001.name: Ward of Weakness
2001.description: You create a Ward of Weakness at your current location. For 5...20 seconds, foes in this area become Weakened for 5...20 seconds whenever they take elemental damage.
2001.concise: (5...20 seconds). Inflicts Weakened condition (5...20 seconds) to any foes that take elemental damage in this ward.

2002.name: Glyph of Swiftness
2002.description: For 15 seconds, your next 1...5 spells recharge 25% faster and projectiles from the affected spells move 200% faster.
2002.concise: (15 seconds.) Your next 1...5 spells recharge 25% faster and projectiles from them move 200% faster.

2003.name: Cure Hex
2003.description: Remove one Hex from target ally. If a Hex was removed, that ally is healed for 30...120 Health.
2003.concise: Removes a Hex. Removal effect: Heals for 30...120.

2004.name: Smite Condition
2004.description: Remove one condition from target ally. If a condition was removed, foes in the area take 10...60 holy damage.
2004.concise: Removes a condition. Removal effect: deals 10...60 holy damage to foes in the area of target ally.

2005.name: Smiter's Boon
2005.description: For 30 seconds, your Smiting Prayers have double the Divine Favor bonus.
2005.concise: (30 seconds.) Your Smiting Prayers have double Divine Favor healing bonus.

2006.name: Castigation Signet
2006.description: Target foe takes 26...56 holy damage. If that foe was attacking, you gain 1...10 Energy.
2006.concise: Deals 26...56 holy damage. You gain 1...10 Energy if target foe is attacking.

2007.name: Purifying Veil
2007.description: While you maintain this enchantment, conditions expire 5...50% faster on target ally. When this enchantment ends, one condition is removed from that ally.
2007.concise: Conditions expire 5...50% faster on target ally. End effect: removes a condition.

2008.name: Pulverizing Smash
2008.description: If you hit a knocked-down foe, that foe suffers from Weakness and a Deep Wound for 5...20 seconds.
2008.concise: Inflicts Weakness and Deep Wound conditions (5...20 seconds) if target foe is knocked-down.

2009.name: Keen Chop
2009.description: If it hits, this attack always results in a critical hit.

2010.name: Knee Cutter
2010.description: If this attack hits a Crippled foe, you gain 2...7 Energy and 1...3 strikes <sic/> of adrenaline.
2010.concise: You gain 2...7 Energy and 1...3 adrenaline if target foe is Crippled.

2011.name: Grapple
2011.description: You and target touched foe are knocked down. You lose your current stance.
2011.concise: Causes knockdown. You are also knocked down. <gray>Your current stance ends.</gray>

2012.name: Radiant Scythe
2012.description: This attack strikes for +1 damage for each point of Energy you currently have, maximum 5...30. You gain 1...7 Energy if this attack hits.
2012.concise: Deals +1 damage (maximum 5...30) for each point of Energy you have. Gain 1...7 Energy.

2013.name: Grenth's Aura
2013.description: For 20 seconds, you deal 5...25 less damage and steal 5...25 Health whenever you hit with a scythe attack. When you cast this enchantment you steal 5...25 Health from all adjacent foes.
2013.concise: (20 seconds.) You deal 5...25 less damage and steal 5...25 Health when you hit with a scythe. Initial effect: steal 5...25 Health from all adjacent foes.

2014.name: Signet of Pious Restraint
2014.description: Remove one Dervish enchantment. Target foe is Crippled for 5...15 seconds. If an enchantment was removed, all foes nearby your target are also Crippled and this signet recharges 75% faster.
2014.concise: Inflicts Crippled condition (5...15 seconds). Remove one of your Dervish enchantments. Removal effect: also causes Cripple to foes nearby your target and recharges 75% faster.

2015.name: Farmer's Scythe
2015.description: If this attack hits, you deal +5...20 damage. If you hit more than one foe, this attack recharges instantly.
2015.concise: Deals +5...20 damage. Instant recharge if you hit more than one foe.

2016.name: Energetic Was Lee Sa
2016.description: Hold Lee Sa's ashes for 5...15 seconds. While you hold her ashes, you gain +2 Energy regeneration. When you drop her ashes, you gain +1...10 Energy.
2016.concise: (5...15 seconds.) You have +2 Energy regeneration. Drop effect: you gain +1...10 Energy.

2017.name: Anthem of Weariness
2017.description: For 8 seconds, the next attack skill used by each ally within earshot also causes Weakness for 1...16 seconds.
2017.concise: (8 seconds.) Allies in earshot inflict Weakness (1...16 seconds) with their next attack skill.

2018.name: Anthem of Disruption
2018.description: For 1...10 seconds, the next attack skill used by each ally within earshot also interrupts an action.
2018.concise: (1...10 seconds.) Allies in earshot interrupt an action with their next attack skill.

2051.name: Summon Spirits (Luxon)
2051.description: All spirits you control Shadow Step to your location, and gain 60...100 Health.
2051.concise: Spirits you control Shadow Step to your location and gain 60...100 Health.

2052.name: Shadow Fang
2052.description: Shadow Step to target foe. For 10 seconds, this hex does nothing. When this hex ends, you return to your original location and that foe suffers from a Deep Wound for 5...20 seconds.
2052.concise: Shadow Step to target foe. End effect after 10 seconds: inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...20 seconds); you return to your original location.

2053.name: Calculated Risk
2053.description: For 3...24 seconds, target foe's attacks do +10 damage, but there is a 50% chance that the damage from each attack will be done to that foe instead. (Maximum 15...100 damage.)
2053.concise: Target foe does +10 damage with attacks (3...24 seconds). There is a 50% chance that the damage from each attack (maximum 15...100) will be done to that foe instead.

2054.name: Shrinking Armor
2054.description: For 10 seconds, target foe suffers from -1...4 Health degeneration. When this hex ends, that foe has Cracked Armor for 5...20 seconds.
2054.concise: (10 seconds.) Causes -1...4 Health degeneration. End effect: inflicts Cracked Armor condition (5...20 seconds).

2055.name: Aneurysm
2055.description: Target foe regains all Energy. For each point of Energy gained in this way, that foe takes 1...3 damage and all adjacent foes lose 1 Energy. (Maximum 1...30).
2055.concise: Target foe regains all Energy. For each point of Energy gained, target takes 1...3 damage and all adjacent foes lose 1 Energy (maximum 1...30).

2056.name: Wandering Eye
2056.description: For 4 seconds, the next time target foe attacks, that attack is interrupted and all nearby foes take 30...110 damage.
2056.concise: (4 seconds.) Interrupts target foe's next attack. Interruption effect: 30...110 damage to nearby foes.

2057.name: Foul Feast
2057.description: All conditions are transferred from target other ally to yourself. For each condition acquired in this way, you gain 0...45 Health and 0...2 Energy. This skill recharges twice as fast if you remove Disease from your target.
2057.concise: Transfers all conditions from target ally to yourself. You gain 0...45 Health and 0...2 Energy for each condition transferred. Half recharge if you remove Disease. <gray>Cannot self-target.</gray>

2058.name: Putrid Bile
2058.description: For 5...20 seconds, target foe suffers -1...3 Health degeneration. If that foe dies while under the effects of this hex, all nearby foes take 25...85 damage.
2058.concise: (5...20 seconds.) Causes -1...3 Health degeneration. Deals 25...85 damage to all nearby foes if target foe dies.

2059.name: Shell Shock
2059.description: Target foe is struck for 10...30 lightning damage and has Cracked Armor for 5...20 seconds. This spell has 25% armor penetration. If you are Overcast, this spell strikes adjacent foes.
2059.concise: Deals 10...30 lightning damage. Inflicts Cracked Armor condition (5...20 seconds). 25% armor penetration. If Overcast, strikes adjacent.

2060.name: Glyph of Immolation
2060.description: For 15 seconds, your next 1...4 spells that targets a foe also causes Burning for 1...4 seconds.
2060.concise: (15 seconds.) Your next 1...4 spells that targets a foe also inflicts Burning condition (1...4 seconds).

2061.name: Patient Spirit
2061.description: For 2 seconds, target ally is enchanted with Patient Spirit. Unless this enchantment ends prematurely, that ally is healed for 30...120 Health when the enchantment ends.
2061.concise: (2 seconds.) End effect: heals for 30...120. <gray>No effect if ends early.</gray>

2062.name: Healing Ribbon
2062.description: Target other ally is healed for 20...110 Health. Up to 2 additional allies near target ally are healed for 10...100 Health.
2062.concise: Heals for 20...110. Heals two additional allies near target ally for 10...100. <gray>Cannot self-target.</gray>

2063.name: Aura of Stability
2063.description: For 3...8 seconds, target other ally cannot be knocked down.
2063.concise: (3...8 seconds.) Target ally cannot be knocked-down. <gray>Cannot self-target.</gray>

2064.name: Spotless Mind
2064.description: For 1...15 seconds, target other ally loses a hex every 5 seconds.
2064.concise: (1...15 seconds.) Removes a hex every 5 seconds. <gray>Cannot self-target.</gray>

2065.name: Spotless Soul
2065.description: For 1...15 seconds, target other ally loses a condition every 3 seconds.
2065.concise: (1...15 seconds.) Removes a condition every 3 seconds. <gray>Cannot self-target.</gray>

2066.name: Disarm
2066.description: Interrupt target foe's action. If that action was an attack, all of that foe's attack skills are disabled for 0...3 seconds.
2066.concise: Interrupts target foe. Interruption effect: disables this foe's attack skills (0...3 seconds) if that action was an attack.

2067.name: "I Meant to Do That!"
2067.description: If you are knocked down, you gain 1...5 strikes of adrenaline.
2067.concise: You gain 1...5 strikes of adrenaline if you are knocked-down.

2068.name: Rapid Fire
2068.description: For 5...25 seconds, you attack 33% faster while wielding a bow.
2068.concise: (5...25 seconds.) You attack 33% faster while wielding a bow.

2069.name: Sloth Hunter's Shot
2069.description: If this attack hits, target foe takes +10...25 damage. If that foe is not using a skill, Sloth Hunter's Shot does an additional +10...35 damage.
2069.concise: Deals +10...25 damage. Deals +10...35 more damage if target foe is not using a skill.

2070.name: Aura Slicer
2070.description: If this attack hits, you inflict Bleeding for 5...15 seconds. If you are enchanted, you also inflict Cracked Armor for 1...10 seconds.
2070.concise: (5...15 seconds.)Inflicts <sic/> Bleeding condition. Also inflicts Cracked Armor (1...10 seconds) if you are enchanted.

2071.name: Zealous Sweep
2071.description: If this attack hits, you deal +5...20 damage. You gain 3 Energy and 1 adrenaline for each foe you hit.
2071.concise: Deals +5...20 damage. You gain 3 Energy and 1 adrenaline for each foe you hit.

2072.name: Pure Was Li Ming
2072.description: Hold Li Ming's ashes for 5...20 seconds. While you hold her ashes, conditions on you expire 10...50% faster. When you drop her ashes, all allies within earshot lose 1...4 conditions.
2072.concise: (5...20 seconds.) Conditions on you expire 10...50% faster. Drop effect: removes 1...4 conditions from allies in earshot.

2074.name: Chest Thumper
2074.description: If this attack hits a foe with Cracked Armor, that foe suffers a Deep Wound for 5...20 seconds.
2074.concise: Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...20 seconds) if target foe has Cracked Armor.

2075.name: Hasty Refrain
2075.description: For 3...11 seconds, target ally moves 25% faster. This echo is reapplied every time a chant or shout ends on that ally.
2075.concise: (3...11 seconds.) Target ally moves 25% faster. Renewal: every time a chant or shout ends on this ally.

2091.name: Shadow Sanctuary (Kurzick)
2091.description: You are Blinded for 5 seconds. For 10 seconds, you gain +7...10 Health regeneration and +40 armor.
2091.concise: (10 seconds.) You gain +7...10 Health regeneration and +40 armor. <gray>You are Blind (5 seconds).</gray>

2092.name: Ether Nightmare (Kurzick)
2092.description: Target foe loses 5...8 Energy. For each point of Energy lost in this way, that foe and all foes in the area suffer -1 Health degeneration for 10 seconds.
2092.concise: Causes 5...8 Energy loss. Target and foes in the area have -1 Health degeneration for each point of Energy lost (10 seconds).

2093.name: Signet of Corruption (Kurzick)
2093.description: Target foe and all nearby foes take 20...30 damage. For each affected foe suffering from a condition or hex, you gain 2 Energy (maximum 12...20 Energy).
2093.concise: Deals 20...30 damage to target and nearby foes. You gain 2 Energy (maximum 12...20) for each of these foes with a condition or hex.

2094.name: Elemental Lord (Kurzick)
2094.description: For 40...60 seconds, your elemental attributes are boosted by 1. Each time you cast a spell, you gain 1 Energy for every 10 ranks of Energy Storage and are healed for 100...300% of the spell's Energy cost.
2094.concise: (40...60 seconds.) Your elemental attributes are boosted by 1. Each time you cast a spell, you gain 1 energy for every 10 ranks of Energy Storage and are healed for 100...300% of the spell's Energy cost.

2095.name: Selfless Spirit (Kurzick)
2095.description: For 15...20 seconds, spells you cast that target another ally cost 3 less energy.
2095.concise: (15...20 seconds.) Spells you cast that target another ally cost 3 less Energy.

2096.name: Triple Shot (Kurzick)
2096.description: Shoot 3 arrows simultaneously at target foe. These arrows deal 40...25% less damage.
2096.concise: Shoot 3 arrows simultaneously at target foe. <gray>These arrows deal 40...25% less damage</gray>

2097.name: "Save Yourselves!" (Kurzick)
2097.description: For 4...6 seconds, all other party members gain +100 armor.
2097.concise: (4...6 seconds.) All other party members gain +100 armor.

2098.name: Aura of Holy Might (Kurzick)
2098.description: For 45 seconds, you deal 20...25 holy damage to all adjacent foes whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment.
2098.concise: (45 seconds.) Whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment, adjacent foes take 20...25 holy damage.

2099.name: Spear of Fury (Kurzick)
2099.description: This attack deals +30...40 damage. If this attack hits a foe suffering from a condition, you gain 3...6 strikes of adrenaline.
2099.concise: Deals +30...40 damage. Gain 3...6 strikes of adrenaline if you hit a foe with a condition.

2100.name: Summon Spirits (Kurzick)
2100.description: All spirits you control Shadow Step to your location, and gain 60...100 Health.
2100.concise: Spirits you control Shadow Step to your location and gain 60...100 Health.

2101.name: Critical Agility
2101.description: For 4 seconds and 1 second for each rank of Critical Strikes, you attack 33% faster and gain 15...25 armor. This skill reapplies itself every time you land a critical hit.
2101.concise: (4 seconds plus 1 second for each rank of Critical Strikes.) You attack 33% faster and gain +15...25 armor. Renewal: every time you land a critical hit.

2102.name: Cry of Pain
2102.description: Interrupt target foe's skill. If that foe was suffering from a Mesmer hex, that foe and all foes in the area take 25...50 damage and have -3...5 Health degeneration for 10 seconds.
2102.concise: Interrupts a skill. If target foe had a Mesmer hex, deals 25...50 damage to target and foes in the area and causes -3...5 Health degeneration (10 seconds).

2103.name: Necrosis
2103.description: If target foe is suffering from a condition or hex, that foe suffers 60...90 damage.
2103.concise: Deals 60...90 damage if target foe has a condition or hex.

2104.name: Intensity
2104.description: For 10 seconds, the next time you deal elemental damage with a spell to a target, you deal 60...70% of that damage to all other foes in the area.
2104.concise: (10 seconds.) The next time you deal elemental damage with a spell, other targets in the area take 60...70% of that damage.

2105.name: Seed of Life
2105.description: For 2...5 seconds, whenever target other ally takes damage, all party members are healed for 2 Health for each rank in Divine Favor.
2105.concise: (2...5) seconds. Heals party members for 2 for each rank in Divine Favor whenever target takes damage. Cannot self target.

2107.name: Whirlwind Attack
2107.description: Attack target and adjacent foes. Each attack that hits deals +13...20 damage.
2107.concise: Deals +13...20 damage to target and adjacent foes.

2108.name: Never Rampage Alone
2108.description: For 18...25 seconds, you and your pet attack 25% faster and have 1...3 Health regeneration.
2108.concise: (18...25 seconds.) You and your pet attack 25% faster and have +1...3 Health regeneration.

2109.name: Eternal Aura
2109.description: You have +100 max Health. When this enchantment ends, all party members in the area are resurrected with 40...50% Health and 20...30% Energy.
2109.concise: You have +100 max Health. End effect: all party members in the area are resurrected with 40...50% Health and 20...30% Energy.

2110.name: Vampirism
2110.description: Create a level 4...14 spirit that dies after 75...150 seconds. Attacks by this spirit steal up to 10...20 Health, and you are healed for 10...20 Health.
2110.concise: Creates a level 4...14 spirit (lifespan 75...150 seconds). Its attacks steal 10...20 Health, and you are healed for 10...20.

2112.name: "There's Nothing to Fear!"
2112.description: For 4 seconds and 1 second for every 2 ranks in Leadership, all party members within earshot take 20...35% less damage. Affected party members are healed for 35...60 Health when this shout ends.
2112.concise: (4 seconds plus 1 second for every 2 ranks in Leadership.) Reduces damage by 20...35% for party members in earshot. End effect: heals for 35...60 Health.

2116.name: Sneak Attack
2116.description: If this attack hits, target foe is Blinded for 5...8 seconds. This attack counts as a lead attack.
2116.concise: Inflicts Blindness (5...8 seconds). <gray>Counts as a lead attack.</gray>

2135.name: Trampling Ox
2135.description: Must follow an off-hand attack. If it hits, you deal +5...20 damage. If you a <sic/> hit a Crippled foe, that foe is knocked down.
2135.concise: Deals +5...20 damage; causes knock-down if target foe is Crippled. <gray>Must follow an off-hand attack.</gray>

2136.name: Smoke Powder Defense
2136.description: For 8 seconds, the next time you are struck, you take half damage and all adjacent foes are Blinded for 2...6 seconds.
2136.concise: (8 seconds.) The next time you are struck, you take half damage and inflict Blindness condition (2...6 seconds) on adjacent foes.

2137.name: Confusing Images
2137.description: For 2...10 seconds, target foe takes twice as long to activate non-attack skills.
2137.concise: (2...10 seconds). Target foe takes twice as long to activate non-attack skills.

2138.name: Hexer's Vigor
2138.description: For 10 seconds, you have +1...8 Health regeneration. Hexer's Vigor ends if you cast a non-hex skill.
2138.concise: (10 seconds.) You have +1...8 Health regeneration. <gray>Ends if you use a non-hex skill.</gray>

2139.name: Masochism
2139.description: For 10...40 seconds, you have +2 to your Death Magic and Soul Reaping attributes and sacrifice 5...3% of your maximum Health when you cast a spell.
2139.concise: (10...40 seconds.) You have +2 Death Magic and Soul Reaping. Sacrifice 5...3% Health when you cast a spell.

2140.name: Piercing Trap
2140.description: When Piercing Trap is triggered, all nearby foes are struck for 5...50 piercing damage. Any foes with Cracked Armor are struck for an additional 15...60 damage. Piercing Trap ends after 90 seconds. While activating this skill, you are easily interrupted.
2140.concise: (90 seconds.) Affects nearby foes. Deals 5...50 piercing damage. Deals 15...60 more damage to any foes with Cracked Armor. <gray>Easily interrupted.</gray>

2141.name: Companionship
2141.description: If you have less Health than your pet, you are healed for 30...120 Health. If your pet has less Health than you, it is healed for 30...120 Health.
2141.concise: Heals you for 30...120 if you have less Health than your pet. Heals your pet for 30...120 if it has less Health than you.

2142.name: Feral Aggression
2142.description: For 5...20 seconds, your pet attacks 33% faster and deals +3...10 additional damage.
2142.concise: (5...20 seconds.) Your pet attacks 33% faster and deals +3...10 damage.

2143.name: Disrupting Shot
2143.description: If this attack hits, target foe's action is interrupted. If that action was a Skill, you strike for +10...40 damage.
2143.concise: Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: +10...40 damage if you interrupt a skill.

2144.name: Volley
2144.description: All your Preparations are removed. Shoot arrows at target foe and up to 3 foes adjacent to your target. These arrows strike for +1...10 damage if they hit.
2144.concise: Deals +1...10 damage. Hits up to 3 foes adjacent to your target. <gray>All your preparations are removed.</gray>

2145.name: Expert Focus
2145.description: For 24 seconds, your bow attack skills cost 1...2 less Energy and deal 1...10 extra damage.
2145.concise: (24 seconds.) Your bow attack skills cost 1...2 less Energy and do +1...10 damage.

2146.name: Pious Fury (PvP)
2146.description: Remove one Dervish enchantment. For 1...5 seconds, you attack 25% faster. If an enchantment was removed, this stance lasts twice as long.
2146.concise: (1...5 seconds.)You <sic/> attack 25% faster and remove 1 of your Dervish enchantments. Removal effect: this stance lasts twice as long.

2147.name: Crippling Victory
2147.description: If this attack hits a foe, that foe is Crippled for 3...8 seconds. If you have more Health than target foe, all adjacent foes take 10...30 earth damage.
2147.concise: (3...8 seconds) Cripples target foe. If your health is greater than target foe's, all adjacent foes take 10...30 earth damage.

2148.name: Sundering Weapon
2148.description: For 4...10 seconds, target ally's next 3 attacks have 10% armor penetration and cause Cracked Armor for 5...20 seconds.
2148.concise: (4...10 seconds.) Target ally's next 3 attacks inflict Cracked Armor condition (5...20 seconds) and have 10% armor penetration.

2149.name: Weapon of Renewal
2149.description: For 4...10 seconds, the next time target ally hits with an attack skill, that ally gains 1...7 Energy.
2149.concise: (4...10 seconds.) Target ally gains 1...7 Energy the next time this ally hits with an attack skill.

2150.name: Maiming Spear
2150.description: If your attack hits a Bleeding foe, that foe is Crippled for 5...20 seconds.
2150.concise: Inflicts Crippled condition (5...20 seconds) if target foe is Bleeding.

2186.name: Signet of Deadly Corruption
2186.description: Target foe takes 5...35 damage for each condition on that foe (maximum 130 damage).
2186.concise: Deals 5...35 damage (maximum 130) for each condition on target foe.

2187.name: Way of the Master
2187.description: For 60 seconds, while holding a non-dagger weapon, you have an additional 3...33% chance to land a critical hit.
2187.concise: (60 seconds.) While holding a non-dagger weapon, you have +3...33% chance to land a critical hit.

2188.name: Defile Defenses
2188.description: For 5...20 seconds, the next time target foe blocks, that foe takes 30...120 damage.
2188.concise: (5...20 seconds.) Deals 30...120 damage the next time target foe blocks.

2189.name: Angorodon's Gaze
2189.description: Steal 10...50 Health from target foe. If you are suffering from a condition, you gain 3...12 Energy.
2189.concise: Steals 10...50 Health. You gain 3...12 Energy if you have a condition.

2190.name: Magnetic Surge
2190.description: Target foe takes 15...75 damage. If you are Overcast, Magnetic Surge enchants all allies in earshot for 1...5 seconds to block the next attack against them.
2190.concise: Deals 15...75 damage. If you are Overcast, allies in earshot are enchanted for 1...5 <sic/> and block the next attack against them.

2191.name: Slippery Ground
2191.description: If target or adjacent foes are Blind or moving, these foes are knocked down. There is a 50% chance of failure with Water Magic less than 5.
2191.concise: Causes knock-down if this foe is Blind or moving. Affects foes adjacent to your target. <gray>50% failure chance unless Water Magic greater than 4.</gray>

2192.name: Glowing Ice
2192.description: Target foe is struck for 5...50 cold damage. If that foe is under the effects of a Water Magic hex, you gain 5 Energy plus 1 Energy for every 2 ranks of Energy Storage.
2192.concise: Deals 5...50 cold damage. You gain 5 Energy plus 1 Energy for every 2 ranks of Energy Storage if target foe is hexed with Water Magic.

2193.name: Energy Blast
2193.description: Target foe takes 1...2 damage for each point of Energy you have (maximum 130 damage).
2193.concise: Deals 1...2 damage (maximum 130) for each point of Energy you have.

2194.name: Distracting Strike
2194.description: If Distracting Strike hits, it deals no damage and interrupts target foe's action. If target foe has Cracked Armor, that skill is disabled for 20 seconds.
2194.concise: Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: Disables interrupted skill (20 seconds) if target foe has Cracked Armor. <gray>Deals no damage.</gray>

2195.name: Symbolic Strike
2195.description: If this attack hits, you deal +12 damage for each signet you have equipped (maximum 70 damage).
2195.concise: Deals +12 damage (maximum 70) for each signet you have equipped.

2196.name: Soldier's Speed
2196.description: For 3...18 seconds, you move 15% faster. You move an additional 15% faster while under the effects of a chant or shout.
2196.concise: (3...18 seconds.) You move 15% faster and an additional 15% while affected by a chant or shout.

2197.name: Body Blow
2197.description: If this attack hits, target foe takes +10...40 damage. If target foe has Cracked Armor, that foe suffers from a Deep Wound for 0...15 seconds.
2197.concise: Deals +10...40 damage. Inflicts Deep Wound (0...15 seconds) if target foe has Cracked Armor.

2198.name: Body Shot
2198.description: If this attack hits, you deal +5...20 damage. If it hits a foe with Cracked Armor, you gain 5...10 Energy.
2198.concise: Deals +5...20 damage. You gain 5...10 Energy if target foe has Cracked Armor.

2199.name: Poison Tip Signet
2199.description: For 60 seconds, your next attack also inflicts Poison for 8...15 seconds.
2199.concise: (60 seconds.) Inflicts Poisoned condition (8...15 seconds) with your next attack.

2200.name: Signet of Mystic Speed
2200.description: For 30 seconds, your next 1...3 self-targeting enchantments cast instantly. Flash enchantments do not consume uses of this skill.
2200.concise: (30 seconds.) Your next 1...3 self-targeted enchantments <sic/> cast instantly. <gray>Flash enchantments do not consume uses of this skill.</gray>

2201.name: Shield of Force
2201.description: For 1...16 seconds, blocks the next 1 attack against you. If an attack is blocked, all adjacent attacking foes are knocked down and suffer from Weakness for 5...20 seconds.
2201.concise: (1...16 seconds.) Blocks the next 1 attack against you. Knocks down and inflicts Weakness (5...20 seconds) on all adjacent attacking foes.

2202.name: Mending Grip
2202.description: Target ally is healed for 15...75 Health. If that ally is under the effects of a weapon spell, that ally loses one condition.
2202.concise: Heals for 15...75. Removes one condition if target ally is under a Weapon <sic/> spell.

2203.name: Spiritleech Aura
2203.description: For 5...20 seconds, all of your spirits within earshot deal 5...20 less damage and steal 5...20 Health when they attack.
2203.concise: (5...20 seconds.) All of your spirits within earshot deal 5...20 less damage and steal 5...20 Health when they attack.

2204.name: Rejuvenation
2204.description: Create a level 1...20 spirit. This spirit heals all party members within earshot for 3...10 Health each second. This spirit loses 3...10 Health for each party member healed in this way. This spirit dies after 30...90 seconds.
2204.concise: Creates a level 1...20 spirit (30...90 second lifespan). Heals party members in earshot for 3...10 each second. <gray>Healing cost: this spirit loses 3...10 Health.</gray>

2205.name: Agony
2205.description: Create a level 1...12 spirit. This spirit causes 3...10 Health loss each second to foes within earshot. This spirit loses 3...10 Health for each foe hurt in this way. This spirit dies after 30...90 seconds.
2205.concise: Creates a level 1...12 spirit (30...90 second lifespan). Causes 3...10 Health loss each second to foes in earshot. <gray>This spirit loses 3...10 Health for each foe that loses Health.</gray>

2206.name: Ghostly Weapon
2206.description: For 5...20 seconds, target other ally's next attack cannot be blocked.
2206.concise: (5...20 seconds.) Target ally's next attack is unblockable. <gray>Cannot self-target.</gray>

2207.name: Inspirational Speech
2207.description: You lose all adrenaline and target other ally gains 1...4 strikes of adrenaline.
2207.concise: Target ally gains 1...4 strikes of adrenaline. <gray>Cannot self-target. You lose all adrenaline.</gray>

2208.name: Burning Shield
2208.description: For 3...9 seconds, while wielding a shield, the next attack skill used against you is blocked. If it was a melee attack, your attacker is set on fire for 1...6 seconds.
2208.concise: (3...9 seconds.) Blocks the next attack skill against you. Inflicts Burning condition (1...6 seconds) if it was a melee attack. <gray>No effect unless you are wielding a shield.</gray>

2209.name: Holy Spear
2209.description: If this attack hits, you deal +5...20 damage. If it hits a summoned creature, all nearby foes take 15...90 holy damage, and are set on fire for 3 seconds.
2209.concise: Deals +5...20 damage. Deals 15...90 holy damage and inflicts Burning condition (3 seconds) to nearby foes if you hit a summoned creature.

2210.name: Spear Swipe
2210.description: If this attack hits, you deal +5...20 damage and target foe is Dazed for 4...10 seconds. This attack has melee range.
2210.concise: Spear Melee Attack. Deals +5...20 damage and inflicts Dazed condition (4...10 seconds). <gray>This attack has melee range.</gray>

2211.name: Alkar's Alchemical Acid
2211.description: Throw Alkar's Alchemical Acid at target foe. Target and adjacent foes are struck for 40...50 damage. Destroyers take an additional 45...70 damage and they have Cracked Armor for 14...20 seconds.
2211.concise: Projectile: deals 40...50 damage to target and adjacent foes. Deals 45...70 more damage and inflicts Cracked Armor condition (14...20 seconds) to Destroyers.

2212.name: Light of Deldrimor
2212.description: All foes in the area are struck for 55...80 holy damage. The location of hidden objects are briefly indicated on your Compass. Any hidden objects in the area are revealed.
2212.concise: Deals 55...80 holy damage to foes in the area. Pings hidden objects within the area on the compass.

2213.name: Ear Bite
2213.description: Target touched foe takes 50...70 piercing damage and begins Bleeding for 15...25 seconds.
2213.concise: Deals 50...70 piercing damage and inflicts Bleeding condition (15...25 seconds).

2214.name: Low Blow
2214.description: Strike target foe for 45...70 damage. If target foe is knocked down, that foe takes an additional 30...50 damage and suffers from Cracked Armor for 14...20 seconds.
2214.concise: Deals 45...70 damage. Inflicts 30...50 damage and Cracked Armor (14...20 seconds) if target foe is knocked down.

2215.name: Brawling Headbutt
2215.description: You headbutt target touched foe dealing 45...70 damage and knocking down that foe if it hits.

2216.name: "Don't Trip!"
2216.description: For 3...5 seconds, party members within earshot cannot be knocked down.
2216.concise: (3...5 seconds.) Prevents knock-down; affects party members within earshot.

2217.name: "By Ural's Hammer!"
2217.description: For 30 seconds, all dead party members in earshot are resurrected with full Health and Energy. Resurrected party members deal 25...33% more damage. When this effect ends, affected party members die. This skill does not incur a death penalty.
2217.concise: (30 seconds.) Resurrect all dead party members in earshot with full Health and Energy. Affected party members deal 25...33% more damage. Affected party members die when it ends, but do not receive a death penalty.

2218.name: Drunken Master
2218.description: For 72...90 seconds, your movement and attack speeds are increased by 10...15%. If you are drunk while activating this skill, your movement and attack speeds are increased by 25...33% instead.
2218.concise: (72...90 seconds.) You move and attack 10...15% faster if you are not drunk. You move and attack 25...33% faster if you are drunk.

2219.name: Great Dwarf Weapon
2219.description: For 20 seconds, target other ally's weapon strikes for +15...20 damage and has a 28...40% chance to cause knock down.
2219.concise: (20 seconds.) +15...20 weapon damage and 28...40% chance to cause knock-down with attacks. <gray>Cannot self-target.</gray>

2220.name: Great Dwarf Armor
2220.description: For 22...40 seconds, target ally has +24 armor, +60 maximum Health, and an additional +24 armor against Destroyers.
2220.concise: (22...40 seconds.) +24 armor and +60 maximum Health. Additional +24 armor against Destroyers.

2221.name: Breath of the Great Dwarf
2221.description: All party members are relieved of Burning and are healed for 50...60 Health.
2221.concise: Removes burning and heals for 50...60 Health. Affects party members.

2222.name: Snow Storm
2222.description: Create a Snow Storm at target foe's location. For 5 seconds, foes adjacent to that location are struck for 30...40 cold damage each second.
2222.concise: Deals 30...40 cold damage each second (5 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to target foe's initial location.

2223.name: Black Powder Mine
2223.description: When Black Powder Mine is triggered, all nearby foes are struck for 20...30 damage, become Blinded, and begin Bleeding for 7...10 seconds. Black Powder Mine ends after 90 seconds. While activating this skill, you are easily interrupted.
2223.concise: (90 seconds.) Affects nearby foes. Deals 20...30 damage. Inflicts Blindness and Bleeding conditions (7...10 seconds). <gray>Easily interrupted.</gray>

2224.name: Summon Mursaat
2224.description: Summon a level 14...20 Mursaat that lives for 40...60 seconds and has Enervating Charge. Only 1 Asura Summon can be active at a time.
2224.concise: Summon a level 14...20 Mursaat (40...60 lifespan) that has Enervating Charge. Only 1 Asura Summon can be active a time.

2225.name: Summon Ruby Djinn
2225.description: Summon a level 14...20 Ruby Djinn that lives for 40...60 seconds and has Immolate. Only 1 Asura Summon can be active at a time.
2225.concise: Summon a level 14...20 Ruby Djinn (40...60 lifespan) that has Immolate. Only 1 Asura Summon can be active a time.

2226.name: Summon Ice Imp
2226.description: Summon a level 14...20 Ice Imp that lives for 40...60 seconds and has Ice Spikes. Only 1 Asura Summon can be active a time.
2226.concise: Summon a level 14...20 Ice Imp (40...60 lifespan) that has Ice Spikes. Only 1 Asura Summon can be active a time.

2227.name: Summon Naga Shaman
2227.description: Summon a level 14...20 Naga Shaman that lives for 40...60 seconds and has Stoning. Only 1 Asura Summon can be active a time.
2227.concise: Summon a level 14...20 Naga Shaman (40...60 lifespan) that has Stoning. Only 1 Asura Summon can be active a time.

2228.name: Deft Strike
2228.description: If this attack hits, target foe takes 18...30 damage. If that foe has Cracked Armor, it begins Bleeding for 18...30 seconds.
2228.concise: Deals 18...30 damage. Inflicts Bleeding condition (18...30 seconds) if target foe has Cracked Armor.

2229.name: Signet of Infection
2229.description: If target foe is Bleeding, that foe is Diseased for 13...20 seconds.
2229.concise: Inflicts Diseased condition 13...20 seconds if target foe is Bleeding.

2230.name: Tryptophan Signet
2230.description: For 14...20 seconds, target foe and all adjacent foes move and attack 23...40% slower.
2230.concise: (14...20 seconds.) Target and adjacent foes move and attack 23...40% slower.

2231.name: Ebon Battle Standard of Courage
2231.description: You plant an Ebon Battle Standard of Courage at your current location. For 14...20 seconds, non-spirit allies in this area gain +24 armor and an additional +24 armor against Charr.
2231.concise: (14...20 seconds.) Allies in this ward have +24 armor and +24 more armor against Charr. <gray>Spirits are unaffected.</gray>

2232.name: Ebon Battle Standard of Wisdom
2232.description: You plant an Ebon Battle Standard of Wisdom at your current location. For 14...20 seconds, non-spirit allies in this area have a 44...60% chance to halve skill recharge of spells they cast.
2232.concise: (14...20 seconds.) Spells that allies in this ward cast have a 44...60% chance to recharge 50% faster. <gray>Spirits are unaffected.</gray>

2233.name: Ebon Battle Standard of Honor
2233.description: You plant an Ebon Battle Standard of Honor at your current location. For 14...20 seconds, non-spirit allies in this area strike for +8...15 damage and an additional +7...10 vs. Charr.
2233.concise: (14...20 seconds.) Allies in this ward deal +8...15 damage and +7...10 more damage against Charr. <gray>Spirits are unaffected.</gray>

2234.name: Ebon Vanguard Sniper Support
2234.description: Target foe is struck for 54...90 piercing damage and begins Bleeding for 5...25 seconds. This attack has a 10% chance of doing an additional +540...900 piercing damage. If this attack hits a Charr it has a 25% chance of doing an additional +540...900 piercing damage.
2234.concise: Deals 54...90 piercing damage and inflicts Bleeding condition (5...25 seconds). 10% chance of +540...900 piercing damage. 25% chance of +540...900 piercing damage if target foe is a Charr.

2235.name: Ebon Vanguard Assassin Support
2235.description: Summon a level 14...20 Ebon Vanguard Assassin that has Iron Palm, Fox Fangs, and Nine Tail Strike. This summoned Assassin Shadow Steps to target foe. If that foe is a Charr, the Assassin lives for 24...30 seconds. If target foe is not a Charr, the Assassin lives for 12...15 seconds.
2235.concise: Summon a level 14...20 assassin that has Iron Palm, Fox Fangs, and Nine Tail Strike; it Shadow Steps to this foe. If this foe is a Charr, the assassin lives for 24...30 seconds. If target foe is not a Charr, the Assassin lives for 12...15 seconds.

2236.name: Well of Ruin
2236.description: Exploit nearest corpse to create a Well of Ruin at its location. For 5...30 seconds, whenever a foe in the well takes physical damage, that foe has Cracked Armor for 5...20 seconds.
2236.concise: (5...30 seconds.) Inflicts Cracked Armor condition (5...20 seconds) to any foe in the well that takes physical damage. <gray>Exploits a fresh corpse.</gray>

2237.name: Atrophy
2237.description: For 3...7 seconds, target foe's primary attribute is reduced to 0.
2237.concise: (3...7 seconds.) Reduces this foe's primary attribute to 0.

2238.name: Spear of Redemption
2238.description: If this attack hits, you deal +5...20 damage. If it fails to hit, you lose one condition.
2238.concise: Deals +5...20 damage. If it fails to hit, you lose one condition.

2353.name: "Finish Him!"
2353.description: If target foe has less than 50% Health, that foe takes 44...80 damage and suffers from Cracked Armor and a Deep Wound for 12...20 seconds.
2353.concise: Deals 44...80 damage and inflicts Cracked Armor and Deep Wound conditions (12...20 seconds). <gray>No effect unless target foe has less than 50% Health.</gray>

2354.name: "Dodge This!"
2354.description: For 16...20 seconds, your next attack cannot be blocked and does +14...20 damage.
2354.concise: (16...20 seconds.) Your next attack is unblockable and deals +14...20 damage.

2355.name: "I Am the Strongest!"
2355.description: Your next 5...8 attacks do an additional +14...20 damage.

2356.name: "I Am Unstoppable!"
2356.description: For 16...20 seconds, you have +24 armor and cannot be knocked down or Crippled.
2356.concise: (16...20 seconds.) You have +24 armor and cannot be knocked-down or Crippled.

2357.name: A Touch of Guile
2357.description: Target touched foe takes 44...80 damage. If target foe was knocked down, that foe cannot attack for 5...8 seconds.
2357.concise: Touch Hex Spell. Deals 44...80 damage. Target foe cannot attack (5...8 seconds) if it was knocked-down.

2358.name: "You Move Like a Dwarf!"
2358.description: Target foe is knocked down and takes 44...80 damage. That foe is also Crippled for 8...15 seconds.
2358.concise: Deals 44...80 damage, causes knock-down, and inflicts Crippled condition (8...15 seconds).

2359.name: "You Are All Weaklings!"
2359.description: Target foe and foes adjacent to target are Weakened for 8...12 seconds.
2359.concise: Inflicts Weakness condition (8...12 seconds). Also affects adjacent foes.

2360.name: Feel No Pain
2360.description: For 30 seconds you have +2...3 Health regeneration. If you are drunk when activating this skill, you also have +200...300 maximum Health.
2360.concise: (30 seconds.) You have +2...3 Health regeneration. You have +200...300 maximum Health if you are drunk when activating this skill.

2361.name: Club of a Thousand Bears
2361.description: If this attack hits, it deals +6...9 damage for each adjacent foe (maximum 60 damage). If target foe is non-human it is knocked down.
2361.concise: Deals +6...9 damage for each adjacent foe (maximum 60 damage). Causes knock-down if target foe is non-human.

2374.name: Ursan Blessing
2374.description: You lose all effects and take on the aspect of the bear. For 60 seconds, you have 100 armor and 750...800 Health. All your attributes are set to 0 and bear attacks replace your skills.
2374.concise: You lose all effects and take on the aspect of the bear (60 seconds). All your attributes are set to 0 and bear attacks replace your skills, and you have 100 armor and 750...800 Health.

2379.name: Volfen Blessing
2379.description: You lose all effects and take on the aspect of the wolf. For 60 seconds, you have 80 armor, 660...700 Health, and 2...4 Health regeneration. All your attributes are set to 0 and wolf attacks replace your skills.
2379.concise: You lose all effects and take on the aspect of the wolf (60 seconds). All your attributes are set to 0 and wolf attacks replace your skills, and you have 80 armor, 660...700 Health and 2...4 Health regeneration.

2384.name: Raven Blessing
2384.description: You lose all effects and take on the aspect of the raven. For 60 seconds, you have 80 armor, 660...700 Health, and a 20...30% chance to block, All your attributes are set to 0 and raven attacks replace your skills.
2384.concise: You lose all effects and take on the aspect of the Raven (60 seconds). All your attributes are set to 0 and raven attacks replace your skills, and you have 80 armor, 660...700 Health, and a 20...30% block chance.

2411.name: Mindbender
2411.description: For 10...16 seconds, you move 20...33% faster and your Spells take 20% less time to cast.
2411.concise: (10...16 seconds.) You move 20...33% faster and cast Spells 20% faster.

2412.name: Smooth Criminal
2412.description: For 10...20 seconds, one random spell is disabled for target foe and Smooth Criminal is replaced by that spell. You gain 5...10 Energy.
2412.concise: (10...20 seconds.) Disables one Spell. This skill becomes that Spell. You gain 5...10 Energy.

2413.name: Technobabble
2413.description: Target foe and all adjacent foes are struck for 30...40 damage. If target foe is not a boss, that foe and all adjacent foes are Dazed for 3...5 seconds.
2413.concise: Deals 30...40 damage to target and adjacent foes. Inflicts Dazed condition (3...5 seconds) on these foes if target was not a boss.

2414.name: Radiation Field
2414.description: For 5 seconds, foes in the area have --4...6 Health degeneration. When the portal ends, foes in the area are Diseased for 12...20 seconds.
2414.concise: (5 seconds.) Causes --4...6 Health degeneration to foes in the area. End effect: inflicts Disease condition (12...20 seconds) to foes in the area.

2415.name: Asuran Scan
2415.description: For 9...12 seconds your attacks cannot miss target foe. Killing a foe hexed with Asuran Scan removes 5% Death Penalty.
2415.concise: (9...12 seconds.) You cannot miss target foe. If you kill this foe, you lose 5% Death Penalty.

2416.name: Air of Superiority
2416.description: For 20...30 seconds you gain a random Asura benefit every time you earn experience from killing an enemy.
2416.concise: (20...30 seconds). Gain a random Asura benefit every time you earn experience from killing an enemy.

2417.name: Mental Block
2417.description: For 5...11 seconds you have a 50% chance to block attacks. This Enchantment is reapplied every time an enemy strikes you.
2417.concise: (5...11 seconds.) You have a 50% chance to block. Renewal: every time an enemy hits you.

2418.name: Pain Inverter
2418.description: For 6...10 seconds, every time target foe deals damage that foe takes 100...140% of the damage it causes (maximum 80 damage).
2418.concise: (6...10 seconds.) Deals 100...140% of the damage (maximum 80) back to target foe every time it does damage.

2420.name: Ebon Escape
2420.description: Shadow Step to target other ally. You and that other ally are healed for 70...110 health.
2420.concise: Heals you and target ally for 70...110. Initial effect: Shadow Step to this ally. <gray>Cannot self-target.</gray>

2421.name: Weakness Trap
2421.description: When Weakness Trap is triggered, all nearby foes are Weakened for 10...20 seconds and take 24...50 lightning damage. All Charr are knocked down. Weakness Trap ends after 90 seconds. While activating this skill, you are easily interrupted.
2421.concise: (90 seconds.) Affects nearby foes. Deals 24...50 lightning damage. Inflicts Weakness condition (10...20 seconds). Knocks-down Charr. <gray>Easily interrupted.</gray>

2422.name: Winds
2422.description: Create a level 4...10 Spirit. All foes within its range have 15% chance to miss with ranged attacks. This spirit dies after 54...90 seconds.
2422.concise: Creates a level 4...10 spirit (54...90 second lifespan.) Affects foes within range. 15% chance to miss with ranged attacks.

2423.name: Dwarven Stability
2423.description: For 24...30 seconds, your stances last 55...100% longer. If you activated this skill while drunk, you cannot be knocked down.
2423.concise: (24...30 seconds.) Your stances last 55...100% longer. You cannot be knocked-down if you activated this skill while drunk . <sic/>

2657.name: Call of Haste (PvP)
2657.description: For 30 seconds, your animal companion has a 25% faster attack speed and moves 25% faster.
2657.concise: (30 seconds.) Your pet moves and attacks 25% faster.

2734.name: Mind Wrack (PvP)
2734.description: For 5...40 seconds, whenever this foe is the target of one of your non-hex Mesmer skills, that foe loses 1 Energy. If the target foe's Energy drops to 0, Mind Wrack ends and that foe takes 15...100 damage.
2734.concise: (5...40 seconds.) Causes 1 Energy loss each time foe is the target of your non-hex Mesmer skills. If target foe's Energy drops to 0, Mind Wrack ends and that foe takes 15...100 damage.

2803.name: Mind Freeze (PvP)
2803.description: Target foe takes 10...40 cold damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, that foe suffers an additional 10...40 cold damage and moves 90% slower for 1...5 seconds.
2803.concise: Deals 10...40 cold damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, deals +10...40 cold damage and causes 90% slower movement (1...5 seconds).

2804.name: Mind Shock (PvP)
2804.description: Target foe suffers 10...50 lightning damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, that foe suffers 10...50 more lightning damage and is knocked down. This spell has 25% armor penetration.
2804.concise: Deals 10...50 lightning damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, deals +10...50 lightning damage and causes knockdown. 25% armor penetration.

2805.name: Mist Form (PvP)
2805.description: For 10...45 seconds, you take 33% less damage from foes under the effects of Water Magic hexes. Whenever you cast an elemental spell, all non-spirit allies in earshot are healed for 50...250% of the Energy cost of the spell. This spell does not heal allies above 80% Health.
2805.concise: (10...45 seconds.) Take 33% less damage from foes hexed with Water Magic. Heals non-spirit allies in earshot for 50...250% of the energy cost of your elemental spells. <gray>Does not heal allies above 80% Health.</gray>

2806.name: Ward Against Harm (PvP)
2806.description: Create a Ward Against Harm at this location. For 5...15 seconds, non-spirit allies in this area have +1...3 health regeneration, +12...24 armor, and an additional +12...24 armor against elemental damage. This spell is disabled for 30 seconds.
2806.concise: (5...15 seconds.) Allies in this ward have +1...3 Health regeneration, +12...24 armor, and +12...24 additional armor against elemental damage. <gray>Spirits are unaffected. This spell is disabled for 30 seconds.</gray>

2807.name: Ride the Lightning (PvP)
2807.description: You Ride the Lightning to target. All adjacent foes are Blinded for 1...5 seconds. If your target is a foe, it is struck for 10...70 lightning damage. This spell has 25% armor penetration.
2807.concise: Deals 10...70 lightning damage. 25% armor penetration. Blinds all adjacent foes (1...5 seconds). You instantly move to your target. May target allies.

2808.name: Enraged Smash (PvP)
2808.description: If Enraged Smash hits, you gain 1...4 strikes of adrenaline. If you hit a moving foe, you strike for +10...40 damage, and target foe is knocked down.
2808.concise: Gives you 1...4 strikes of adrenaline if you hit. Deals +10...40 damage and causes knockdown if target foe was moving.

2809.name: Obsidian Flame (PvP)
2809.description: Deal 22...92 damage to target foe. This spell ignores armor.

2857.name: Aegis (PvP)
2857.description: For 1...3 seconds, target other party member cannot be the target of hostile spells, and attacks against this party member fail.
2857.concise: (1...3 seconds). Target party member cannot be targeted by hostile spells. Attacks against this party member fail. <gray>Cannot self-target.</gray>

2858.name: "Watch Yourself!" (PvP)
2858.description: Party members within earshot gain +5...25 armor for 10 seconds. This shout ends after 1...3 incoming attacks.
2858.concise: (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot have +5...25 armor. <gray>Ends after 1...3 incoming attacks.</gray>

2859.name: Enfeeble (PvP)
2859.description: Target suffers from Weakness for 10...30 seconds.

2860.name: Ether Renewal (PvP)
2860.description: For 7 seconds, each time you cast a spell, you gain 1...3 Energy and 5...20 Health for each enchantment on you.
2860.concise: (7 seconds.) Each time you cast a spell, you gain 1...3 Energy and 5...20 Health for each enchantment on you.

2861.name: Penetrating Attack (PvP)
2861.description: If Penetrating Attack hits, you strike for +3...10 damage and this attack has 10% armor penetration.

2862.name: Shadow Form (PvP)
2862.description: For 5...15 seconds, all hostile spells that target you fail and all attacks against you miss. When Shadow Form ends, lose all but 5...50 Health.
2862.concise: (5...15 seconds.) Hostile spells targeting you fail, and attacks against you miss. <gray>End effect: lose all but 5...50 Health.</gray>

2863.name: Discord (PvP)
2863.description: If target foe is suffering from a condition and under the effects of a hex or an enchantment, that foe suffers 30...110 damage.
2863.concise: Deals 30...110 damage. <gray>No effect unless target foe has a condition and is either hexed or enchanted.</gray>

2864.name: Sundering Attack (PvP)
2864.description: If Sundering Attack hits, you strike for +3...10 damage and this attack has 10% armor penetration.

2866.name: Flesh of My Flesh (PvP)
2866.description: Lose half your Health. Resurrect target party member with your current Health and 5...20% Energy.
2866.concise: Resurrect target party member (half your current Health and 5...20% Energy). Lose half your Health.

2867.name: Ancestors' Rage (PvP)
2867.description: For 3 seconds all foes adjacent to target ally are struck for 1...41 lightning damage each second.
2867.concise: (3 seconds.) Deals 1...41 lightning damage to foes adjacent to target ally each second.

2868.name: Splinter Weapon (PvP)
2868.description: For 20 seconds, target ally has a Splinter Weapon. Target ally's next 1...5 attacks deal 5...30 damage to up to 4 adjacent foes.
2868.concise: (20 seconds.) Attacks deal 5...30 damage to 3 <sic/> adjacent foes. <gray>Ends after 1...5 attacks.</gray>

2869.name: Assassin's Remedy (PvP)
2869.description: For 30 seconds, the next 1...10 attack skills you use remove one condition.
2869.concise: (30 seconds.) Your next 1...10 attack skills each remove one condition.

2871.name: Light of Deliverance (PvP)
2871.description: All party members are healed for 5...70 Health. All your Smiting Prayers are disabled for 20 seconds.
2871.concise: Heals entire party for 5...70. <gray>Disables your Smiting Prayers (20 seconds).</gray>

2872.name: Death Pact Signet (PvP)
2872.description: Resurrect target party member with your current Health and 15...100% Energy. The next time that ally dies within 120 seconds, so do you.
2872.concise: Resurrects target party member with your current Health and 15...100% maximum Energy. For 120 seconds, you die the next time this party member dies.

2875.name: Harrier's Toss (PvP)
2875.description: If this attack hits, you deal +5...20 damage. If this attack hits a moving foe, it deals an additional 5...30 damage.
2875.concise: Deals +5...20 damage. Deals 5...30 more damage if target is moving.

2876.name: Defensive Anthem (PvP)
2876.description: For 4...10 seconds, each party member within earshot has a 50% chance to block incoming attacks. This chant ends if that party member hits with an attack skill.
2876.concise: (4...10 seconds.) Party members in earshot have 50% chance to block. <gray>Ends when hitting with an attack skill.</gray>

2877.name: Ballad of Restoration (PvP)
2877.description: For 10 seconds, the next time each party member within earshot takes damage, that party member gains 15...75 Health.
2877.concise: (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot gain 15...75 Health the next time they take damage.

2878.name: Song of Restoration (PvP)
2878.description: For 10 seconds, the next time each party member within earshot uses a skill, that party member gains 45...110 Health.
2878.concise: (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot gain 45...110 Health with their next skill.

2879.name: "Incoming!" (PvP)
2879.description: For 4...10 seconds, all allies within earshot move 33% faster, and gain 5...15 Health while moving.
2879.concise: (4...10 seconds) Allies in earshot move 33% faster and gain 5...15 Health while moving.

2880.name: "Never Surrender!" (PvP)
2880.description: For 10 seconds, all party members within earshot and below 75% Health gain +1...5 Health regeneration.
2880.concise: (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot gain +1...5 Health regeneration. <gray>Only affects party members below 75% Health.</gray>

2883.name: "For Great Justice!" (PvP)
2883.description: For 8 seconds, when you hit with an attack, you gain 1 additional strike of adrenaline.
2883.concise: (8 seconds.) You gain 1 extra strike of adrenaline whenever you hit with an attack.

2884.name: Mystic Regeneration (PvP)
2884.description: For 5...20 seconds, you have +1...4 Health regeneration for each enchantment (maximum of 3) on you.
2884.concise: (5...20 seconds.) You have +1...4 Health regeneration for each enchantment (maximum of 3) on you.

2885.name: Enfeebling Blood (PvP)
2885.description: Target foe and all nearby foes suffer from Weakness for 1...16 seconds.
2885.concise: Inflicts Weakness condition (1...16 seconds) on this foe and nearby foes.

2887.name: Signet of Judgment (PvP)
2887.description: Target foe is knocked down. That foe and all adjacent foes take 5...50 holy damage. This signet has half the normal range.
2887.concise: Elite Half Range Signet. Knocks down target. Deals 5...50 holy damage to target and adjacent foes.

2891.name: Unyielding Aura (PvP)
2891.description: Bring target dead party member back to life at full Health and full Energy. If you stop maintaining this enchantment or if this enchantment is removed, that party member dies and leaves an exploited corpse. Deaths while enchanted with Unyielding Aura do not incur a death penalty. (50% failure chance with Divine Favor 4 or less.)
2891.concise: Resurrects target party member (full Health, full Energy). End effect: this ally dies and leaves an exploited corpse. Does not incur a death penalty. <gray>50% failure chance unless Divine Favor 5 or more.</gray>

2892.name: Spirit Bond (PvP)
2892.description: For 8 seconds, whenever target ally takes more than 50 damage from the next 10 attacks or spells, that ally is healed for 30...90 Health.
2892.concise: (8 seconds.) Heals for 30...90 whenever target ally takes more than 50 damage. <gray>Ends after this ally takes damage from 10 attacks or spells.</gray>

2893.name: Weapon of Warding (PvP)
2893.description: For 3...8 seconds, target ally has a Weapon of Warding that grants target ally +2...4 Health regeneration and a 50% chance to block. Weapon of Warding ends if that ally attacks.
2893.concise: (3...8 seconds.) +2...4 Health regeneration. 50% chance to block. <gray>Ends if target ally attacks.</gray>

2895.name: Smiter's Boon (PvP)
2895.description: For 5 seconds, your Smiting Prayers have double the Divine Favor bonus.
2895.concise: (5 seconds.) Your Smiting Prayers have double Divine Favor healing bonus.

2925.name: Sloth Hunter's Shot (PvP)
2925.description: If this attack hits, target foe takes +5...20 damage. If that foe is not using a skill, Sloth Hunter's Shot does an additional +5...15 damage.
2925.concise: Deals +5...20 damage. Deals +5...15 more damage if target foe is not using a skill.

2959.name: Expert's Dexterity (PvP)
2959.description: For 1...20 seconds, you attack 15% faster and your Marksmanship attribute is increased by 1.
2959.concise: (1...20 seconds.) You attack 15% faster and you gain +1 to your Marksmanship attribute.

2965.name: Signet of Spirits (PvP)
2965.description: You gain 3...12 Energy if you are within earshot of a spirit.
2965.concise: You gain 3...12 Energy. <gray>No effect unless you are within earshot of a spirit.</gray>

2966.name: Signet of Ghostly Might (PvP)
2966.description: Target allied summoned creature's attacks deal 5...35 more damage. After 10 seconds, that creature is destroyed.
2966.concise: Target allied summoned creature deals +5...35 damage. <gray>That creature is destroyed after 10 seconds.</gray>

2969.name: Read the Wind (PvP)
2969.description: For 24 seconds, your arrows move twice as fast.
2969.concise: (24 seconds). Your arrows move twice as fast.

2998.name: Fragility (PvP)
2998.description: For 8...20 seconds, target foe takes 5...20 damage each time that foe suffers or recovers from a new condition.
2998.concise: (8...20 seconds.) Target foe takes 5...20 damage each time it gains or loses a condition.

2999.name: Strength of Honor (PvP)
2999.description: While you maintain this enchantment, target ally deals 1...5 more damage in melee.
2999.concise: Target ally deals 1...5 more damage in melee.

3002.name: Warrior's Endurance (PvP)
3002.description: For 5...35 seconds, you gain 3 Energy each time you hit with a melee attack. Warrior's Endurance cannot raise your Energy above 10...25.
3002.concise: (5...35 seconds.) You gain 3 Energy each time you hit with a melee attack. <gray>No Energy gain if you have more than 10...25 Energy.</gray>

3003.name: Armor of Unfeeling (PvP)
3003.description: For 10...35 seconds, you have 10 base damage reduction while casting Binding Rituals.
3003.concise: (10...35 seconds.) You have 10 base damage reduction while casting binding rituals.

3005.name: Union (PvP)
3005.description: Create a level 1...8 spirit. Whenever a non-spirit ally in its range takes damage or life steal, it is reduced by 15 and the spirit takes 15 damage. This spirit dies after 30...60 seconds.
3005.concise: Creates a level 1...8 spirit (30...60 second lifespan). Whenever a non-spirit ally within range takes damage or life steal, that damage is reduced by 15 and the spirit takes 15 damage.

3006.name: Shadowsong (PvP)
3006.description: Create a level 1...6 spirit. The spirit's attacks deal 5...20 damage and cause Blindness for 1...6 seconds. This spirit dies after 30 seconds. <sic/>
3006.concise: Creates a level 1...6 spirit (30-second lifespan). Its attacks deal 5...20 damage and inflict Blindness condition (1...6 seconds).

3007.name: Pain (PvP)
3007.description: Create a level 1...8 spirit. This spirit's attacks deal 5...30 damage. This spirit dies after 30...150 seconds.
3007.concise: Creates a level 1...8 spirit (30...150 second lifespan). Its attacks deal 5...30 damage.

3008.name: Destruction (PvP)
3008.description: Create a level 1...10 Spirit <sic/> that dies after 30 seconds. When this Spirit dies, all foes in the area take 1...10 damage for each second the Spirit was alive (maximum of 150 damage).
3008.concise: Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30 second lifespan). On death, it deals 1...10 damage for each second it was alive to all foes in the area (maximum 150 damage).

3009.name: Soothing (PvP)
3009.description: Create a level 1...8 spirit. All foes within its range take twice as long to build adrenaline. This spirit dies after 15...45 seconds.
3009.concise: Creates a level 1...8 spirit (15...45 second lifespan). Building adrenaline takes twice as long for foes within range.

3010.name: Displacement (PvP)
3010.description: Create a level 1...10 spirit. All non-spirit allies within its range have a 75% chance to block incoming attacks. Every time an attack is blocked in this way, this spirit takes 60 damage. This spirit dies after 30...60 seconds.
3010.concise: Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...60 second lifespan). Non-spirit allies within range have 75% chance to block. <gray>Block effect: this spirit takes 60 damage.</gray>

3011.name: Preservation (PvP)
3011.description: Create a level 1...10 spirit. Every 4 seconds, this spirit heals one non-spirit ally in the area for 10...115 Health. This spirit dies after 90 seconds.
3011.concise: Creates a level 1...10 Spirit (90 second lifespan). Every 4 seconds this spirit heals one non-spirit ally for 10...115.

3012.name: Life (PvP)
3012.description: Create a level 1...10 spirit. When this spirit dies, all non-spirit allies within its range are healed for 1...7 Health for each second this spirit was alive. This spirit dies after 20 seconds.
3012.concise: Creates a level 1...10 spirit (20 second lifespan). Affects non-spirit allies within range. End effect: heals for 1...7 for each second this spirit was alive.

3013.name: Recuperation (PvP)
3013.description: Create a level 1...10 spirit. Non-spirit allies within its range gain +1...3 Health regeneration. This spirit dies after 15...45 seconds.
3013.concise: Creates a level 1...10 spirit (15...45 second lifespan). Non-spirit allies within range have +1...3 Health regeneration.

3014.name: Dissonance (PvP)
3014.description: Create a level 1...8 spirit. This spirit deals 5...20 damage and anyone struck by its attack is interrupted. This spirit dies after 10...25 seconds.
3014.concise: Creates a level 1...8 spirit (10...25 second lifespan). Its attacks deal 5...20 damage and interrupt actions.

3015.name: Earthbind (PvP)
3015.description: Create a level 1...10 spirit. All non-spirit foes knocked down within its range are knocked down for at least 3 seconds. Whenever this happens, this spirit loses 50...25 Health. This spirit dies after 15...45 seconds.
3015.concise: Creates a level 1...10 spirit (15...45 second lifespan). Any time non-spirit foes within range are knocked down, they are knocked down for at least 3 seconds. <gray>Knock-down cost: this spirit loses 50...25 Health.</gray>

3016.name: Shelter (PvP)
3016.description: Create a level 1...8 spirit. Non-spirit allies within its range cannot lose more than 10% maximum Health from a single attack. When this spirit prevents damage, it loses 75...45 Health. This spirit lasts 30...60 seconds.
3016.concise: Creates a level 1...8 spirit (30...60 second lifespan). Non-spirit allies within range cannot lose more than 10% maximum Health from a single attack. <gray>Damage prevention cost: this spirit loses 75...45 Health.</gray>

3017.name: Disenchantment (PvP)
3017.description: Create a level 1...8 spirit. This spirit deals 5...20 damage and anyone struck by its attack loses one enchantment. This spirit dies after 10...35 seconds.
3017.concise: Creates a level 1...8 spirit (10...35 second lifespan). Its attacks deal 5...20 damage and remove one enchantment.

3018.name: Restoration (PvP)
3018.description: Create a level 1...10 spirit. When this spirit dies, all party members in the area are resurrected with 5...50% Health and zero Energy. This spirit dies after 30 seconds.
3018.concise: Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30 second lifespan). End effect: resurrects party members in the area with 5...50% Health and zero Energy.

3019.name: Bloodsong (PvP)
3019.description: Create a level 1...8 spirit who dies after 30...150 seconds. Attacks by that spirit steal up to 5...25 Health.
3019.concise: Creates a level 1...8 spirit (30...150 second lifespan). Its attacks steal 5...25 Health.

3020.name: Wanderlust (PvP)
3020.description: Create a level 1...8 spirit. Whenever this spirit's attack hits a stationary foe, that foe is knocked down and the spirit loses 70...50 Health. This spirit dies after 30...60 seconds.
3020.concise: Creates a level 1...8 spirit (30...60 second lifespan). Its attacks against stationary foes cause knock-down. <gray>Knock-down cost: this spirit loses 70...50 Health.</gray>

3021.name: Savannah Heat (PvP)
3021.description: You create Savannah Heat at target foe's location. For 5 seconds, all nearby foes take 5...20 fire damage for each second this spell has been in effect.
3021.concise: Deals 5...20 fire damage for each second since casting this spell (5 seconds). Hits foes near target's initial location.

3022.name: Gaze of Fury (PvP)
3022.description: Destroy target allied spirit and create a level 1...10 Spirit of Fury. This spirit's attacks deal 5...20 damage. This spirit dies after 30...60 seconds.
3022.concise: Destroys an allied spirit. Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...60 second lifespan). Its attacks deal 5...20 damage.

3023.name: Anguish (PvP)
