3023.description: Create a level 1...7 spirit. This spirit's attacks deal 5...20 damage and deal double damage to hexed foes. This spirit dies after 15...45 seconds.
3023.concise: Creates a level 1...7 spirit (15...45 second lifespan). Its attacks deal 5...20 damage. Double damage to hexed foes.

3024.name: Empowerment (PvP)
3024.description: Create a level 1...10 spirit. All allies within its range holding an item gain 15...45 maximum Health and 10 maximum Energy. This spirit dies after 15...60 seconds.
3024.concise: Creates a level 1...10 spirit (15...60 second lifespan). Allies in range holding an item gain 15...45 maximum Health and 10 maximum Energy.

3025.name: Recovery (PvP)
3025.description: Create a level 1...10 spirit. Conditions on allies within range of this spirit expire 20...50% faster. This spirit dies after 30...60 seconds.
3025.concise: Creates a level 1...10 spirit (30...60 second lifespan). Conditions on allies in range expire 20...50% faster.

3026.name: "Go for the Eyes!" (PvP)
3026.description: For 10 seconds, the next time each ally within earshot makes an attack, that attack has an additional 30...75% chance to critical.
3026.concise: (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot have +30...75% to land a critical hit with their next attack.

3027.name: "Brace Yourself!" (PvP)
3027.description: For 5...15 seconds, the next time target other ally would be knocked down, 1 nearby foe takes 15...75 damage instead.
3027.concise: (5...15 seconds.) Prevents the next knock-down and deals 15...75 damage to one foe near target ally. <gray>Cannot self-target.</gray>

3028.name: Blazing Finale (PvP)
3028.description: For 10...35 seconds, whenever a chant or shout ends on target non-spirit ally, all foes adjacent to that ally are set on Fire for 1...3 seconds.
3028.concise: (10...35 seconds.) Inflicts Burning condition (1...3 seconds) to adjacent foes whenever a chant or shout ends on target ally. Cannot target spirits.

3029.name: Bladeturn Refrain (PvP)
3029.description: For 20 seconds, target non-spirit ally has +10...40 armor against slashing damage. This echo is reapplied every time a chant or shout ends on that ally.
3029.concise: (20 seconds.) Target ally has +10...40 armor against slashing damage. Renewal: Whenever a chant or shout ends on that ally. <gray>Cannot target spirits.</gray>

3030.name: Signet of Return (PvP)
3030.description: Resurrect target party member with 5...15% Health and 1...4% Energy for each party member within earshot.
3030.concise: Resurrects target party member (5...15% Health and 1...4% Energy for each party member in earshot).

3031.name: "Can't Touch This!" (PvP)
3031.description: For 20 seconds, the next 1...5 touch skills used against you fails.
3031.concise: (20 seconds.) The next 1...5 touch-range skills used against you fails.

3032.name: "Stand Your Ground!" (PvP)
3032.description: For 5...20 seconds, all party members within earshot receive +24 armor when not moving. This effect ends on an ally affected by this shout when that ally attacks.
3032.concise: (5...20 seconds.) Party members in earshot gain +24 armor when not moving. Ends for an ally if that ally attacks.

3033.name: "We Shall Return!" (PvP)
3033.description: For 10 seconds, whenever party members within earshot use a resurrection skill, their fallen allies return with 10...75% more Health and 5...50% more Energy.
3033.concise: (10 seconds.) Whenever party members in earshot use a resurrection skill, their fallen allies return with 10...75% more Health and 5...50% more Energy.

3034.name: "Find Their Weakness!" (PvP)
3034.description: For 5...20 seconds, the next time target ally criticals, that ally also inflicts a Deep Wound for 5...20 seconds.
3034.concise: (5...20 seconds.) Target ally inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...20 seconds) with the next critical hit.

3035.name: "Never Give Up!" (PvP)
3035.description: All allies within earshot and below 75% Health gain 1...10 Energy.
3035.concise: Allies in earshot gain 1...10 Energy. <gray>Only affects allies below 75% Health.</gray>

3036.name: "Help Me!" (PvP)
3036.description: You gain 5...50 Health. For 1...10 seconds, other allies' spells targeting you cast 50% faster.
3036.concise: (1...10 seconds.) Other allies' spells targeting you cast 50% faster. You gain 5...50 Health.

3037.name: "Fall Back!" (PvP)
3037.description: For 4...10 seconds, all allies within earshot gain 5...15 Health per second while moving and move 33% faster. "Fall Back!" ends on an ally affected by this shout when that ally successfully hits with an attack.
3037.concise: (4...10 seconds.) Allies in earshot gain 5...15 Health per second while moving and move 33% faster. <gray>Ends for an ally if that ally hits with an attack.</gray>

3038.name: Agony (PvP)
3038.description: Create a level 1...8 spirit. This spirit causes 3...10 Health loss each second to foes within earshot. This spirit loses 3...10 Health for each foe hurt in this way. This spirit dies after 30...90 seconds.
3038.concise: Creates a level 1...8 spirit (30...90 second lifespan). Causes 3...10 Health loss each second to foes in earshot. <gray>This spirit loses 3...10 Health for each foe that loses Health.</gray>

3039.name: Rejuvenation (PvP)
3039.description: Create a level 1...16 spirit. This spirit heals all party members within earshot for 3...10 Health each second. This spirit loses 3...10 Health for each party member healed in this way. This spirit dies after 30...90 seconds.
3039.concise: Creates a level 1...16 spirit (30...90 second lifespan). Heals party members in earshot for 3...10 each second. <gray>Healing cost: this spirit loses 3...10 Health.</gray>

3040.name: Anthem of Disruption (PvP)
3040.description: For 1...10 seconds, the next attack skill used by each ally within earshot also interrupts an action.
3040.concise: (1...10 seconds.) Allies in earshot interrupt an action with their next attack skill.

3045.name: Comfort Animal (PvP)
3045.description: You heal your animal companion for 20...104 Health. If your companion is dead, it is resurrected with 10...58% Health.
3045.concise: Your pet gains 20...104 Health. Resurrects your pet (10...58% Health.)

3047.name: Melandru's Assault (PvP)
3047.description: Your animal companion attempts a Melandru's Assault that deals +5...20 damage. If that attack strikes a foe with an enchantment, that foe and all adjacent foes take +5...35 additional damage.
3047.concise: Deals +5...20 damage. Deals +5...35 more damage to target and foes adjacent to target if this foe is enchanted.

3048.name: Shroud of Distress (PvP)
3048.description: For 30...60 seconds, if you are below 50% Health, you have a 75% chance to block attacks.
3048.concise: (30...60 seconds.) You have 75% chance to block. No effect unless your Health is below 50%.

3049.name: Unseen Fury (PvP)
3049.description: For 15...60 seconds, you cannot be blocked by Blinded foes.
3049.concise: (15...60 seconds.) You cannot be blocked by Blinded foes.

3050.name: Predatory Bond (PvP)
3050.description: For 5...20 seconds, attacks by your animal companion heal you for 1...31 Health.
3050.concise: (5...20 seconds.) You gain 1...31 Health whenever your pet makes a successful attack.

3051.name: Enraged Lunge (PvP)
3051.description: Your animal companion attempts an Enraged Lunge that deals +3...23 damage (maximum bonus 80) for each recharging Beast Mastery skill.
3051.concise: Deals +3...23 damage (maximum 80) for each of your recharging Beast Mastery skills.

3053.name: Signet of Deadly Corruption (PvP)
3053.description: Must follow a dual attack. Target foe takes 5...35 damage for each condition on that foe (maximum 130 damage).
3053.concise: Deals 5...35 damage (maximum 130) for each condition on target foe. <gray>Must follow a dual attack.</gray>

3054.name: Masochism (PvP)
3054.description: For 30 seconds, you gain 1...3 Energy whenever you sacrifice Health.
3054.concise: (30 seconds.) You gain 1...3 Energy whenever you sacrifice Health.

3058.name: Unholy Feast (PvP)
3058.description: Steal up to 10...65 Health from up to 1...4 foes <sic/> in the area.
3058.concise: Steals 10...65 Health from 1...4 foes in the area around you.

3059.name: Signet of Agony (PvP)
3059.description: You suffer from Bleeding for 25 seconds. All nearby foes take 10...70 damage.
3059.concise: Deals 10...70 damage to foes near you. <gray>You begin Bleeding (25 seconds).</gray>

3060.name: Escape (PvP)
3060.description: For 1...8 seconds, you move 33% faster and have a 75% chance to block attacks. Escape ends if you make a melee attack.
3060.concise: (1...8 seconds.) You move 33% faster and have 75% chance to block. <gray>Ends if you make a melee attack.</gray>

3061.name: Death Blossom (PvP)
3061.description: Must follow an off-hand attack. If it hits, Death Blossom strikes target foe for +20...45 damage and all adjacent foes take 20...45 damage.
3061.concise: Deals +20...45 damage. Also affects foes adjacent to target foe. <gray>Must follow an off-hand attack.</gray>

3062.name: Finale of Restoration (PvP)
3062.description: For 10...35 seconds, the next 5 times that a chant or shout ends on target non-spirit ally, that ally is healed for 15...75 Health.
3062.concise: (10...35 seconds.) Target ally gains <sic/> 15...75 Health the next 5 times a shout or chant ends on that ally. <gray>Cannot target spirits.</gray>

3063.name: Mantra of Resolve (PvP)
3063.description: For 5 seconds, you cannot be interrupted, but each time you would have been interrupted, you lose 10...4 Energy or Mantra of Resolve ends.
3063.concise: (5 seconds.) Prevents interrupts against you. <gray>Prevention cost: lose 10...4 Energy or Mantra of Resolve ends.</gray>

3141.name: Lightning Reflexes (PvP)
3141.description: For 5...11 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block melee and projectile attacks, and you attack 33% faster.
3141.concise: (5...11 seconds.) You attack 33% faster and have 75% chance to block.

3143.name: Renewing Smash (PvP)
3143.description: If Renewing Smash hits, it deals +5...20 damage. If it hits a knocked-down foe, you gain 3 Energy and this attack recharges instantly.
3143.concise: Deals +5...20 damage. You gain 3 energy and this attack recharges instantly if target foe was knocked down.

3144.name: Heal as One (PvP)
3144.description: If you or your animal companion are below 75% Health, you are both healed for 25...145 Health. If your companion is dead, it is resurrected with 50% Health.
3144.concise: Heals you and your pet for 25...145. If your pet is dead, it is resurrected with 50% Health. <gray>No effect if neither you nor your pet are below 75% Health.</gray>

3145.name: Glass Arrows (PvP)
3145.description: For 10...35 seconds, your arrows strike for +5...12 damage if they hit and cause Bleeding for 10...20 seconds if they are blocked.
3145.concise: (10...35 seconds.) Your arrows deal +5...12 damage. Inflicts Bleeding condition if blocked (10...20 seconds).

3147.name: Keen Arrow (PvP)
3147.description: If this attack hits, you strike for +1...5 damage. If you land a critical hit, you deal an additional +5...30 damage.
3147.concise: Deals +1...5 damage. Deals +5...30 more damage if you land a critical hit.

3148.name: Anthem of Envy (PvP)
3148.description: For 10 seconds, the next attack skill used by each ally within earshot deals +10...20 damage against foes with more than 50% Health.
3148.concise: (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot do +10...20 damage with their next attack skill. <gray>Damage bonus only applies to foes with more than 50% Health.</gray>

3149.name: Mending Refrain (PvP)
3149.description: For 15 seconds, you have +2...3 Health regeneration. This echo is reapplied every time a chant or shout ends on you.
3149.concise: (15 seconds.) You have +2...3 Health regeneration. Renewal: whenever a chant or shout ends on you.

3151.name: Empathy (PvP)
3151.description: For 5...15 seconds, whenever target foe attacks, that foe takes 15...45 damage.
3151.concise: (5...15 seconds.) Target foe takes 15...45 damage whenever it attacks.

3152.name: Crippling Anguish (PvP)
3152.description: For 5...20 seconds, target moves 50% slower and suffers -1...5 Health degeneration.
3152.concise: (5...20 seconds.) Target foe moves 50% slower and has -1...5 Health degeneration.

3156.name: Soldier's Stance (PvP)
3156.description: For 4...10 seconds, you attack 33% faster while under the effects of a shout or chant.
3156.concise: (4...10 seconds.) You attack 33% faster while under the effects of a shout or chant.

3157.name: Destructive Was Glaive (PvP)
3157.description: Hold Glaive's ashes for up to 30...60 seconds. While you hold her ashes, all Ritualist skills have 10% armor penetration. When you drop her ashes, all foes in the area are struck for 15...85 lightning damage.
3157.concise: (30...60 seconds.) Your Ritualist skills have 10% armor penetration. Drop effect: deals 15...85 lightning damage to all foes in the area.

3179.name: Mantra of Signets (PvP)
3179.description: For 10...40 seconds, whenever you use a signet, you gain 5...60 Health.
3179.concise: (10...40 seconds.) You gain 5...60 Health each time you use a signet.

3180.name: Shatter Delusions (PvP)
3180.description: Remove one Mesmer hex from target foe. If a hex was removed, that foe and all adjacent foes takes 15...75 damage.
3180.concise: Removes a Mesmer hex from target foe. Removal effect: 15...75 damage to target and all adjacent foes.

3181.name: Illusionary Weaponry (PvP)
3181.description: For 30 seconds, your melee attacks neither hit nor fail to hit. Instead, Illusionary Weaponry deals 8...40 damage to your targets for each melee attack.
3181.concise: (30 seconds.) Deals 8...40 damage to foes in place of other damage or effects from melee attacks. <gray>Your melee attacks neither hit nor fail to hit.</gray>

3183.name: Migraine (PvP)
3183.description: For 3...12 seconds, target foe suffers -1...8 Health degeneration and takes 100% longer to activate skills.
3183.concise: (3...12 seconds.) Causes -1...8 Health degeneration and doubles skill activation time.

3184.name: Accumulated Pain (PvP)
3184.description: Target foe takes 10...35 damage. If target foe is suffering from 2 or more hexes, that foe suffers a Deep Wound for 5...20 seconds.
3184.concise: Deals 10...35 damage. Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...20 seconds) if target foe has 2 or more hexes.

3185.name: Psychic Instability (PvP)
3185.description: Interrupts the target foe's action. If that action is a skill, that foe and all adjacent foes are knocked down for 2...3 seconds. (50% failure chance with Fast Casting 4 or less.)
3185.concise: Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: if the action is a skill, causes knockdown for 2...3 seconds on target foe and all adjacent foes. <gray>50% failure chance unless Fast Casting 5 or higher.</gray>

3186.name: Shared Burden (PvP)
3186.description: For 5...20 seconds, target foe and all nearby foes attack, cast spells, and move 33% slower.
3186.concise: Also hexes foes near your target (5...20 seconds). These foes attack, cast spells, and move 33% slower.

3187.name: Stolen Speed (PvP)
3187.description: For 1...10 seconds, spells cast by the target foe and all adjacent foes take 100% longer to cast. Spells you cast that target these foes take 50% less time to cast.
3187.concise: Also hexes adjacent foes (1...10 seconds). Doubles spell casting time. Spells you cast on hexed foes have -50% casting time.

3188.name: Unnatural Signet (PvP)
3188.description: Target foe takes 10...60 damage. If that foe is under the effects of a hex or enchantment, foes adjacent to your target take 10...60 damage. All your non-Mesmer skills except signets are disabled for 10 seconds.
3188.concise: Deals 10...60 damage. Deals 10...60 damage to other adjacent foes if the target is hexed or enchanted. <gray>Your non-Mesmer skills except signets are disabled (10 seconds).</gray>

3189.name: Spiritual Pain (PvP)
3189.description: Target foe takes 5...40 damage. All hostile summoned creatures in the area of that foe take 25...125 damage.
3189.concise: Deals 5...40 damage. Deals 25...125 damage to hostile summoned creatures in the area of your target foe.

3190.name: Frustration (PvP)
3190.description: For 5...20 seconds, target foe casts spells 50% slower and takes 5...50 damage whenever interrupted.
3190.concise: (5...20 seconds.) Causes 50% slower spell casting. Target foe takes 5...50 damage whenever interrupted.

3191.name: Mistrust (PvP)
3191.description: For 6 seconds, the next spell that target foe casts on one of your allies fails and deals 10...75 damage to that foe and all nearby foes.
3191.concise: (6 seconds.) The next spell that target foe casts on one of your allies fails and deals 10...75 damage to target and nearby foes.

3192.name: Enchanter's Conundrum (PvP)
3192.description: For 10 seconds, target foe casts enchantments 100...200% slower. If target foe is not under the effects of an enchantment when this hex is applied, that foe and all adjacent foes take 10...100 damage.
3192.concise: Causes 100...200% slower enchantment casting (10 seconds). Initial effect: deals 10...100 damage to target and adjacent foes if target foe is not enchanted.

3193.name: Signet of Clumsiness (PvP)
3193.description: If target foe is attacking, that foe and all adjacent foes are interrupted and take 15...60 damage. Any foes using attack skills are knocked down.
3193.concise: Interrupts an attack for target foe and all adjacent foes. Interruption effect: deals 15...60 damage; knocks down foes using attack skills.

3194.name: Mirror of Disenchantment (PvP)
3194.description: Remove one enchantment from target foe. All of that foe's party members also lose that same enchantment.
3194.concise: Removes one enchantment from target foe. That foe's party members also lose this enchantment.

3195.name: Wandering Eye (PvP)
3195.description: For 4 seconds, the next time target foe attacks, that attack is interrupted and all nearby foes take 10...92 damage.
3195.concise: (4 seconds.) Interrupts target foe's next attack. Interruption effect: 10...92 damage to nearby foes.

3196.name: Calculated Risk (PvP)
3196.description: For 3...12 seconds, target foe's attacks do +10 damage, but there is a 50% chance that the damage from each attack will be done to that foe instead. (Maximum 10...60 damage.)
3196.concise: Target foe does +10 damage with attacks (3...12 seconds). There is a 50% chance that the damage from each attack (maximum 10...60) will be done to that foe instead.

3204.name: Defy Pain (PvP)
3204.description: For 20 seconds you have an additional 90...300 Health and an additional 20 armor.
3204.concise: (20 seconds.) You have +90...300 maximum Health and +20 armor.

3233.name: Spoil Victor (PvP)
3233.description: For 3...15 seconds, whenever target foe attacks or casts a spell on a creature with less Health that foe loses 15...75 Health.
3233.concise: (3...15 seconds.) Causes 15...75 Health loss whenever target foe attacks or casts spells on a creature with less Health.

3234.name: Visions of Regret (PvP)
3234.description: For 10 seconds, target foe and adjacent foes take 10...30 damage whenever they use a skill and 5...40 additional damage if not under the effects of another Mesmer hex.
3234.concise: Also hexes foes adjacent to target (10 seconds). These foes take 10...30 damage whenever they use a skill and 5...40 additional damage if not under the effects of another Mesmer hex.

3251.name: Fox Fangs (PvP)
3251.description: Must follow a lead attack. Fox Fangs cannot be blocked and strikes for +10...25 damage if it hits.
3251.concise: Deals +10...25 damage. Unblockable. <gray>Must follow a lead attack.</gray>

3252.name: Wild Strike (PvP)
3252.description: Must follow a lead attack. If it hits, this attack strikes for +10...35 damage and any stance being used by target foe ends. This attack cannot be blocked.
3252.concise: Deals +10...35 damage. Removes target foe's stance. Unblockable. <gray>Must follow a lead attack.</gray>

3263.name: Banishing Strike (PvP)
3263.description: If it hits, this attack deals 10...60 holy damage. It deals double damage to summoned creatures.
3263.concise: Deals 10...60 holy damage. Deals double damage to summoned creatures.

3264.name: Twin Moon Sweep (PvP)
3264.description: You lose 1 Dervish enchantment and gain 10...20 Health. If an enchantment is lost in this way, you cannot be blocked, you strike twice, with each strike doing 25% less damage than normal, and you gain an additional 10...30 Health.
3264.concise: Remove 1 of your Dervish enchantments. Gain 10...20 Health. Removal effect: Unblockable, attack twice, each strike doing 25% less damage, and gain 10...30 more Health.

3265.name: Irresistible Sweep (PvP)
3265.description: Deal +3...15 damage and lose 1 Dervish enchantment. If you lose an enchantment in this way, Irresistible Sweep cannot be blocked and removes a stance.
3265.concise: Deals +3...15 damage. Remove 1 of your Dervish enchantments. Removal effect: unblockable, removes a stance.

3266.name: Pious Assault (PvP)
3266.description: You remove 1 Dervish enchantment. If a Dervish enchantment was removed, this skill recharges 75% faster and adjacent foes take 10...30 damage.
3266.concise: Removes 1 of your Dervish enchantments. Removal effect: this skill recharges 75% faster and adjacent foes take 10...30 damage.

3269.name: Guiding Hands (PvP)
3269.description: For 20 seconds, your next 0...3 attacks cannot be blocked. When activated, this skill removes the Blindness condition.
3269.concise: (20 seconds.) Your next 0...3 attacks cannot be blocked. Initial effect: removes Blindness.

3270.name: Avatar of Dwayna (PvP)
3270.description: For 10...90 seconds, your attacks deal holy damage. Whenever you use a Dervish attack skill, you lose 1 hex. Whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment, you are healed for 5...50 Health. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.
3270.concise: (10...90 seconds.) Deal holy damage. You lose 1 hex whenever you use a Dervish attack skill. Heal yourself for 5...50 Health whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.

3271.name: Avatar of Melandru (PvP)
3271.description: For 10...90 seconds, you have +100 Health, +30 elemental armor, and your attacks deal earth damage. Whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment you lose 2 conditions. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.
3271.concise: (10...90 seconds.) You have +100 maximum Health, +30 elemental armor, and your attacks deal earth damage. Cure 2 conditions from yourself whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.

3272.name: Mystic Healing (PvP)
3272.description: You are healed for 5...65 Health. Also heals all enchanted party members for 5...65 Health.
3272.concise: Heals you for 5...65. Heals all enchanted party members for 5...65 Health.

3273.name: Signet of Pious Restraint (PvP)
3273.description: Lose 1 Dervish enchantment and Cripple target foe 5...15 seconds. If an enchantment was removed, this skill recharges 75% faster.
3273.concise: (5...15 seconds.) Cripples target foe and removes 1 of your Dervish enchantments. Removal effect: recharges 75% faster.

3289.name: Fevered Dreams (PvP)
3289.description: For 5...15 seconds, whenever target foe suffers from a new condition, all foes in the area suffer from that condition as well.
3289.concise: (5...15 seconds.) Foes in the area also have any new conditions that target foe acquires.

3346.name: Aura of Thorns (PvP)
3346.description: All nearby foes begin Bleeding for 5...15 seconds. For 30 seconds, this enchantment does nothing. When this enchantment ends, all nearby foes are Crippled for 3...8 seconds.
3346.concise: (30 seconds.) Initial effect: inflicts Bleeding condition (5...15 seconds) on nearby foes. End effect: inflicts Crippled condition (3...8 seconds) on nearby foes.

3347.name: Dust Cloak (PvP)
3347.description: All adjacent foes are struck for 10...40 earth damage. For 30 seconds, your attacks deal earth damage. When this enchantment ends, all adjacent foes are Blinded for 1...4 seconds.
3347.concise: (30 seconds.) Your attacks deal earth damage. Initial effect: deals 10...40 earth damage to adjacent foes. End effect: inflicts Blindness condition (1...4 seconds) on adjacent foes.

3348.name: Lyssa's Haste (PvP)
3348.description: For 3...15 seconds, your Dervish enchantments recharge 33% faster. When you activate this enchantment, all adjacent foes are interrupted. When this enchantment ends, all adjacent foes are interrupted. 50% failure chance unless Wind Prayers 5 or higher.
3348.concise: (3...15 seconds.) Your Dervish enchantments recharge 33% faster. Initial Effect: interrupts all adjacent foes. End Effect: interrupts all adjacent foes. <gray>50% failure chance unless Wind Prayers 5 or higher.</gray>

3365.name: Onslaught (PvP)
3365.description: For 2...8 seconds, you attack and gain adrenaline 25% faster.
3365.concise: (2...8 seconds.) You attack and gain adrenaline 25% faster.

3367.name: Wounding Strike (PvP)
3367.description: If this attack hits, target foe suffers from Bleeding for 5...20 seconds, and you lose 1 Dervish enchantment. If an enchantment is removed, target foe also suffers from a Deep Wound for 5...20 seconds.
3367.concise: Inflicts Bleeding condition (5...20 seconds). Removes 1 Dervish enchantment. Removal effect: inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...20 seconds).

3368.name: Pious Fury (PvP)
3368.description: Remove one Dervish enchantment. For 1...5 seconds, you attack 25% faster. If an enchantment was removed, this stance lasts twice as long.
3368.concise: (1...5 seconds.)You <sic/> attack 25% faster and remove 1 of your Dervish enchantments. Removal effect: this stance lasts twice as long.

3373.name: Illusion of Haste (PvP)
3373.description: For 5...11 seconds, you move 33% faster. When Illusion of Haste ends, you become Crippled for 3 seconds.
3373.concise: (5...11 seconds.) You move 33% faster. <gray>End effect: you are Crippled (3 seconds).</gray>

3374.name: Illusion of Pain (PvP)
3374.description: For 8 seconds, target foe has -3...10 Health degeneration and takes 3...10 damage each second. When Illusion of Pain ends or is reapplied, that foe is healed for 36...120.
3374.concise: (8 seconds.) Causes -3...10 Health degeneration and target foe takes 3...10 damage each second. End effect: that foe is healed for 36...120. <gray>Ends if reapplied.</gray>

3375.name: Aura of Restoration (PvP)
3375.description: For 60 seconds, you gain 0...1 Energy and are healed for 200...400% of the Energy cost each time you cast a spell.
3375.concise: (60 seconds.) You gain 0...1 Energy and are healed for 200...400% of the Energy cost each time you cast a spell.

3386.name: Web of Disruption (PvP)
3386.description: Interrupt target foe. For 10 seconds, target foe is hexed with Web of Disruption. When this hex ends, that foe is interrupted again.
3386.concise: (10 seconds.) Initial effect: interrupts a skill. End effect: interrupts a skill.

3396.name: Lightning Hammer (PvP)
3396.description: Target foe is struck for 10...100 lightning damage. Lightning Hammer has 25% armor penetration.

3397.name: Elemental Flame (PvP)
3397.description: For 5...20 seconds, whenever you apply an Elemental hex to a foe, that foe is set on fire for 1...2 seconds.
3397.concise: (5...20 seconds.) Inflicts Burning condition (1...2 seconds) whenever you apply an Elemental hex to a target.

3398.name: Slippery Ground (PvP)
3398.description: If target foe is Blind or moving, that foe is knocked down. (50% failure chance with Water Magic 4 or less.)
3398.concise: Causes knock-down if this foe is Blind or moving. <gray>50% failure chance unless Water Magic 5 or higher.</gray>

3422.name: Time Ward
3422.description: You create a Time Ward at your location. For 3...15 seconds, non-spirit allies in this area cast spells 15...20% faster and recharge skills 15...20% faster.
3422.concise: (3...15 seconds.) Allies in this ward cast spells 15...20% faster and recharge skills 15...20% faster. <gray>Allied spirits are not affected. PvE Skill</gray>

3423.name: Soul Taker
3423.description: For 3...30 seconds, your attacks sacrifice 15...20 health and deal 15...20 more damage.
3423.concise: (3...30 seconds.) Attacks deal +15...20 damage and sacrifice 15...20 health.

3424.name: Over the Limit
3424.description: While you maintain this enchantment, your spells cast 15...20% faster, and recharge 15...50% faster, but you continuously gain Overcast.
3424.concise: Spells cast 15...20% faster and recharge 15...50% faster. Continuously gain Overcast while active.

3425.name: Judgment Strike
3425.description: Attack target and adjacent foes. Each attack that hits deals +13...30 Holy damage <sic/> and knocks down attacking foes.
3425.concise: Attacks target and adjacent foes for +13...30 Holy damage. Causes knock down on attacking foes.

3426.name: Seven Weapons Stance
3426.description: For 3...20 seconds, your weapon attributes are increased by +1...15 and you attack 33% faster.
3426.concise: (3...20 seconds.) Weapon attributes are increased by +1...15. You attack 33% faster.

3427.name: "Together as One!"
3427.description: For 3...15 seconds, all party members near you or near your pet deal +5...15 additional damage with attacks and gain +1...7 Health regeneration.
3427.concise: (3...15 seconds.) All party members near you or your pet deal +5...15 damage <sic/> and gain +1...7 Health regeneration.

3428.name: Shadow Theft
3428.description: Shadow Step to target foe. For 5...20 seconds that foe's attributes are reduced by 1...5 and your attributes are increased by 1...5. This skill counts as a Lead Attack.
3428.concise: Shadow Step to target foe. For 5...20 seconds that foe's attributes are reduced by 1...5 and your attributes are increased by 1...5. Counts as a Lead Attack.

3429.name: Weapons of Three Forges
3429.description: For 3...20 seconds, each non-spirit ally in earshot gains the effect of a random Weapon Spell.
3429.concise: (3...20 seconds.) Allies in earshot gain the effect of a random Weapon Spell. <gray>Allied spirits are not affected. PvE Skill</gray>

3430.name: Vow of Revolution
3430.description: For 3...10 seconds, you have +1...5 energy regeneration. This skill reapplies itself every time you use a non-Dervish skill.
3430.concise: (3...10 seconds.) Gain +1...5 energy regeneration. Renewal: whenever you use a non-Dervish skill.

3431.name: Heroic Refrain
3431.description: For 3...15 seconds, target non-spirit ally gains +1...3 to all attributes. This echo is reapplied every time a chant or shout ends on that ally.
3431.concise: (3...15 seconds.) Target ally gains +1...3 to all attributes. Renewal: every time a chant or shout ends on this ally. <gray>Cannot target spirits. PvE Skill</gray>
